GK16andhvc3u:0: tṛtīya uddyotaḥ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ - - - evaṃ vyaṅgyamukhenaiva dhvaneḥ pradarśite saprabhede svarūpe punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyate--- locanam tṛtīya uddyotaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4: tatra vācyamukhena tāvadavivakṣitavācyādayo bhedāḥ, vācyaśca yadyapi vyañjaka eva /
GK16andhvc3u:6: tataśca vyañjakamukhenāpi bheda uktaḥ, tathāpi sa vācyo 'rtho
GK16andhvc3u:8: tathā hyavivakṣito vācyo vyaṅgyena nyagbhāvitaḥ, vivakṣitānyaparo vācya iti vyaṅgyārthapravaṇa evocyate ityevaṃ mūlabhedayoreva yathāsvamavāntarabhedasahitayorvyañjakarūpo bālapriyā atha
GK16andhvc3u:9: tṛtīyodyotaṭippaṇī prārabhyate athāhaṃ prauḍhamudyotaṃ tṛtīyañca yathāmati
GK16andhvc3u:12: smarasya kāmasya saṃhāra eva līlā, tatra yatpāṭavaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tacchālinaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:13: śambhoḥ dehārdhaṃ prasahya harantīmityanena parameśvaryāḥ tathāvidhāt parameśvarādapyatiśayitaṃ pāṭavaṃ dyotyate /
GK16andhvc3u:15: anya udyotaḥ uddyotāntaraṃ tṛtīyodyotaḥ, tasya saṅgāta dvitīyoyotena saha prasaṅgarūpāṃ saṅgatimityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:45: maharṣervyāsasya---'saptaitāḥ samidhaḥ śriyaḥ', yathā vā kālidāsasya---'kaḥ sannaddhe virahavidhurāṃ tvayyupekṣeta jāyām', yathā
GK16andhvc3u:46: vā--'kimiva hi madhurāṇāṃ maṇḍanaṃ nākṛtīnām', eteṣūdāharaṇeṣu 'samidha'
GK16andhvc3u:47: iti sannaddha' iti 'madhurāṇā'miti ca padāni vyañjakatvābhiprāyeṇaiva
GK16andhvc3u:51: kiṃ ca yadyapyartho vyañjakastathāpi vyaṅgyatāyogyo 'pyasau bhavatīti,
GK16andhvc3u:52: śabdastu na kadācidyvaṅgyaḥ api tu vyañjaka eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:54: na ca vācyasyāvivakṣitādirūpeṇa yo bhedastatra sarvathaiva na na prakāśitaḥ kintu prakāśito 'pyadhunā punaḥ śuddhavyañjakamukhena /
GK16andhvc3u:55: tathāhi vyaṅgyamukhaprekṣitayā vinā padaṃ vākyaṃ varṇāḥ padabhāgaḥ saṅghaṭanā mahāvākyamiti svarūpata eva v.yañjakānāṃ bhedaḥ, na caiṣāmarthavatkadācidapi vyaṅgyatā sambhavatīti vyañjakaikaniyataṃ svarūpaṃ yattanmukhena bhedaḥ prakāśyata iti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:56: yastu vyācaṣṭe---'vyaṅgyānāṃ vastvalaṅkārarasānāṃ mukhena' iti, sa evaṃ praṣṭavyaḥ---etattāvatrribhedatvaṃ na kārikākāreṇa kṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:58: na cedānīṃ vṛttikārobhedaprakaṭanaṃ karoti bālapriyā pradarśita ityukterabhiprāyāntarañcāstītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:73: vācyasambandhiyadavivakṣitādirūpaṃ avivakṣitatvādikantena hetunā yo bhedaḥ dhvaneravāntarabhedaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:83: locanam tataścedaṃ kṛtamidaṃ kriyata iti kartṛbhede kā saṅgatiḥ? na caitāvatā sakalaprāktanagranthasaṅgatiḥ kṛtā bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:84: avivakṣitavācyādīnāmapi prakārāṇāṃ darśitatvādityalaṃ nijapūjyajanasagotraiḥ sākaṃ vivādena
GK16andhvc3u:86: tenāvivakṣitavācyo dviprabhedo 'pi pratyekaṃ padavākyaprakāśa iti dvidhā /
GK16andhvc3u:87: tadanyasya vivakṣitābhidheyasya sambandhī yo bhedaḥ kramadyotyo nāma svabhedasahitaḥ so 'pi pratyekaṃ dvidhaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:88: anuraṇanena rūpaṃ rūpaṇasādṛśyaṃ yasya tādṛgvyaṅgyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:89: maharṣerityanena tadanusandhatte yatprāguktam, atha ca rāmāyaṇamahābhārata
GK16andhvc3u:91: dhṛtiḥ kṣamā dayā śaucaṃ kāruṇyaṃ vāganiṣṭhurā /
GK16andhvc3u:94: samicchabdena ca vyaṅgyo 'rtho 'nanyāpekṣalakṣmyuddīpanakṣamatvaṃ saptānāṃ vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanitam /
GK16andhvc3u:97: atra ca vācyasyātyantatiraskāraḥ pūrvoktamanusṛtya bālapriyā svarūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:100: ityasya kartṛbhede sati saṅgatatvaṃ na sambhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:101: 'vyaṅgyamukhena pradarśite punarvyañjakamukhenaitatprakāśyata' ityanena pradarśanaprakāśanayorekakartṛkatvaṃ svarasataḥ pratīyate, tadasaṅgataṃ bhavediti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:105: cakārasyābhāve avivakṣitavācyasya pradaprakāśatā, tadanyasya vākyaprakāśateti yathāsaṅkhyenārthabhramassyāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:120: priyajīvitena tu kṛtaṃ locanam yojanīyaḥ kiṃ punaruktena /
GK16andhvc3u:122: tathaiva madhuraśabdena sarvaviṣayarañjakatvatarpakatvādikaṃ lakṣayatā sātiśayāmilāṣaviṣayatvaṃ nātrāścaryamiti vakrabhipretaṃ dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:125: 'pratyākhyānaruṣaḥ kṛtaṃ samucitaṃ krūreṇa te rakṣasā soḍhaṃ tacca tathā tvayā kulajano dhatte yathoccaiḥ śiraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:126: vyartha samprati bibhratā dhanuridaṃ tvadyvāpadaḥ sākṣiṇā' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:127: rakṣaḥsvabhāvādeva yaḥ krūro 'natilaṅghyaśāsanatvadurmadatayā ca prasahya nirākriyamāṇaḥ kodhāndhaḥ tasyaitattāvatsvacittavṛttisamucitamanuṣṭhānaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:128: yanmūrdhakartanaṃ nāma, mānyo 'pi bālapriyā vyaṅgyo 'rtha iti pāṭho dṛśyate tatsatve dhvanitamityasya bodhitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:144: anatilaṅdhyaṃ śāsanaṃ yasya tatvena yā durmadatā ahamanatilaṅdhyaśāsana iti durabhimānaḥ tayeti krodhāndhatve hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:150: taiti yathā tādṛgapi tayā na gaṇitastasyāstavetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:152: yathā yena prakāreṇa kulajana iti yaḥ kaścitpāmaraprāyo 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:154: uccaiḥ śiro dhattai evaṃvidhāḥ kila vayaṃ kulavadhvo bhavāma iti /
GK16andhvc3u:155: atha ca śilaḥkartanāvasare tvayā śīghraṃ kṛtyatāmiti tathā soḍhaṃ tathoccaiḥ śiro dhṛtaṃ yathānyo 'pi kulastrījana uccaiḥ śiro dhatte netyapravṛttatayā /
GK16andhvc3u:156: evaṃ rāvaṇasya tava ca samucitakāritvaṃ nirvyūḍham /
GK16andhvc3u:158: tathāhirājyanirvāsanādiniravakāśīkṛtadhanurvyāpārasyāpi kalatramātrarakṣaṇaprayojanamapi yaccāpamabhūttatsaṃprati tvayyarakṣitavyāpannāyāmeva niṣprayojanam, tathāpi ca taddhārayāmi /
GK16andhvc3u:166: priyaśabdasya pravṛttinimittaṃ yatpremanāma tadapyanaucityakalaṅkitamiti bālapriyā rāvaṇena hi śrīrāmasya purato māyāsītāśiraśchedaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:169: te ityasya pratyākhyānetyanena, kṛtamityanena ca sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:181: uccaiśiśaro dhatta iti prārthanāpratyākhyānena krodhāndhe kasmiṃścit kāmini śiraḥkartanāyodyukte sati śira unnataṃ karotītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:198: emea jaṇo tissā deu kavolopamāi sasibimbam /
GK16andhvc3u:199: paramatthaviāre uṇa cando cando via varāo //
GK16andhvc3u:202: yā niśā sarvabhūtānāṃ tasyāṃ jāgarti saṃyamī /
GK16andhvc3u:203: yasyāṃ jāgrati bhūtāni sā niśā paśyato muneḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:211: kapolopamāyāmiti nirvyājalāvaṇyasarvasvabhūtamukhamadhyavartipradhānabhūtakapolatalasyāpamāyāṃ pratyuta tadadhikavastukartavyaṃ tato dūranikṛṣṭaṃ śaśibimbaṃ kalaṅkavyājajihmīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:212: evaṃ yadyapi gaṅḍarikāpravāhapatito lokaḥ, tathāpi yadi parīkṣakāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:213: parīkṣante tadvarākaḥ kṛpaikabhājanaṃ yaścandra iti prasiddhaḥ sa candra eva kṣayitvavilāsaśūnyatvamalinatvadharmāntarasaṃkrānto yo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:216: evaṃ prathamabhedasya dvāvapi prakārau padaprakāśakatvenodāhṛtya vākyaprakāśakatvenodāharati---yā niśeti /
GK16andhvc3u:218: tena hyuktena na kaścidupadeśyaṃ pratyupadeśaḥ siddhyati /
GK16andhvc3u:230: kalaṅkavyājo yaḥ śaśaḥ tena jihmīkṛtaṃ malinīkṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:232: dvitīyacandrapadasya candrapadavācyatvena guṇaśūnyatvena vā rūpeṇa lakṣaṇātra bodhyā /
GK16andhvc3u:242: anena hi vākyena niśārtho na ca jāgaraṇārthaḥ kaścidvivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:245: tasyaivārthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasya vākyaprakāśatā yathā--- visamaio kāṇa vi kāṇa vi vālei abhiaṇimmāo /
GK16andhvc3u:246: kāṇa vi visāmiamao kāṇa vi avisāmao kālo //
GK16andhvc3u:249: iti chāyā ) locanam niśāyāṃ jāgaratavyamanyatra rātrivadāsitavyamiti kimanenoktena /
GK16andhvc3u:250: tasmādbādhitasvārthametadvākyaṃ saṃyamino lokottaratālakṣaṇena nimittena tatvadṛṣṭāvavadhānaṃ mithyādṛṣṭo ca parāṅmukhatvaṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:251: sarvaśabdārthasya cāpekṣikatayāpyupapadyamānateti na sarvaśabdārtānyathānupapatyāyāmartha ākṣipto mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:252: sarvoṣāṃ brahmādisthāvarāntānāṃ caturdaśānāmapi bhūtānāṃ yā niśā vyāmohajananītattvadṛṣṭiḥ tasyāṃ saṃyamī jāgarti kathaṃ prāpyeteti /
GK16andhvc3u:266: nanvatra nidrākālarūpaniśāpadārthe sarvabhūtasambandhānvaye sarvapadārthaghaṭakatayā saṃyamino 'pi tadanvayaḥ prāptaḥ, sa ca jāgartītyetadarthānvayino 'nupapannastasmādanenoktavyaṅgyasyāviṣkṛtatvānna
GK16andhvc3u:276: brahmāprājāpatyaindrapitryagāndharvayākṣarākṣasapaiśācabhedādaṣṭavidhandaivaṃ mānuṣamekavidhaṃ paśupakṣisarpakīṭasthāvarabhedātpañcavidhaṃ tairyagyonaṃ bhūtamiti caturdaśavidhānāmapi dehināmityarthaḥ yathoktaṃ sāṅkhyakārikāyāṃ “aṣṭavikalpo daiva” ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:280: locanam na tu viṣayavarjanamātrādeva saṃyamīti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:281: yadi vā sarvabhūtaniśāyāṃ mohinyāṃ jāgarti kathamiyaṃ heyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:282: yasyāṃ tu mithyādṛṣṭau sarvāṇi bhūtāni jāgrati atiśayena suprabuddharūpāṇi sā tasya rātriraprabodhaviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:286: anyastu na paśyata na ca manyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:288: evaṃ ca paśyata ityapi munerityapi ca na svārthamātravibhrāntam /
GK16andhvc3u:290: yattacchabdayośca na svatantrārthateti sarva evāyamākhyātasahāyaḥ padasamūho vyaṅgyaparaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:297: keṣāmapi mūḍhaprāyāṇāṃ dhārāprāptayogabhūmikārūḍhānāṃ vā aviṣābhṛtamayaḥ kālo 'tikrāmatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:300: na cātra suśaduḥkhasādhane tanmātraviśrānte, api tu svakartavyasukhaduḥkhaparyavasite /
GK16andhvc3u:301: na ca te sādhane sarvathā bālapriyā iyaṃ kathaṃ prāpyeteti matyā tatprāptyupāyamanutiṣṭhatītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:340: tanmātraviśrāntena atra hi vākye viṣāmṛtaśabdābhyāṃ duḥkhasukharūpasaṅkramitavācyābhyāṃ vyavahāra ityarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyasyā vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:341: vivakṣitābhidheyasyānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyasya śabdaśaktyudbhave prabhede padaprakāśatā yathā--- locanam na vivakṣite /
GK16andhvc3u:352: dhanairiti bahuvacanaṃ yo yenārthī tasya teneti sūcanārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:354: janasyeti bāhulyena hi loko dhanārthī, na tu guṇairupakārārthī /
GK16andhvc3u:362: na ca na vivakṣite vivakṣite eva /
GK16andhvc3u:367: nimbaṃ sukhasādhanaṃ kapitthamityevārthe vivakṣitaḥ, prakṛte tu kālaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:368: keṣāñcidduḥkhamayaḥ keṣāñcitsukhamayaścātikrāmatītyarthasya vivakṣitatayā viṣapadasya kiñcitsādhanakaduḥkhe amṛtapadasya kiñcitsādhanakasukhe ca lakṣaṇā duḥkhasukhayorviśeṣo vyaṅgyaḥ, sādhanatvena viṣāmṛtayorbhānādarthāntarasaṅkramitavācyatā ceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:370: ajñātaviśeṣadharmāvacchinnavācakasya keṣāmapīti śabdasya ca duṣkṛtināmityādyuktārthaviśeṣe saṅkrāntirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:379: dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ prātuṃ daivena na sṛṣṭo yadi nāmetyabhyupagame /
GK16andhvc3u:381: jaḍo 'haṃ pathi prasannāmbudharastaṭākaḥ athavā kūpaḥ kiṃ kasmāt /
GK16andhvc3u:390: 'asmi na sṛṣṭa' prātuṃ dhanairarthijanasya vāñchāṃ daivena sṛṣṭo yadi nāma nāsmi /
GK16andhvc3u:391: pathi prasannāmbudharastaḍāgaḥ kūpo 'thavā kiṃ na jaḍaḥ kṛto 'ham // 1 //
GK16andhvc3u:392: atra hi jaḍa iti padaṃ nirviṇṇena vakrātmasamānādhikaraṇatayā prayuktamanuraṇanarūpatayā kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ svaśaktyā pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:397: anyo hi tāvadavaśyaṃ kaścitsṛṣṭo na tvahamiti nirvedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:402: jaḍaḥ kiṅkartavyatāmūḍha ityarthaḥ, atha ca kūpo jaḍo 'rthitā kasya kīdṛśītyasambhavadviveka iti /
GK16andhvc3u:409: mahasya utsavasya āsamantātpralayo yatra tādṛśi śokakāraṇabhūte vṛtte dharaṇyā rājyadhurāyā dhāraṇāyāśvāsanāya tvaṃ śeṣaḥ śiṣyamāṇaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:410: itīyatā pūrṇe vākyārthe kalpāvasāne bhūpīṭhabhārodvahanakṣam eko bālapriyā ityanena gamyamarthamāha--anyo hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:423: vṛttau 'kūpasamānādhikaraṇatāṃ pratipadyata' ityanena jaḍapadasya kūpapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamevoktanna tu taṭākapadasāmānādhikaraṇyamapi,
GK16andhvc3u:439: atra hyasamarpitamapi kusumaśareṇa madhumāsalakṣmyā mukhaṃ gṛhītamityasamarpitamapītyetadavasthābhidhāyipadamarthaśaktyā kusumaśarasya balātkāraṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:440: atraiva prabhede vākyaprakāśatā yathodāhṛtaṃ prāk 'sajjehi surahimāso'
GK16andhvc3u:442: atra sajjayati surabhimāso na tāvadarpayatyanaṅgāya śarānityayaṃ vākyārthaḥ kaviprauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīro manmathonmāthakadanāvasthāṃ vasantasamayasya sūcayati /
GK16andhvc3u:445: mahārghaṇa utsavaprasareṇa manoharasurasya manmathadevasya āmodaścamatkāro yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:453: 'prauḍhoktimātraniṣpannaśarīraḥ sambhavī svataḥ' iti prācyakārikāyā iyataivodāhṛtatvaṃ bhavedityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:454: tatra padaprakāśatā yathā--- satyaṃ manoramāḥ kāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:457: bhūbhāretyādi, śeṣa' ityasya nāgarāja iti ca vivaraṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:470: vāṇiaa hattidantā kutto ahyāṇa bādhakittī a /
GK16andhvc3u:472: atra lulitālakamukhītyetatpadaṃ vyādhavadhvāḥ svataḥsambhāvitaśarīrārthaśaktyā suratakrīḍāsaktiṃ sūcayaṃstadīyasya bhartuḥ satatasambhogakṣāmatāṃ prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:473: locanam ityatra kavinā yo virāgī vaktā nibaddhastatprauḍhoktyā jīvitaśabdo 'rthaśaktimūlatayedaṃ dhvanayati---sarva evāmī kāmā vibhūtayaśca
GK16andhvc3u:475: tadeva ca jīvitaṃ prāṇadhāraṇarūpatvātprāṇavṛtteśca cāñcalyādanāsthāpadamiti viṣayeṣu varākeṣu kiṃ doṣoddhoṣaṇadaurjanyena nijameva jīvitamupālabhyam, tadapi ca nisargacañcalamiti na sāparādhamityetāvatā gāḍhaṃ vairāgyamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:481: atra luliteti savarūpamātreṇa viśeṣaṇamavaliptatayā cahastidantādyapāharaṇaṃ sambhāvyamiti vākyārthasya tāvatyeva na kācidanupapattiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:482: bālapriyā kāmāḥ kāmyamānā vanitādayaḥ tadabhāve jīvitābhāve /
GK16andhvc3u:494: lulitāḥ itastato vikīrṇā alakā yatra tathāvidhaṃ mukhaṃ yasyāssā /
GK16andhvc3u:499: svatassambhāvitaṃ loke 'pyaucityātsambhāvyamānaṃ śarīraṃ ysaya tathāvidhasyārthasya śaktyā sāmarthyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:513: anenāpi vākyena vyādhavadhvā śikhipicchakarṇapūrāyā navapariṇītāyāḥ kasyāścitsaubhāgyātiśayaḥ prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:514: tatsambhogaikaratho mayūramātramāraṇasamarthaḥ patirjātaṃ ityarthaprakāśanāt tadanyāsāṃ cirapariṇītānāṃ muktāphalaracitaprasādhanānāṃ daurbhāgyātiśayaḥ khyāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:515: tatsambhogakāle sa eva vyādhaḥ karivaravadhavyāpārasamartha āsīdityarthaprakāśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:516: nanu dhvaniḥ kāvyaviśeṣa ityuktaṃ katkathaṃ tasya padaprakāśatā /
GK16andhvc3u:527: avācakatvāditi yaduktaṃ so 'yamaprayojako heturiti chalena tāvaddarśayati--syādeṣa doṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:528: evaṃ chalena parihṛtya bālapriyā hastidantāderapāharaṇamanāharaṇaṃ dantādyanāharaṇamiti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:533: 'avavakṣitavācyasye'tyādikārikāyāṃ samudāyasyaiva dhvanipadārthavādatra pakṣa eva codyasyopapatteśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:550: tadaistattadarthāḥ smāryante, smṛtāste tvākāṅgakṣādasahakṛtā vākyārthamanubhāvayantīti mate padasmāritatvarūpaṃ padaprakāśatvaṃ tattadartha eva vartate /
GK16andhvc3u:551: tatra ca kāvyaviśeṣatvarūpaṃ dhvanitvannāstītyato dhvaneḥ na
GK16andhvc3u:553: anena granthena padanna dhvaniprakāśakamavācakatvādityarthaḥ phalita ityabhipretya 'syādeṣadoṣa'
GK16andhvc3u:558: kiṃ ca kāvyānāṃ śarīrāṇāmiva saṃsthānavaśeṣāvacchinnasamudāyasādhyāpi cārutvapratītiranvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu kalpyata iti padānāmapi vyañjakatvamukhena vyavasthito dhvanivyavahāro na virodhi locanam vastuvṛttenāpi pariharati---kiṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:559: yadi paro brūyāt---na mayā avācakatvaṃ dhvanyabhāve hetūkṛtaṃ kiṃ tūktaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:561: kāvyaṃ cānākāṅkṣapratipattikāri vākyaṃ na padamiti tatrāha--satyamevaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:563: api tu samudāya eva ; tathā ca padaprakāśo dhvaniriti prakāśapadenoktam.
GK16andhvc3u:564: nanu padasya tatra tathāvithaṃ sāmarthyamiti kuto 'khaṇḍa eva pratītikrama ityāśaṅkyāha--kāvyānāmiti
GK16andhvc3u:566: nanu bhāgeṣu padarūpeṣu kathaṃ sā cārutvapratītirāropayituṃ śakyā? tāni hi smārakāṇyeva
GK16andhvc3u:567: tataḥ kim? manohārivyaṅgyārthasmārakatvāddhi cārutvapratītinibandhanatvaṃ kena bālapriyā asādhaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:572: nanu vastuvṛttena parihāraḥ kimartha ityataḥ kāvyānāmityādigranthamavatārayiṣyan bhūmikāmāha--yadi para ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:577: kāvyaviśeṣo dhvaniḥ kāvyañca tathāvidhaṃ vākyamiti vākyameva dhvaniḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:579: tathāca pade dhvanyabhāve avākyatvaṃ heturiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:597: saṃsthānaviśeṣaiḥ śabdasandarbhaviśeṣaiḥ mukhādyavayavasaṃyogaviśeṣaiśca avacchinno viśiṣṭo yassamudāyastatsādhyāpītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:614: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // DhvK_3.2 //
GK16andhvc3u:616: vākye saṅghaṭanāyāṃ ca sa prabandhe 'pi dīpyate // 2 //
GK16andhvc3u:618: yathā śrutiduṣṭānāṃ pelavādipadānāmasabhyapelādyarthaṃ prati na vācakatvam
GK16andhvc3u:621: tacca śrutiduṣṭatvamanvayavyatirekābhyāṃ bhāgeṣu vyavasthāpyate tathā prakṛte 'pīti tadāha--aniṣṭasyeti
GK16andhvc3u:625: evaṃ dṛṣṭāntamabhidhāya pādatrayeṇa turyeṇa dārṣṭāntikārtha uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:627: yata eva miṣṭasmṛtiścārutvamāvaiti tena hetunā sarveṣu prakāreṣu nirūpitasya padamātrāvabhāsino 'pi padaprakāśasyāpi dhvane ramyatāsti
GK16andhvc3u:652: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.3 //
GK16andhvc3u:653: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:654: tadā taṃ dīpayanty eva te na varṇā rasa-cyutaḥ // DhvK_3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:656: virodhinaḥ syuḥ śṛṅgāre tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 3 //
GK16andhvc3u:657: ta eva tu niveśyante bībhatsādau rase yadā /
GK16andhvc3u:658: tadā taṃ dīpayantyeva tena varṇā rasacyutaḥ // 4 //
GK16andhvc3u:669: yataste varṇā bhūyasā prayujyamānā na rasāṃścyotanti sravanti /
GK16andhvc3u:670: yadi vā tena śṛṅgāravirodhitvena hetunāvarṇāḥ śaṣādayo rasācchṛṅgārāccyavante taṃ na vyañjayantīti vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:695: rasaścyuta iti pāṭhe te na iti padadvayamityāśayena vyācaṣṭe---te varṇā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:699: rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu tenetyekaṃ padamityāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:700: tenetyasya vyākhyānam---śṛṅgāretyādi, rasāccyavanta ityasya taṃ na vyañjayantīti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:702: śaṣāvityādiślokena śakārādivarṇasatve śṛṅgārāvyaktyabhāvarūpo vyatarekaḥ pradarśita ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:706: cālakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya dyotanaṃ yathā--- utkampinī bhayaparaskhalitāṃśukāntā te locane pratidiśaṃ vidhure kṣipantī /
GK16andhvc3u:707: krūreṇa dāruṇatayā sahasaiva dagdhā dhūmāndhitena dahanena na vīkṣitāsi //
GK16andhvc3u:710: asminviṣaye śṛṅgāralakṣaṇe śaṣādiprayogaḥ sukavitvamabhivāñchatā na kartavya ityevaṃphalatvādupadeśasya kārakākāreṇa pūrvaṃ vyatireka uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:711: na ca sarvathā na kartavyo 'pi tu bībhatsādau kartavya eveti paścādanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:712: vṛttikāreṇa tvanvayapūrvako vyatireka iti śailīmanusartumanvayaḥ pūrvamupāttaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:715: tena varṇānāmapi śrutisamayopalakṣyamāṇārthānapekṣyapi śrotraikagrāhyo mṛduparuṣātmā bālapriyā pāṭhe tenetyekaṃ padaṃ, rasacyuta iti pāṭhe tu te neti tadadvayamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:717: ślokābhāyāmiti nirdeśe dvābhyāṃ ślokābhyāṃ pratapāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya
GK16andhvc3u:719: ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyā yathāsaṅkhyamanvayasya prasaktirbhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:720: ślekadvayeneti nirdeśe tu ślokātmakadvyavayavaghaṭitasamudāyena pratipāditau yāvanvayavyatirekau tābhyāmityarthasya pratītyāna tatprasaktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:728: śrutiḥ śravaṇaṃ yeṣāntaiḥ śabdaiḥ samarpyamāṇā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:734: atra hi te ityetatpadaṃ rasamayatvena sphuṭamevāvabhāsate sahṛdayānām /
GK16andhvc3u:735: padāvayavena dyotanaṃ yathā--- vriḍāyogānnatavadanayā sannadhāne gurūṇāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:738: ata eva ca sahakāratāmevābhidhātuṃ nimittasaptamī kṛtā varṇapadādiṣviti /
GK16andhvc3u:739: na tu varṇareva rasābhivyaktiḥ, vibhāvādisaṃyogāddhi rasaniṣpattirityuktaṃ bahuśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:740: śrotraikagrāhyo 'pi ca svabhāvo rasaniṣyande vyāpriyata eva,
GK16andhvc3u:745: te vibhavādayo yadā viśiṣṭena kenāpi padenārpyamāmā rasacamatkāravidhāyino bhavanti tadā padasyaivāsau mahimā samarpyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:748: tatra ca śoko nāmeṣṭajanavināśaprabhava iti tasya janasya ye bhrūkṣepakaṭākṣaprabhṛtayaḥ pūrvaṃ rativibhāvatāmavalambante sma ta evātyantavinaṣṭāḥ santa idānīṃ smṛtigocaratayā nirapekṣabhāvatvaprāṇaṃ karuṇamuddīpayantīti sthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:781: tallocanagatatathāvidhaguṇagaṇaṃ buddhau kṛtvā rasāviṣṭena vaktrā te
GK16andhvc3u:782: ityuktam, sa evārthaḥ pratipattrāpi parāmṛśyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:784: yatra hyanuddiśyamānadharmāntarasāhityayogyadharmayogitvaṃ vastuno yacchabdenābhidhāya tadbuddhisthadharmāntarasāhityaṃ tacchabdena nirvācyate /
GK16andhvc3u:787: ghaṭa' ityādau yathā, tatra kā parāmarśakatvakathetyāstāmalīkaparāmarśakaiḥ paṇḍitammanyaiḥ saha vivādena
GK16andhvc3u:790: te iti sātiśayavibhramaikāyatanarūpe apa locane vidhure kāndiśīkatayā nirlakṣe kṣipantī kastrātā kvāsāvāryaputra iti tayorlocanayostādṛśīcāvastheti sutarāṃ śokoddīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:793: kiṃ kurutāṃ tathāpi ca dhūmenāndhīkṛto draṣṭumasamartha iti na tu savivekasyedṛśānucitakāritvaṃ sambhāvyate, iti smaryamāṇaṃ tadīyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:799: yatra yo vidvān sa pūjya ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:801: tathāvidhaṃ yaddharmāntaraṃ pūjyatvādikaṃ tatsāhityasya yogyaḥ prayojako yo dharmo vidvattvādiḥ tadyogitvaṃ tatsambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:804: tadbuddhisthañca yaddharmāntaraṃ viddhattvādakaṃ tasya sāhityaṃ sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:835: dhūmāndhiteneti dahanasya viśeṣaṇaṃ, tacca hetugarbhamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:838: te iti tiṣṭhetyuktaṃ kimiva na tayā yatsamutsṛjya bāṣpaṃ mathyāsaktaścakitahariṇīhārinetratribhāgaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:841: tatra śuddhasyodāharamaṃ yathā rāmābhyudaye---'kṛtakakupitaiḥ' ityādi locanam tribhāgaśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:842: gurujanamavadhīryāpi sā māṃ yatā tathāpi sābhilāṣamanyudainyagarvamantharaṃ vilokitavatītyevaṃ smaraṇena parasparahetukatvaprāṇapravāsavipralambhoddīpanaṃ tribhāgaśabdasannidhau sphuṭaṃ bhātīti /
GK16andhvc3u:847: tena varṇādīnāṃ nimittatvamātrameva, vākyaṃ tu dhvaneralakṣyakramasya na nimittatāmātreṇa varṇādivadupakāri, kiṃ tu samagravibhāvādapratipattivyāpṛtatvādrasādimayameva tannirbhāsata iti
GK16andhvc3u:849: vṛttau 'jhaṭiti kanake'tyādyudāharaṇāntaraṃ prakṣiptamata eva na vivṛtaṃ locane /
GK16andhvc3u:850: pravāsodyatamātmānaṃ gurujanasannidhāne dṛṣṭavatyāḥ prayāyā darśanaprakāraṃ kaścit syayaṃ parāmṛśati ; yadvā--snigdhaṃ prati
GK16andhvc3u:853: kucakalaśayoḥ baddhaḥ kṛta utkampaḥ yena tam /
GK16andhvc3u:855: tvaṃ tiṣṭeti māṃ prati na uktaṃ kimiva, uktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:856: yadyataḥ tayā bāṣpaṃ samutsṛjya cakitahariṇova cakitahariṇīnetramiva hāri,
GK16andhvc3u:857: yadvā--cakitahariṇyā hāri yannetraṃ tasya tribhāgaḥ tṛtīyo bhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:883: etaddhi vākyaṃ parasparānurāgaṃ paripoṣaprāptaṃ pradarśayatsarvata eva paraṃ rasatattvaṃ prakāśayati
GK16andhvc3u:885: locanam rikāyāṃ na nimittasaptamīmātram, api tvananyatra bhāvaviṣayārthamapīti /
GK16andhvc3u:887: kṛtakakupitaibāṣpāmbhobhiḥ sadainyavilokitair- vanamapi gatā yasya prītyā dhṛtāpi tathāmbayā
GK16andhvc3u:888: navajaladharaśyāmāḥ paśyandiśo bhavatīṃ vinā kaṭhinahṛdayo jīvatyeva priye sa tava priyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:889: atra tathā taistaiḥ prakārairmātrā dhṛtāpītyanurāgaparavaśatvena guruvacanollaṅghanamapi tvayā kṛtamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:890: priye priya iti parasparajīvitasarvasvābhimānātmako ratisthāyibhāva uktaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:898: tadapi likhitaprakhyairaṅgaiḥ parasparamunmukhā nayananalinīnālānītaṃ pibanti rasaṃ priyāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:902: ananyatrabhāvaḥ tadanyatra sambhavābhāvaḥ, tadrūpo yo viṣayasya artho yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:924: alakṣyakramavyaṅgyaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ bhāsate dhvanirityuktaṃ tatra saṅghaṭanāsvarūpameva tāvannirūpyete---
GK16andhvc3u:931: smara eva navanadīpūraḥ prāvṛṣeṇyapravāhaḥ sarabhasameva pravṛddhatvāt tenoḍhāḥ parasparasāṃmukhyamabuddhipūrvameva nītāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:932: anantaraṃ guravaḥ śvaśrūprabhṛtaya eva setavaḥ, icchāprasararodhakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:933: ata ca guravo 'laṅdhyāḥ setavastaiḥ vidhṛtāḥ pratihatecchāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:935: tathāpi parasparonmukhatālakṣaṇenānyonyatādātmyena svadehe sakalavṛttinirodhāllikhitaprāyairaṅgairnayanānyeva nalinīnālāni tairānītaṃ rasaṃ parasparābhilāṣalakṣaṇamāsvādayanti parasparābhilāṣātmakadṛṣṭicchaṭāmiśrīkārayuktyāpi kālamativāhayantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:936: nanu nātra rūpakaṃ nirvayūḍhaṃ haṃsacakravākādirūpeṇa nāyakayugalasyārūpitatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:942: saṅghaṭanāyāmiti bāve pratyayaḥ, varṇādivacca nimittamātre saptamī /
GK16andhvc3u:958: parasparābhilāṣātmakānāṃ parasparābhilāṣaṃ prakāśayantīnāṃ dṛṣṭicchaṭānāṃ yo miśrīkārastasya yuktyā yojanayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:969: guṇān āśritya tiṣṭhantī mādhuryādīn vyanakti sā /
GK16andhvc3u:972: rasān--- sā saṅghaṭanā rasādīn vyanakti guṇānāśritya tiṣṭhantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:973: atra ca vikalpyaṃ guṇānāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāścaikyaṃ vyatireko vā /
GK16andhvc3u:975: guṇāśrayā saṅghaṭanā, saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:976: tatraikyapakṣe saṅghaṭanāśrayaguṇapakṣe ca guṇānātmabhūtānādeyabhūtānvāśrityatiṣṭhantī saṅghaṭanā locanam kārikāyāṃ dvitīyārdhasyādyaṃ padam. 'rasāṃstanniyame heturaucityaṃ vaktṛvācyayoḥ'
GK16andhvc3u:981: vikalpenedamarthajātaṃ kalpayituṃ vyākhyātuṃ śakyam kiṃ tadityāha--guṇānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:982: trayaḥ pakṣā ye sambhāvyante te vyākhyātuṃ śakyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:985: svabhāvasya kalpanayā pratapādanārthaṃ pradarśitabedasya svāśrayavācoyuktirdṛśyate śiśapāśrayaṃ vṛkṣatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:987: saṅghaṭanāyā dharmā guṇā iti bhaṭṭodbhaṭādayaḥ, dharmāśca dharmyāśritā iti
GK16andhvc3u:999: vikalpyamityasya vikalpena kalpyamiti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1024: yadā tu nānātvapakṣe gumāśrayasaṅghaṭanāpakṣaḥ tadā gumānāśritya tiṣṭhantī gumaparatantrasvabhāvā na tu guṇarūpaivetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1025: kiṃ punarevaṃ vikalpanasya prayojanamiti? abhidhīyate---yadi gumāḥ saṅghaṭānā cetyekaṃ tattvaṃ saṅghaṭanāśrayā vā guṇāḥ, tadā saṅghaṭanāyā iva gumānāmaniyataviṣayatvaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1028: mādhuryaprasādau rasabhāvatadābhāsaviṣayāveveti viṣayaniyamo locanam prasiddho mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1032: tena rājāśrayaḥ prakṛtivarga ityatra yathā rājāśrayaucityenāmātyādiprakṛtaya ityayamarthaḥ, evaṃ guṇeṣu paratantrasvabhāvā tadāyattā tanmukhaprekṣiṇī saṅghaṭanetyayamartho labhyataiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1034: prathamapakṣe tādātmyena samānayogakṣematvāditaratra tu dharmatveneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1038: sa bālapriyā dṛśyata ityanena sambandhaḥ, vṛkṣatvaśiṃśapayoraikye 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:1039: bhedakalpanayā śiṃśapāyā vṛkṣatvāśrayatvakathanaṃ yathā, tathā prakṛte 'pīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1075: tathā hi śṛṅgāre 'pi dīrghasamāsā dṛśyate raudrādiṣvasamāsā ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:1081: yathā--'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti svabhujagurumatadaḥ' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:1082: tasmānna saṅghaṭanāsvarūpāḥ, na ca saṅghaṭanāśrayā guṇāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1083: nanu yadi saṅghaṭanā guṇānāṃ nāśrayastatkimālambanā ete parikalpyantām /
GK16andhvc3u:1095: śabdārthālambanatve hi tadalaṅkārebhyaḥ ko viśeṣa ityuktaṃ cirantanairiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1098: bālapriyā sa vighaṭata ityatra tatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yo 'yamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1100: śṛṅgārādāvasamāsaiva saṅghaṭanā, raudrādau dīrghasamāsaiveti niyama iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1108: anavarataṃ yannayanajalalavanipatanaṃ tena parimuṣitā apahṛtā patralekhā yasmiṃstat /
GK16andhvc3u:1125: athavā bhavantu śabdāśrayā eva guṇāḥ, na caiṣāmanuprāsāditulyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1129: nanu yadi śabdāśrayā guṇāstatsaṅghaṭanārūpatvaṃ tadāśrayatvaṃ vā teṣāṃ prāptameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1130: na hyasaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā arthaviśeṣapratipādyarasādyāśritānāṃ guṇānāmavācakatvādāśrayā bhavanti
GK16andhvc3u:1134: na cāyaṃ mama sthitaḥ pakṣaḥ, api tu bhavatveṣāmavivekināmabhiprāyeṇāpi
GK16andhvc3u:1144: atha saṅghaṭanā na vyatiriktā kācit, api tu saṅghaṭitā eva bālapriyā aikyaprasaṅgāditi
GK16andhvc3u:1148: saṃyogarūpakāryasya dvayorutpatyā svasmin yasya saṃyogo jāyate taṃ prati tasyāpekṣāstītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1155: ayaṃ sthitaḥ mama pakṣo neti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1174: nanu śabdadharmatvaṃ śabdaikātmakatvaṃ vā tāvatāstu, kimayaṃ madhye saṅghaṭanānupraveśa ityāśaṅkya sa eva pūrvapakṣavādyāha---na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:1175: arthaviśeṣairna tu padāntaranirapekṣaśuddhapadavācyaiḥ sāmānyaiḥ pratipādyā vyaṅgyā ye rasabhāvatadābhāsatatpraśamāstadāśritānāṃ mukhyatayā tanniṣṭhānāṃ guṇānāmasaṅghaṭitāḥ śabdā āśrayā na bhavantyupacāreṇāpīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1179: varṇavyaṅgyo hi yāvadrasa uktastāvadavācakasyāpi padasya śravaṇamātrāvaseyena svasaubhāgyena varṇavadeva yadrasābhivyaktihetutvaṃ sphuṭameva lakṣyata iti tadeva mādhuryādīti kiṃ saṅghaṭanayā? tathā ca padavyaṅgyo yāvaddhvaniruktastāvacchuddhasyāpi padasya
GK16andhvc3u:1180: svārthasmārakatvenāpi rasābhivyaktiyogyārthavabhāsakatvameva mādhuryādīti tatrāpi kaḥ saṅghaṭanāyā upayogaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1185: viśiṣṭā yā śabdāntarasaṅghaṭanā tathaiva labhyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1221: abhyupagate vā vākyavyaṅgyatve rasādīnāṃ na niyatā kācitsaṅghaṭanā teṣāmāśrayatvaṃ pratipadyata ityaniyatasaṅghaṭanāḥ śabdā evaṃ guṇānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśeṣānugatā āśrayāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1222: nanu mādhurye yadi nāmaivamucyate taducyatām ; ojasaḥ punaḥ kathamaniyatasaṅghaṭanaśabdāśrayatvam
GK16andhvc3u:1223: na hyasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadācidojasa āśrayatāṃ pratapadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:1225: yadi na prasiddhimātragrahadūṣitaṃ cetastadatrāpi na na brūmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1227: yato raudrādīn hi prakāśayataḥ kāvyasya dīptiroja iti prākpratipādatam /
GK16andhvc3u:1228: taccaujo yadyasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ syāttatko doṣo bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:1229: na locanam nanu vākyavyaṅgye dhvanau tarhyavaśyamanupraveṣṭavyaṃ saṅghaṭanayā svasaundarya vācyasaundaryaṃ v, tayā vinā kuta
GK16andhvc3u:1232: etaduktaṃ bhavati--anupraviśa tatra saṅghaṭanā, na hi tasyāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1234: kiṃ tu mādhuryasya na niyatā saṅghaṭanā āśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā tayā vinā varṇapadavyaṅgye rasādau bhāvrānmādhuryādeḥ vākyavyaṅgye 'pi tādṛśīṃ saṅghaṭanāṃ vihāyāpi vākyasya tadrasavyañjakatvātsaṅghaṭanā sannihitāpi
GK16andhvc3u:1236: tasmādaupacārikatve 'pi śabdāśrayā eva guṇā ityupasaṃharati--śabdā eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:1250: niyatā saṅghaṭanā māduryasyāśrayo vā svarūpaṃ vā netyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1274: teṣāṃ tu cakṣurādīnāmiva yathāsvaṃ viṣayaniyamitasya svarūpasya na kadācidyvabhicāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1276: na ca saṅghaṭanāmāśritā guṇā ityekaṃ darśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1283: kathamacārutvaṃ tādṛśe viṣaye sahṛdayānāṃ nāvabhātīti cet?
GK16andhvc3u:1291: ' locanam vayaṃ tu bramaḥ--varṇapadavyaṅgye 'pyojasi raudrādisvabhāve varṇapadānāmekākināṃ svasaundaryamapi na tādṛgunmīlati tādyāvattāni
GK16andhvc3u:1292: saṅghaṭanāṅkitāni na kṛtānīti sāmānyenaivāyaṃ pūrvapakṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1297: yasmāt 'yoyaḥ śastraṃ' ityādau nācārutvaṃ pratibhāvati tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1300: 'śṛṅgāra eva paramo manaḥprahlādano rasaḥ' ityādinā ca viṣayaniyama ukta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1324: evamādau ca viṣaye yathaucityātyāgastathā locanam rasābhivyaktāvetadeva sāmarthyaṃ śabdānāṃ yattathā tathā saṅghaṭamānatvamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1330: uttamadevatāsaṃbhogaparāmarśe ca pitṛsaṃbhoga iva lajjātaṅkādinā kaścamatkārāvakāśa ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1332: saṃbhogo 'pi hyasau varṇitastathā pratibhānavatā kavinā yathā tatraiva
GK16andhvc3u:1333: viśrāntaṃ hṛdayaṃ paurvāparyaparāmarśaṃ kartuṃ na dadāti yathā nirvyājaparākramasya puruṣasyāviṣaye 'pi yudhyamānasya tāvattasminnavasare sādhuvādo vitīryate na tu paurvāparyaparāmarśe bālapriyā 'viṣaye'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:1343: atassaṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti bhāvārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1352: tasya varṇanīyasya upayogīni yāni vastūni teṣāṃ paurvāparyeṇa yaḥ parāmarśastatra kauśalaṃ sāmarthyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1377: nanvevaṃ darśayiṣyata iti vaktavyaṃ na tu darśitamitītyata āha locane--
GK16andhvc3u:1380: tathā hi śaktirahatena kavinā evaṃvide viṣaye śṛṅgāra upanibadhyamānaḥ sphuṭameva doṣatvena pratabhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:1381: nanvasmin pakṣe 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau kimacārutvam?
GK16andhvc3u:1383: tasmādguṇavyatiriktatve guṇarūpatve ca saṅghaṭanāyā anyaḥ kaścinniyamaheturvaktavya ityucyate
GK16andhvc3u:1386: tatra vaktā kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā, kavinibaddhaścāpirasabhāvarahito rasabhāvasamanvito vā, raso 'pi kathānāyakāśrayastadvipakṣāśrayo vā,
GK16andhvc3u:1395: vyatirekapakṣe hi saṅghaṭanāyā niyamahetureva nāsti aikyapakṣe 'pi na raso niyamaheturityanyo vaktavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1397: kathāṃ nayati svakartavyāṅgabhāvamiti kathānāyako yo nirvahaṇe phalabhāgī
GK16andhvc3u:1401: dānadharmavīraśāntapradhāno dhīrapraśānta iti catvāro nāyakāḥ krameṇa sātvatyārabhaṭīkaiśikībhāratīlakṣaṇavṛttipradhānāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1407: kārikāvacanasya niṣpannatvāt bhūtanirdeśa upapanna iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1412: saṅghaṭanārūpā eva guṇā iti pakṣa ityarthaḥṛ /
GK16andhvc3u:1419: guṇānāṃ viṣayaniyama evoktaḥ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ niyamahetuḥ ko 'pi nokta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1435: rasābhāsāṅgaṃ vā, abhineyārthamanabhineyārthaṃ vā, uttamaprakṛtyāśrayaṃ taditarāśrayaṃ veti bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvc3u:1436: tatra yadā kavirapagatarasabhāvo vaktā tadā racanāyāḥ locanam dhvanyātāmā dhvanisvabhāvo yo rasastasyāṅgaṃ vyañjakamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1438: vyaṅgyarūpo dhvanisvabhāvo yasya tadabhineyārthaṃ vācyaṃ, sa eva hi
GK16andhvc3u:1441: yadāha muniḥ--'vāgaṅgasattvopetātkāvyārthān bhāvayanti' ityādi tatra tatra
GK16andhvc3u:1451: pradhānarasānuyāyyeva, tathāpi tāvati bālapriyā sātvatyādivṛttīnāṃ lakṣaṇānyanyatra draṣṭavyāni
GK16andhvc3u:1464: kāvyenārthya iti vyutpatyā kāvyārthaśabdo vyaṅgyarasādivācīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1472: artho yasyeti vigrahe yatpadārthasya vācyasya arthapadārthasya caikyāt
GK16andhvc3u:1473: 'rāhośiśara' ityādāviva vyapadeśivadbhāvena bhedavivakṣyā ṣaṣṭhīti vyākhyāta iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1474: kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahita ityasyārtha pradarśya tatrānupapattimāśaṅkya pariharati---rasabhāvahīna ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1481: yadāpi kavinibaddho vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā sa eva ; yadā tu kaviḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1482: kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvasamanvito rasaśca pradhānāśritatvāddhvanyātmabhūtastadā niyamenaiva tatrāsamāsāmadhyasamāse eva saṅghaṭane /
GK16andhvc3u:1485: raso yadā prādhānyena pritapādyastadā tatpratītau vyavadhāyakā virodhinaśca sarvātmanaiva parihāryāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1486: evaṃ ca dīrghasamāsāsaṅghaṭanāsamāsānāmanekaprakārasambhāvanayā kadācidrasaptatītiṃ vyavadadhātīti tasyāṃ nātyantamabhiniveśaḥ locanam rasādihīna ityuktam. sa eveti kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1487: evaṃ śuddhavaktraucityaṃ vicārya vācaucityena saha tadevāha---yadā tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:1489: anyathā 'sa eva vītarāgaścet' iti sthityā nīrasameva kāvyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1492: niyamena rasabhāvasanvito vaktā na tu kathañcidapi taṭasthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1493: rasaśca dhvanyātmabhūta eva na tu rasavadalaṅkāraprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1494: tadāsamāsāmadhyasamāse eva saghaṅṭane, anyathā tu dīrghasamāsāpītyevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1502: tadāsvāde ye vyavadhāyakā asvādavighnarūpāvirodhinaśca tadviparītāsvādamayā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1504: anekaprakāraḥ sambhāvyate saṅghaṭanā tu sambhāvanāyāṃ prayoktrīti bālapriyā bhāvyamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1511: yadā tu kavirityādinā kadācidrasabhāvarahitatvaṃ kaverbhavatīti gamyate
GK16andhvc3u:1515: 'tadā niyamenaiva samāse eva' ityatra niyameneti padamevakāradvayañca
GK16andhvc3u:1532: abhineyārthe kāvye tasthāmatyantamabhiniveśo viśeṣato na śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1533: viśeṣato 'bhineyārthe kāvye, tato 'nyatra ca viśeṣataḥ karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārayoḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1536: rasāntare punaḥ pratipādye raudrādau madhyamasamāsā saṅghaṭanā kadāciddhīroddhatanāyakasambandhavyāpārāśrayeṇa dīrghasamāsāpi vā tadākṣepāvinābhāvirasocitavācyāpekṣayā na viguṇā bhavatīti sāpi nātyantaṃ parihāryā /
GK16andhvc3u:1537: sarvāsu ca saṅghaṭanāsu prasādākhyo guṇo vyāpī /
GK16andhvc3u:1540: atruṭitena vyaṅgyena tāvatsamāsārthābhinayo na śakyaḥ kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:1542: tatra duṣprayojā bahutarasandehaprasarā ca tatra pratipattirna nāṭye
GK16andhvc3u:1549: tasyā dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāyāḥ ya ākṣepastena vinā yo na bhavati vyaṅgyābhivyañjakastādṛśo rasocito rasavyañjakatayopādīyamāno vācyastasya yāsāvapekṣā dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāṃ prati sā avaiguṇye hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1550: nāyakasyākṣepo vyāpāra iti yadvyākhyātaṃ tanna śliṣyatīvetyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:1552: yā kācitsaṅghaṭanā sā tathā kartavyā, yathā vācye jhaṭiti bhavati pratītiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:1558: tatreti prativākyaṃ yojyaṃ, dīrghasamāsāyāṃ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ satyāmiti
GK16andhvc3u:1560: atruṭitena vyaṅgyena kartuṃ na śakyaḥ, kintu vyaṅgyārthatroṭanaṃ kṛtvaiva
GK16andhvc3u:1566: tatra bahutarasandehaprasarā pratipattiśca syāt. sā nāṭye na anurūpā ca iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:1576: raudrādaurasāntare punaḥ pratipādye madhyamasamāsāsaṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavata kadāciddīrghasamāsāpi vā saṅghaṭanā viguṇā na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1583: prasādātikramaṃ hyasamāsāpi saṅghaṭanā karuṇavipralambhaśṛṅgārau na vyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:1584: tadaparityāge ca madhyamasamāsāpi na na prakāśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1586: ata eva ca 'yo yaḥ śastraṃ bibharti' ityādau yadyojasaḥ sthitiraneṣyate
GK16andhvc3u:1589: tasmādguṇāvyatiriktatve guṇavyatiriktatve vā saṅghaṭanāyā yathoktādaucityādviṣayaniyamo 'stīti tasyā api rasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:1590: tasyāśca rasābhivyaktinimittabhūtāyā yo 'yamanantarokto niyamahetuḥ sa eva
GK16andhvc3u:1591: guṇānāṃ niyato viṣaya iti guṇāśrayeṇa vyavasthānamapyaviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:1599: prasādenaiva sa rasaḥ prakāśitaḥ na na prakāśita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1601: yadi guṇāḥ saṅghaṭanaikarūpāstathāpi guṇāniyama eva saṅghaṭanāyā niyamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1603: saṅghaṭanāśrayaguṇapakṣe 'pi saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakatvena yadvaktṛvācyaucityaṃ bālapriyā yo vācyo vyaṅgyābhivyañjako na bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1604: svasvavācakaśabdānāṃ dīrghasamāsasaṅghaṭanāṅkitatve satyeva vācyārthā vyañjakā bhavantīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1618: tadaparityāge na na prakāśayatītyanenānvayaḥ, prasādātikrama ityādinā vyatirekaścokta ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1623: śṛṅgārādāvojaso raudrādau mādhuryasya ca samāveśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1627: viṣayāśrayam apy anyad aucityaṃ tāṃ niyacchati /
GK16andhvc3u:1628: kāvya-prabhedāśrayataḥ sthitā bhedavatī hi sā // DhvK_3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1634: paryāyabandhaḥ parikathā khaṇḍakathā sakalakathe sargabandho 'bhineyārthamākhyāyikākathe ityevamādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1635: tadāśrayeṇāpi locanam hetutvenoktaṃ tadguṇānāmapi niyamaheturiti pakṣatraye 'pi na kaścidvaplava iti tātparyam // 5//
GK16andhvc3u:1640: muktakaṃ tu viṣayaśabdena yaduktaṃ tatsaṅghātābhāvena svātantryamātraṃ pradarśayituṃ svapratiṣṭhitamākāśamiti yathā /
GK16andhvc3u:1642: tāratamyabhedamātravyāptam, na tu viṣayaucityena vaktṛvācyaucityaṃ nivāryata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1645: tena svatantratayā parisamāptanirākāṅkṣārthamapi prabandhamadhyavarti na muktakamityucyate
GK16andhvc3u:1648: senādyātmako yassaṅghātaḥ samudāyaḥ tatra niveśī niviṣṭaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1657: nanvevaṃ muktakasyaikapadyātmakasya saṅghātarūpatvābhāvāt vṛttau tasya kāvyaprabhedatvena kathanaṃ kimarthamityata āha---muktakantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1661: muktakasyāpi rasasyanditvātsaṅghaṭanāniyamane svātantryamastītyetāvanmātraṃ pradarśayituṃ muktakamapi kāvyaprabhedatvenoktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1663: pṛthivyādīnāñcaturṇāmākāśe pratiṣṭhitatvamityuktāvākāśasya kutra pratiṣṭheti praśne prativākyamidamākāśaṃ svasminnākāśe pratiṣṭhitamiti brahma brahmaṇīva ākāśamākāśa eva pratiṣṭhitannānyatretyarthaḥ yathaitadvacanamākāśasya svātantryapradarśakamātraṃ tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1681: iti kriyāsamāptikṛtā bhedā iti dvandvena nirdiṣṭāḥ avāntarakriyāsamāptāvapi vasantavarṇanādarekarṇanīyoddeśena pravṛttaḥ paryāyabandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1687: mahākāvyarūpaḥ puruṣārthaphalaḥ samastavastuvarṇanāprabandhaḥ sargabandhaḥ saṃskṛta eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1705: sandānitaketyādinā tu vipariṇāmena tatpadaṃ yojyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1706: etena pūrveṣāntu muktakādīnāṃ bhāṣāyāmaniyama iti bakṣyamāṇasya nāsaṅgatiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1727: yathā hyamarukasya kavermuktakāḥ śṛṅgārarasasyandinaḥ prabandhāyamānāḥ prasiddhā eva /
GK16andhvc3u:1731: kadācidarthaucityāśrayeṇa dīrghasamāsāyāmapi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ paruṣā grāmyā ca vṛttiḥ parihartavyā
GK16andhvc3u:1735: sargabandhetu locanam nanu muktake vibhāvādisaṅghaṭanā kathaṃ yena tadāyatto rasaḥ syādityāśaṅkyāha---muktakeṣviti
GK16andhvc3u:1737: kathamapi kṛtapratyāpattau priye skhalitottare virahakṛśayā kṛtvā vyājaprakalpitamaśrutam
GK16andhvc3u:1738: ahanasakhīśrotraprāptiṃ viśaṅkya samambhramaṃ vivalitadṛśā śūnye gehe samucchvasitaṃ tataḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1741: asamāsāyāṃ hi saṅghaṭanāyāṃ manthararūpā pratītiḥ sākāṅkṣā satī cireṇa kriyāpadaṃ dūravartyanudhāvantī vācyapratītāveva viśrāntā satī na rasatatvacarvaṇāyogyā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1753: tathāca vācyapratītimāntharyādiparihārāya madhyamasamāsā dīrghasamāsā vā saṅghaṭanā kāryeti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1754: prabandhāśrayeṣvatyatra sandānitakādiṣvityasyaivānuṣaṅgo na tu muktakeṣvityasyāpi pūrvoktalakṣaṇasya muktakasya rasatātparye yathārasamaucityamanyathā tu kābhacāraḥ, dvayorapi mārgayoḥ sargabandhavidhāyināṃ darśanādrasatātparyaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1756: ākhyāyikākathayostu gadyanibandhanabāhulyādgadye ca chandobandhabhinnaprasthānatvādiha niyame heturakṛtapūrvo 'pi manā vikrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:1757: etad yathoktam aucityam eva tasyā niyāmakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1761: yadetadaucatyaṃ vaktṛvācyagataṃ saṅghaṭanāyā niyāmakamuktametadeva gadye chandoniyamavarjite 'pi viṣayāpekṣaṃ niyamahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1762: tathā hyatrāpi yadā kaviḥ kavinibaddho vā vaktā rasabhāvarahitastadā kāmacāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1766: yadivā prabandhe 'pi muktakasyāstu sadbhāvaḥ, pūrvāparanirapekṣeṇāpi hi yena rasacarvaṇā kriyate tadeva muktakam /
GK16andhvc3u:1779: tatra tu rasatātparyaṃ sādhīya iti yaduktaṃ tatkimapekṣayeti neyārthaṃ syāt // 7 //
GK16andhvc3u:1798: racanā viṣayāpekṣaṃ tat tu kiṃcid vibhedavat // DhvK_3.9 //
GK16andhvc3u:1810: tarhi viṣayaucityaṃ sarvathaiva tyaktaṃ netyāha---tadena rasaucityaṃ viṣayaṃ sahakāritayāpekṣya kiñjidvibhedo 'vantaravaicitryaṃ vidyate yasya sampādyatvena tādṛśaṃ bālapriyā viṣayatveneti viṣayaśabdārthatvenetyarthaḥ // 8 //
GK16andhvc3u:1811: 'rasabandhe'ti kārikāyāṃ racanā sarvatra rasabandhoktamaucityaṃ saṃśritā bhātītyanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1812: vṛttau 'athave'ti na vikalpārthaka ityāha---vṛttau ca vāśabda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:1823: yuktyā niṣevitaṃ stryādicatuṣṭayaṃ svārthasya svaprayojanāya bhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:1825: yuktyānyathā vā niṣevitaṃ taccatuṣṭayaṃ kevalaṃ duḥkhasambhārāya duḥkhātiśayāyaiva bhavati
GK16andhvc3u:1841: tattu viṣayāpekṣaṃ kiñjidvaśeṣavadbhavati, na tu sarvākāram /
GK16andhvc3u:1842: tathā hi gadyavandhe 'pyatidīrghasamāsā racanā na vipralambhaśṛṅgārakaruṇayorākhyāyikāyāmapi śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:1845: tathā hyākhyāyikāyāṃ nātyantamasamāsā svaviṣaye 'pi nāṭakādau nātidīrghasamāsā ceti saṅghaṭanāyā diganusartavyā /
GK16andhvc3u:1846: idānīmalakṣyakramavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ prabandhātmā rāmāyaṇamahābhāratādau locanam bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:1851: tathā hi vākyābhinayalakṣaṇe 'cūrṇapādaiḥ prasannaiḥ' ityādi munirabhyadhāt /
GK16andhvc3u:1855: evaṃ saṅghaṭanāyāṃ cālakṣyakramo dīpyata iti nirṇītam /
GK16andhvc3u:1856: prabandhe dīpyata iti tu nirvivādasiddho 'yamartha iti nātra vaktavyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1858: kevalaṃ kavisahṛdayān vyutpādayituṃ rasavyañjane yetikartavyatā prabandhasya sā nirūpyetyāśayenāha--idānīmiti
GK16andhvc3u:1860: prathamaṃ dāvaditi prabandhasya vyañjakatve ye prakārāste krameṇauvopayoginaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1862: tatrādikāvāpaḥ phalaparyantatānayanam, bālapriyā kiñcidvibhedavadityasya vivaraṇam - kiñjidityādi
GK16andhvc3u:1877: “itīkāvyārthe”tyādiślekaḥ kvacidgranthe na dṛśyate, ata eva na vyākhyātaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1908: prabandho 'pi rasādīnāṃ vyañjaka ityuktaṃ tasya vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:1909: prathamaṃ tāvadvibhāvabhāvānubhāvasañcāryocityacāruṇaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhiryathāyathaṃ pratipipādayiṣitarasabhāvādyapekṣayā ya ucato vibhāvo bhāvo 'nu bhāvaḥ sañjārī vā tadaucityacāruṇaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhirvyañjakatve nibandhanamekam /
GK16andhvc3u:1913: śṛṅgāravarṇanecchunā tādṛśī kathā saṃśrayaṇīyā yasyāmṛtumālyādervibhāvasya līlāderanubhāvasya bālapriyā śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1932: divyasya utsāhādayaḥ kevalamānuṣāśrayema kevalamānuṣasyotsāhādayaḥ kevaladivyāśrayeṇa vā upanibadhyamānā ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1941: ata eva ca bharate prakhyātavastuviṣayatvaṃ prakhyātodāttanāyakatvaṃ ca nāṭakasyāvaśyakartavyatayopanyastam
GK16andhvc3u:1944: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati---yatra vineyānāṃ pratītikhaṇḍanā na jāyate tādṛgvarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:1945: tatra kevalamānuṣasya ekapade saptārṇavalaṅghanamasambhāvyamānatayānṛtamiti hṛdaye sphuradupadeśyasya caturvargopāyasyāpyalīkatāṃ buddhau niveśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:1947: ata eva tasyāpi yadā prabhāvāntaramutprekṣyate tadā tādṛśameva /
GK16andhvc3u:1964: rājñāṃ prabhāvātiśayavarṇanaṃ yaddvayaṃ tadanucitaṃ na brūma iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:1979: pūrvā purātanī yā prasiddhiparamparā tayā upacito yaḥ sampratyayo viśvāsaḥ tamupārūḍhamiti hetugarbham /
GK16andhvc3u:1987: muninā nāṭakāderutpādyavastutvasyānirūpitatvādutpādyavastunāṭakādīti yathāśrutārthasyāsaṅgatyā yo nāṭakādi utpādyavastu sat kuryāttasya mahān pramādassyāditi yojanāmmanasi kṛtya tātparyaṃ vivṛṇoti---tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:1989: muninā nāṭakādi nanu yadyutsāhādibhāvavarṇane kathañciddivyamānuṣyādyaucityaparīkṣā kriyate tatkriyatām, ratyādau tu kiṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1990: tayā prayojanam? ratirhi bhāratavarṣecitenaiva vyavahārema divyānāmapi varṇanīyeti sthitiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1994: yattu divyamaucityaṃ tattatrānupakārakameveti cet---na vayaṃ divyamaucityaṃ śṛṅgāraniṣayamanyatkiñcidbrūmaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:1997: na ca rājādiṣu prasiddhiṣu prasiddhagrāmyaśṛṅgāropanibandhanaṃ prasiddhaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:1999: nāṭakāderamineyārthatvādabhinayasya ca sambhogaśṛṅgāraviṣayasyāsabhyatvāttatra parihāra iti cet- na;
GK16andhvc3u:2002: rājāderuttamaprakṛtibhirnāyikābhiḥ saha grāmyasambhogavarṇanaṃ tatpitroḥ sambhogavarṇanamiva sutarāmasabhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2004: locanam nirūpitaṃ munineti na kartavyamiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2006: bālapriyā utpādyavastu sat na nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2014: vyāyogastu vidhijñaiḥ karyaḥ prakhyātanāyakaśarīra ityādivyāyogalakṣaṇañja nāṭyaśāstrādāvuktam
GK16andhvc3u:2015: nāṭakādītyatra nāṭakamādiḥ yasyeti vyutpattyā nāṭakādipadenātadguṇasaṃvijñānabahuvrīhiṇā prakāraṇaṃ vivakṣitamato na yathāśrutārthānupapattiriti kaścidāha, tanmatamāha---anyastvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2016: na ca sambhogaśṛṅgārasya suratalakṣaṇa evaikaḥ prakāraḥ, yāvadanye 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:2017: prabhedāḥ parasparapremadarśanādayaḥ sambhavanti, te kasmāduttamaprakṛtiviṣaye na varṇyante ? tasmādutsāhavadratāvapi prakṛtyaucityamanusartavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2019: yattvevaṃvidhe viṣaye mahākavīnāpyasamīkṣyakāritā lakṣye dṛśyate sa doṣa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2020: sa tu śaktitiraskṛtatvātteṣāṃ na lakṣyata ityuktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:2024: tatrā digrahaṇaṃ prakārasūcakam, tena muninirūpite nāṭikālakṣaṇe
GK16andhvc3u:2025: 'prakaraṇanāṭakayogādutpādyaṃ vastu nāyako nṛpatiḥ' ityatra yathāsaṃkhyena prakhyātodāttanṛpatināyaktvaṃ boddhavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2026: kathaṃ tarhi sambhogaśṛṅgāraḥ kavinā nibadhyatāmityāśaṅkyāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2028: munināpa sthāne sthāne prakṛtyaucityameva vibhāvānubhāvādiṣu bahutaraṃ pramāṇīkṛtaṃ 'sthairyeṇottamamadhyamādhamānāṃ nīcānāṃ sambhrameṇa' ityādi vadatā /
GK16andhvc3u:2041: divyaṃ mānaṣyañja tadādi yadaucityaṃ tasya parīkṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:2067: iyattūcyate--bharatādiviracitāṃ sthitiṃ cānuvartamānena mahākaviprabandhāṃśca paryālocayatā svapratibhāṃ cānusaratā kavināvahatacetasā bhūtvā vibhāvā dyaucityabhraṃśaparityāge paraḥ prayatno vidheyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2068: aucityavataḥ kathāśarīrasya vṛttasyotprekṣitasya vā graho vyañjaka
GK16andhvc3u:2071: vṛttādapi ca kathāśarīrādutprekṣite viśeṣataḥ prayatnavatā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2088: adṛṣṭaṃ sukṛtaṃ prasādo devatādiprasādaḥ tābhyāmuditā yā svapratibhā tacchālitvamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2090: itihāsādiṣu vividhāsu rasavatīṣu kathāsu satīṣvapi tāḥ kathā anādṛtya tatra tāsāmmadhye yatkathāśarīramaucityavattadeva kavinā grāhyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:2091: netaradvibhāvādyaucityaśūnyaṃ kathāśarīraṃ rasavadapi na grāhyamiti vṛttyartha iti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2101: tatra iti jātyuttaramapi na sambhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2106: kiñca---- santi siddharasaprakhyā ye ca rāmāyaṇādayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2108: teṣu hi kathāśrayeṣu tāvatsvecchaiva na yojya /
GK16andhvc3u:2110: svecchāpi yadi yojyā tadrasavirodhinī na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2112: itivṛttavaśāyātāṃ kathañcidrasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ tyaktvā punarutprekṣyāpyantarābhīṣṭarasocitakathonnayo vidheyaḥ yatā kālidāsaprabandheṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2113: yathā ca sarvasenaviracite locanam na hi tatretihāsavaśādeva mayā nibaddhamiti jātyuttaramapi sambhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2117: siddhaḥ āsvādamātraśeṣo na tu bhāvanīyo raso yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:2118: kathānāmāśrayā itihāsāḥ, tairitihāsārthaiḥ taissaha svecchā na yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2120: svecchā teṣu na yojyā, kathañcidvā yadi yojyate
GK16andhvc3u:2122: yathā rāmasya dhīralalitatvayojanena nāṭikānāyakatvaṃ kaścitkuryāditi tvatyantāsamañjasam
GK16andhvc3u:2128: tathārjunacarite 'rjunasya pātālavijayādi bālapriyā sahṛdayāsvāda eva śeṣaḥ śiṣṭāṃśo yasya saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2131: siddharasāḥ prakhyāḥ prakhyātāśca siddharasaprakhyā ye rāmāyaṇādayaḥ kathāśrayāssantīti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2134: na tairityādikaṃ vākyadvaye paryavasannamityāśayena teṣvityādi vyākhyātaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2144: rāmāyaṇaprasiddhastadīyo raso hi vīra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2151: tatretivṛte yadi rasānanuguṇāṃ sthitiṃ paśyettademāṃ bhaṅktvāpi svatantratayā rasānuguṇaṃ kathāntaramutpādayet /
GK16andhvc3u:2152: na hi kaveritivṛttamātranirvahaṇena kiñcitprayojanam, itihāsādeva tatsiddheḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2153: rasādivyañjakatve prabandhasya cedamanyanmukhyaṃ nibandhanaṃ, yatsandhīnāṃ mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyānāṃ tadaṅgānāṃ copakṣepādīnāṃ ghaṭanaṃ locanam varṇitamithāsāprasiddham /
GK16andhvc3u:2156: iha prabhusammitebhyaḥ śrutismṛtiprabhṛtibhyaḥ kartavyamidamityājñāmātraparamārthebhyaḥ śāstrebhyo ye na vyutpannāḥ, na cāpyasyedaṃ vṛttamamuṣmātkarmaṇa ityevaṃ yuktiyuktakarmaphalasambandhaprakaṭanakāribhyo mitrrasammitebhya
GK16andhvc3u:2160: sa ca rasaścaturvargopāyavyutpattināntarīyakavibhāvādisaṃyogaprasādopanata ityevaṃ rasocitavibhāvādyupanibandhe rasāsvādavaivaśyameva svarasabhāvinyāṃ vyutpattau prayojakamiti prītireva vyutpatteḥ prayojikā prītyātmā ca rasastadeva nāṭyaṃ nāṭyameva veda ityasmadupādhyāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2161: na caite prītivyutpattī bhinnarūpe eva, dvayorapyekaviṣayatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2166: abhīṣṭasya rasasya ucitāyāḥ kathāyā unnayaḥ ghaṭanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2180: prajānāmarthapampādane paripālane yā yogyatā rājakulaprasūtatvādirūpā tayā ākrāntā āśritā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2182: caturvargopāyavyutpattiḥ nāntarīyakamānuṣaṅgikaphalaṃ yasya tathāvidho yo vibhāvādisaṃyogaḥ tatprasādopanataḥ tenotpādita ityarthaṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2191: phalaṃ ca nāma yadadṛṣṭavaśāddavatā prasādādānyato vā jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2192: na ca tadupadeśyam, tata upāye vyutatpatyayogāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2193: tenopāyakrameṇa pravṛttasya siddhiḥ anupāyadvāreṇa pravṛttasya nāśa ityevaṃ nāyakapratināyakagatatvenārthānarthepāyavyutpattiḥ kāryā /
GK16andhvc3u:2198: tā evaṃvidhāḥ pañcāvasthā ; kāraṇagatā muninoktaḥ--- saṃsādhye phalayoge tu vyāpāraḥ kāraṇasya yaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2233: dvitīyā tu kāryasampādanayogyatā, tṛtīyā tu pratibandhakopanipātena
GK16andhvc3u:2234: kāryasya śaṅkyamānatvaṃ, caturthī tu pratibandhakanivṛttyā kāryasya
GK16andhvc3u:2236: tadanurodhe tu svarūpāt kiñciducchūnatāmityasya svarūpamityanenānvayo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2245: prārambhādīnāmmukhādisandhīnāṃ locanam tasyānupūrvyā virjñayāḥ pañcāvasthāḥ prayoktṛbhiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2249: evaṃ yā etāḥ kāraṇasyāvasthāstatsampādakaṃ yatkarturitavṛttaṃ pañcadhā vibhaktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2250: ta eva mukhapratimukhagarbhāvamarśanirvahaṇākhyā anvarthanāmānaḥ pañca sandhaya itivṛttakhaṇaḍāḥ, locanam sandhīyanta iti kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:2251: teṣāmapi sandhīnāṃ svanirvāhyaṃ prati tathā kramadarśanādavāntarabhinnā ititavṛttabhāgāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2254: tathā hi svāyattasiddherbījaṃ binduḥ kāryamiti tisraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2255: bījena sarvavyāpārāḥ bindunānusandhānaṃ kāryeṇa nirvāhaḥ sandarśanaprārthanāvyavasāyarūpā hyetāstisro 'rthasampādye kartuḥ prakṛtayaḥ svabhāvavaśeṣāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2256: sacivāyattasiddhitve tu sacivasya tadarthameva vā svārthameva vā svārthamapi vā pravṛtttvena prakīrṇapatākāśabdābhyāmukta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2257: evaṃ prastutaphalanirvāhaṇāntasyādhikārikasya vṛttasya pañcasandhitvaṃ pūrṇasandhyaṅgatā ca sarvajanavyutpattidāyinī nibandhanīyā /
GK16andhvc3u:2258: prāsaṅgike tvitivṛtte nāyaṃ niyama ityuktam- 'prāsaṅgike parāthatvānna hyeṣa niyamo bhavet' iti muninā /
GK16andhvc3u:2259: evaṃ sthite ratnāvalyāṃ dhīralalitasya nāyakasya dharmāviruddhasambhogasevāyāmanaucityābhāvātpratyuta na nissukhaḥ syāditi ślādhyatvātpṛthvīrājyamahāphalāntarānubandhikanyālābhaphaloddeśena bālapriyā tadaṅgānāmupakṣepādīnāñca lakṣaṇāni daśarūpakādiṣu draṣṭavyāni /
GK16andhvc3u:2272: tattataprayojanaṃ manasi kṛtya tātsiddhiṃ samprārthya tadartho vyavasāyo bhavatīti sandarśanādijanyatvādbījādayastatsvarūpā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2283: iti vacanena dharmāviruddhasambhogasevāyāḥ rasābhivyaktyapekṣayā, yathā ratnāvalyām ; na tu kevalaṃ śāstrasthitisampādanecchayā /
GK16andhvc3u:2284: yathā veṇīsaṃhāre vilāsākhyasya pratimukhasandhyaṅgasya prakṛtarasanibandhānanuguṇamapi dvitīye
GK16andhvc3u:2292: pratyekena tu pradarśyamānaṃ pūrvāparānusandhānavandhyatayā kevalaṃ saṃmohadāyi bhavatīti na vitatam /
GK16andhvc3u:2293: asyārthasya yatnāvadheyatveneṣṭatvātsvakaṇṭhena yo vyatireka ukto 'na tu
GK16andhvc3u:2330: idaṃ cāparaṃ prabandhasya rasavyañjakatve nimittaṃ yaduddīpanapraśamane yathāvasaramantarā locanam iti pratimukhasandhyaṅgavilāsalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:2332: yathā tattvaṃ nādhigatārtha iti, prakṛto hyatra vīrarasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2335: yathā---'ayaṃ sa rāā udayaṇo tti' ityādi sāgarikāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2342: durlabhatvaṃ yato nāryā kāminaḥ sā parā ratiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2344: vīrarasādāvapi yathāvasaramuddīpanapraśamanābhyāṃ vinā jhaṭityevādbhutaphalakalpe sādhye labdhe prakaṭīcikīrṣita upāyopeyabhāvo na pradarśita evala syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2349: yadvā---rateḥ ratyākhyasthāyinaḥ yo bhujyata iti bhogo viṣayaḥ pramadādiḥ tadarthā tatsambhogārthā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2351: ādhikāriko yo raso varṇyamānaḥ tasya yaḥ sthāyībhāvastadupavyañjako yo vibhāvādiḥ tadupalakṣamārthatvena tadupalakṣakatvenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2356: yathātattvamadhigato jñāto 'rtho munyabhipretārthe yasya tathābhūto na,
GK16andhvc3u:2360: nanu veṇīsaṃhāre ka āghikāriko rasa ityatrāha---prakṛta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2368: yataśca yacca vinivāryate nāryā sambhoga iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2369: yataḥ yat sā etatrrayam, parā ratiḥ vidhnitasambhogāyā nāryāssambhogaḥ paramaprītiheturityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2375: nāyakāditattadyvāpārasya caturvargasya ca hetuhetumadbhāva ityarthaḥ naiveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2379: tathāca yatra yatrā ṅgino rasasya vicchedaḥ prāpnuyāttatra rasasya, yatā ratnāvalyāmeva /
GK16andhvc3u:2382: prabandhaviśeṣasya nāṭakāde rasavyaktinimittamidaṃ cāparamavagantavyaṃ yadalaṅkṛtīnāṃ śaktāvapyānurūpyeṇa yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:2383: śakto hi kaviḥ kadācidalaṅkāranibandhane tadākṣiptatayaivānapekṣitarasabandhaḥ prabandhamārabhate tadupadeśārthamidamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:2385: locanam na tu sarvarthavopanatā viśrāntirvicchedo yasya sa tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2389: rājyapratyāpattyā hi sacivanītimahimopanatayā tadaṅgabhūtapajhāvatīlābhānugatayānuprāṇyamānarūpā paramāmabhilaṣaṇīyatamatāṃ prāptā vāsavadattādhigatireva tatra phalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2390: nirvahaṇe hi 'prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ saṃbandho 'bhūddarśakena'
GK16andhvc3u:2392: iyati cetivṛttavaicitryacitre bhittisthānīyo vāsavadattāpremabandhaḥ prathamamantrārambhātpramṛti pajhāvatīvivāhādau, tasyaiva vyāpārāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2393: tena sa eva vāsavadattāviṣayaḥ premabandhaḥ kathāvaśādāśaṅkyamānavicchedo
GK16andhvc3u:2412: dṛṣṭāyūyaṃ nirjitā vidviṣaśca prāptā devī bhūtadhātrī ca bhūyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2413: sambandho 'bhūddarśakenāpi sārdhaṃ kiṃ te duḥkhaṃ yattataśśāntamadya //
GK16andhvc3u:2422: mārgadattanayanāṃ locanam tāvadaṅke sphuṭaṃ sa evopanivaddhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2427: tṛtīye 'pi sarvatra jvaliteṣu veśmasu bhayādālījane vidgute śvāsotkampavihastayā pratipadaṃ devyā patantyā tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:2428: hā nātheti muhuḥ pralāpaparayā dagdhaṃ varākyā tayā śāntenāpi vayaṃ tu tena dahanenādyāpi dahyāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:2430: caturthe 'pi devīsvīkṛtamānasasya niyataṃ svapnāyamānasya me tadgotragrahaṇādiyaṃ suvadanā yāyātkathaṃ na vyathām /
GK16andhvc3u:2431: itthaṃ yantraṇayā kathaṅkathamapi kṣīṇā niśā jāgrate /
GK16andhvc3u:2432: bālapriyā praṣṭuṃ pravṛttasya me” ityādipadena grāhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2434: tatpadenātra tatpadenātra sarvatra vāsavadattāyāḥ parāmarśaḥ divasaḥ ahasmamayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2438: manmathena kṛtaḥ utpāditaḥ utsāhaḥ yeṣāṃ taiḥ kiṃ kutaḥ baddhotkaṇṭhaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:2445: ādipadena “nordhvārdraṃ hṛdayaṃ na candanarasasparśāni cāṅgāni vā kasmin
GK16andhvc3u:2453: pūrvārddhena dṛṣṭyādyaṅgeṣu viroghisadbhāvādagneḥ padalābho na bhavatīti darśitamata evāha---'kasminni'tyādi kasmin kṛtāṅge idaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2454: kṛtamityetadvivṛṇoti---'krūreṇe'tyādi tvaṃ krūreṇāgninā pītā dagdhā iti yadidamiti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2460: varākyā nirbhāgyayā tayā devyā tathā dagdhamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2468: itthaṃ yantraṇayā evaṃ locanam dākṣiṇyopahatena sā priyatamā svapte 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:2472: tathābhūte tasminmunivacasi jātāgasi mayi prayatnāntargūḍhāṃ ruṣamupagatā me priyatamā /
GK16andhvc3u:2473: prasīdeti proktā na khalu kupitetyuktimadhuraṃ samudbhinā pītairnayanasalilaiḥ sthāsyati punaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2475: ṣaṣṭe 'pi 'tvatsamprāptivilobhitena sacivaiḥ prāṇā mayā dhāritāḥ' ityādinā
GK16andhvc3u:2479: uddhāṭya sā praviṣṭā hṛdayagṛhaṃ me nṛpatanūjā //
GK16andhvc3u:2481: bālapriyā cintanarūpanidrāpratibandhakena jāgrato me niśā kṣīṇeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2490: sā priyatamā tathā mama punaḥpaścādapipura itivā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2495: samudbhinna saṃmiśrā, yukteti yāvat pītaiḥ antaḥstambhitaiḥ samudbhinnaprītiriti pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2496: sādhiṣṭhaḥ samudbhinna prakāśitā prītiḥ yayā setyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2501: khedo yacca tavānugaṃ na hṛdayaṃ tasmin kṣaṇe dāruṇa //
GK16andhvc3u:2512: svañtite praveśapratibandhāya suṣṭu mithaḥ sambaddhe pakṣmaṇī eva kavāṭe yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:2514: svarūpatāḍena svasyarūpamākṛtiḥ tadeva tāḍaḥ tāḍanakriyā sādhanamudgāḍhanakaraṇamiti yāvat tena /
GK16andhvc3u:2517: atra nayanadvāramityetāvadeva rūpaṇaṃ śṛṅgārānuguṇatayā sundaraṃ na tvanyadapīti bhāvaḥ //14//
GK16andhvc3u:2520: dhvaner asya prabandheṣu bhāsate so 'pi keṣucit // DhvK_3.15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2523: asya vivakṣitānyaparavācyasya dhvaneranuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo 'pi yaḥ prabheda udāhṛto dviprakāraḥ so 'pi prabandheṣu keṣuciddyotate /
GK16andhvc3u:2525: yathā vā mamaiva kāmadevasya sahacarasamāgame locanam na kevalaṃ prabandhena sākṣādvyaṅgyo
GK16andhvc3u:2527: anusvānopamaḥ--śabdaśaktimūr'thaśaktimūlaśca, yo dhvaneḥ prabheda udāhṛtaḥ saḥ keṣucitprabandheṣu nimittabhūteṣu vyañcakeṣu satsu vyaṅgyatayā sthitaḥ san /
GK16andhvc3u:2530: atha vānusvānopamaḥ prabheda udāhṛto yaḥ prabandheṣu bhāsate asyāpi 'dyotyo 'lakṣyakramaḥ kvacit' ityuttaraślokena kārikāvṛttyoḥ saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2531: etaduktaṃ bhavati---prabandhena kadācidanuraṇanarūpavyaṅgyo dhvaniḥ sākṣādvyajyate sa tu rasādidhvanau paryavasyatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:2532: yadi tu spaṣṭameva vyākhyāyate tadā grandhasya pūrvottarasyālakṣyakramaviṣayasya madhye grantho 'yamasaṅgataḥ syāt nīrasatvaṃ ca pāñcajanyoktyādīnāmuktaṃ syādatyalam /
GK16andhvc3u:2537: dhvanerityasya prabheda ityanena sambandha iti darśayati-dhvaneḥ prabheda iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2543: ya udāhṛtaḥ sa keṣucit prabandheṣu bhāsate ityanta anuvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2560: saviṇa vi tumammi puṇovanti a atanti paṃmusimmi //
GK16andhvc3u:2563: śmaśānāvatīrṇaṃ putradāhārthamudyoginaṃ janaṃ vipralabdhuṃ gṛdhro divā śavaśarīrabhakṣaṇārthī śīghramevāpasarata yūyamityāha /
GK16andhvc3u:2573: līlayā daṃṣṭrāgreṇa uddhṛtaṃ sakalamahīmaṇḍalaṃ yena varāharūpiṇā tasyetyanena gurutaravastuvahane anāyāsassūcyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2598: kṛt-tad dhita-samāsaiś ca dyotyo 'lakṣya-kramaḥ kvacit // DhvK_3.16 //
GK16andhvc3u:2601: alakṣyakramo dhvanerātmā rasādaḥ subviśeṣaistiṅviśeṣairvacanavaśeṣaiḥ sambandhaviśeṣaiḥ kārakaśaktibhiḥ kṛdviśeṣaistaddhitaviśeṣaiḥ samāsaiśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:2607: sa cābhiprāyo vyaktaḥ śāntarasa eva pariniṣṭhatatāṃ prāptaḥ // 15 //
GK16andhvc3u:2608: evamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya rasādadhvaneryadyapi varṇebhyaḥ prabhṛti prabandhaparyante vyañjakavarge nirūpite nanirūpaṇīyāntaramavaśiṣyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2609: tathāpi kavisahṛdayānāṃ śibhāṃ dātuṃ punarapi sūkṣmadṛśānvayavyatirekāvāśritya vyañjakavargamāha--suptiṅḍityādi
GK16andhvc3u:2615: udāharaṇe sa tvabhivyakto 'bhiprāyo yathāsvaṃ vibhāvādirūpatādvāreṇa rasādīnvyanakti /
GK16andhvc3u:2622: kanakavarṇavadābhātīti kanakavarṇābhaḥ, kanakavarṇasya hemakumbhāderābhā kāntirivābhā yasya iti vā tam /
GK16andhvc3u:2628: nirūpite nirūpite sati na avaśiṣyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2632: subityādīnāṃ tṛtīyāntānāṃ pūrvakārikāsthena bhāsata ityanena tatsthasyāsya dhvanerapītyasyātratyena dyotya ityanena ca sambandha iti
GK16andhvc3u:2636: yathā---- nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayastatrāpyasau tāpasaḥ so 'pyatraiva
GK16andhvc3u:2638: dhigdhikchakrajitaṃ prabodhitavatā kiṃ kumbhakarṇena vā svargagrāmaṭikāviluṇṭhanavṛthocchūnaiḥ kimebhirbhujaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2639: locanam etaduktaṃ bhavati--varṇādibhiḥ prabandhāntaiḥ sākṣādvā raso
GK16andhvc3u:2647: mama śatrusadbhāvonocita iti sambandhānaucityaṃ krodhavibhāvaṃ vyanakti asya iti bahuvacanam
GK16andhvc3u:2648: tapovidyate yasyeti pau ṣakathāhīnatvaṃ taddhitena matvarthīyenābhivyaktam
GK16andhvc3u:2650: matkartṛkā yadi jīvanakrayā tadā hananakriyā tāvadanucitā /
GK16andhvc3u:2651: tasyāṃ ca sa kartā apiśabdena manuṣyamātrakam /
GK16andhvc3u:2653: vibhāvādipratipādanadvāreṇa sākṣādvā vibhāvādivyañjanadvāreṇa paramparayā vā raso 'bhivyajyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2661: iyaṃ śrīrāmeṇa rākṣasakulakṣaye kriyamāṇe kruddhasya rāvaṇasya svādhikṣepoktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2668: bahutvena śatrumattā mamānuciteti sambandhānaucityarūpaṃ krodhavibhāvamaraya iti bahuvacanaṃ vyañjayatīti bahuvacanamityasyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2678: saḥ tāpasaḥ mānuṣamātrakaḥ kutsito manuṣya eva /
GK16andhvc3u:2680: yathā atra hi śloke bhūyasā sarveṣāmapyeṣāṃ sphuṭameva vyañjakatvaṃ dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2682: 'tatrāpyasau tāpasa' ityatra tadvitanipātayoḥ 'so 'pyatraiva nihanti rākṣasakulaṃ jīvatyaho rāvaṇaḥ' ityatra tiṅkārakaśaktīnām /
GK16andhvc3u:2684: evaṃvidhasya vyañcakabhūyastve ca ghaṭamāne kāvyasya sarvātiśāyinī bandhacchāyā samunmīlati
GK16andhvc3u:2685: yatra hi vyaṅgyāvabhāsinaḥ padasyaikasyaiva tāvadāvirbhāvastatrāpi kāvye kāpi bandhacchāyā kimuta yatra teṣāṃ bahūnāṃ samavāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2689: dṛśyante ca mahātmanāṃ pratibhāviśeṣabhājāṃ bāhulyenaivaṃvidhā bandhaprakārāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2690: locanam deśo 'dhikaraṇam niḥśeṣema hanyamānatatāyā rākṣasabalaṃ ca karmeti tadidamasaṃbhāvyamānamupanatamiti puruṣakārāsampattirdhvanyate tiṅkārakaśaktipratipādakaiśca śabdaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2692: dhigdhigiti nipātasya śakraṃ jitavānityākhyāyikeyamiti upapadasamāsena sahakṛtaḥ svargetyādisamāsasya svapauruṣānusmaraṇaṃ prati vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2693: grāmaṭiketi svārthikataddhitaprayogasya strīpratyayasahitasyābahumānāspadatvaṃ prati, viluṇṭhanaśabde viśabdasya nirdayāvaskandanaṃ prati vyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2696: tena tilaśastilaśo 'pi vibhajyamāne 'tra śloke sarva evāṃśo vyañjakatvena bhātīti kimanyat
GK16andhvc3u:2721: locanam atikrāntaṃ na tu kadācana vartamānatāmavalambamānaṃ sukhaṃ yeṣu te kālā iti, sarva eva na tu sukhaṃ prati vartamānaḥ sa ko 'pi kālaleśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2722: pratīpānyupasthitāni vṛttāni pratyāvartamānāni tathā dūrabhāvīnyapi pratyupasthitāni nikaṭatayā vartamānāni bhavanti dāruṇāni duḥkhāni yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2723: duḥkhaṃ bahuprakārameva prativartamānāḥ sarve kālāṃśā ityanena kālasya tāvannirvedamabhivyañjayataḥ śāntarasavyañjakatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:2724: deśasyāpyāha--pṛthivī śvaḥ śvaḥ prātaḥ prātardināddinaṃ pāpīyadivasāḥ pāpānāṃ sambandhinaḥ pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikā divasā yasyāṃ sā tathoktā /
GK16andhvc3u:2725: svābhāvata eva tāvatkālo duḥkhamayaḥ tatrāpi pāpiṣṭhajanasvāmikapṛthivīlakṣayauvanā vṛddhastrīvadasaṃbhāvyamānasaṃbhogā gatayauvanatayā hi yo yo divasa āgacchati bālapriyā atra vyaṅgayatvenoktānāmarthānāṃ rāvaṇagatakrodhanirvedātiśayavyañjakatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2744: śvaḥ śva ityasya gatayauvanetyanenāpi sambandha ityāha---śvaḥśva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2745: gatayauvanetyasya mukhyārthaṃ tasya prakṛte bādhallakṣaṇānimittaṃ tatsārūpyaṃ ca darśayati--vṛddhetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:2747: gatayauvanāpadenātra sukhānādhāyiketyartho lakṣyate, sukhānubhavasya sambhāvanāpi nāstītyartho vyaṅgyaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2748: gatayauvaneti pāpīyānityatra hetugarbhaṃ pāpīyapadamarthāntaraparaṃ cetyanyathā vyācaṣṭe---gatetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:2752: eṣāṃ ca subādīnāmekaikaśaḥ samuditānāṃ ca vyañjakatvaṃ mahākavīnāṃ prabandheṣu prāyeṇa dṛśyate
GK16andhvc3u:2753: subantasya vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- tālaiḥ śiñjadvayasubhagaiḥ kāntayā
GK16andhvc3u:2754: nartito me yāmadhyāste divasavigame nīlakaṇṭhaḥ suhṛdvaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2756: avasara rouṃ cia ṇimmiāiṃ mā puṃsa me haacchīiṃ /
GK16andhvc3u:2757: daṃsaṃṇamettumbhattehiṃ jahi hiaaṃ tuha ṇa ṇāam //
GK16andhvc3u:2758: locanam sa sa pūrvapūrvāpekṣayā pāpīyān nikṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:2759: yadiveyasunanto 'yaṃ śabdo muninaivaṃ prayukto ṇijanto vā /
GK16andhvc3u:2763: samuditatve tūdāharaṇaṃ dattaṃ vyastatve cojyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2765: apasara roditumeva nirmite mā puṃsaya hate akṣiṇī me /
GK16andhvc3u:2766: darśanamātronmattābhyāṃ yābhyāṃ tava hṛdayamevaṃrūpaṃ na jñātam //
GK16andhvc3u:2767: anmatto hi na kiñcijjānātīti na kasyāpyatrāparādhaḥ daivenetthameva nirmāṇaṃ bālapriyā pṛthivyā iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2768: nanu pāpīyānityuktārthaḥ kathaṃ labhyata ityatrāha---itasunanta iti /
GK16andhvc3u:2769: nanvasmin pakṣe pāpīyo divaseti bhāvyamityata āha--muninetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:2770: ārṣo 'yaṃ prayoga ityarthaḥ. a6 pakṣāntaramāha---ṇijanto veti /
GK16andhvc3u:2771: muninā prayukta ityanuṣajyate ṇijanteyasunanto munināprayukto vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2772: lokān pāpīyasaḥ karotītyarthe pāpīyaśśabdāṇṇaci kartaryavi ṭerṇicaśca lopādakārānto 'yaṃ pāpīyaśabda iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2773: anusvānetyādikārikā yathā vyākhyātā, tathā prakṛte yojayata---so 'pītyādi
GK16andhvc3u:2785: rīditumeva nirmite sṛṣṭe me hatākṣiṇī kutsite nayane /
GK16andhvc3u:2786: mā puṃsaya mā abhivardhaya, mā tvadabhimukhaṃ vikāsayeti /
GK16andhvc3u:2795: mā panthaṃ rundhīo avehi bālaa ahosi ahirīo /
GK16andhvc3u:2798: aṇaṇatta vacca bālaa hṇā arnti kiṃ maṃ puloesieam /
GK16andhvc3u:2801: apasara mā vṛthā prayāsaṃ kārṣīḥ daivasya viparivartayitumaśakyatvāditi tiṅanto vyañjakaḥ tadanugṛhītāni padāntarāṇyapīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2802: mā panthānaṃ rudhaḥ apehi bālaka aprauḍha aho asi ahnīkaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2803: vayaṃ paratantrā yataḥ śūnyagṛhaṃ māmakaṃ rakṣaṇīyaṃ vartate //
GK16andhvc3u:2804: ityatrāpehīti tiṅantamidaṃ dhvanati--tvaṃ tāvadaprauḍho lokamadhye yadevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2807: 'anyatra vraja bālaka' aprauḍha buddhe snāntīṃ māṃ kiṃ prakarṣeṇālokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2810: atra jāyāto ye bhīravasteṣāmetatsathānamiti durāpetaḥ bālapriyā tiṅantaśabda itṣathaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2820: atra śloke śṛṅgāraḥ sambhogo vyaṅya pūrvaślorake tu vipralambha iti bhedaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2821: vṛttau--'aṇṇatte'ti anyatra vraja bālakasnāntīṃ kiṃ mā pralokayasyetat /
GK16andhvc3u:2825: jalāśaye snāntīṃ kañcidanurāgeṇa paśyantaṃ kañcana gṛhasthaṃ prati taṃ kāmayamānāyāstasyā uktiriyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2829: etattaṭaṃ jāyābhīrukāṇāṃ sambandhi na bhavatyeveti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:2832: tathāvidhānāmatra sthāne vartanarūpaḥ sambandho dūrāpeta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2840: nipātānāṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā--- ayamekapade tayā viyogaḥ priyayā copanataḥ suduḥsaho me
GK16andhvc3u:2844: mukhamaṃsavivarti pakṣmalākṣyāḥ kathamapyunnamitaṃ na cumbitaṃ tu //
GK16andhvc3u:2847: upasargāṇāṃ vyañcakatvaṃ yathā--- nīvārāḥ śukagarbhakoṭaramukhabhraṣṭāstaruṇāmadhaḥ prasnigdhāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2849: viśvāsopagabhādabhinnagatayaḥ śabdaṃ sahante mṛgā- stoyādhārapathāśca valkalaśikhāniṣyandalekhāṅkitāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2852: kṛtaḥ kapratyayaprayogo yeṣu kāvyavākyeṣu yathā jāyābhīrukāṇāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:2853: ye hyarasajñā dharmapatnīṣu premaparatantrāstebhyaḥ ko 'nyo jagati kutsitaḥ sthāditi kapratyayo 'vajñātiśayadyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2857: dvau caśabdāvevamāhatuḥ kākatālīyanyāyena gaṇḍasyopari sphoṭa itivattadviyogaśca varṣasamayaśca samamupanatau etadalaṃ prāṇaharaṇāya /
GK16andhvc3u:2860: paścāttāpasūcakassan tāvanmātraparicumbanalābhenāpi kṛtakṛtyatā syaditi dhvanatīti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2873: ityādau dvitrāṇāṃ copasargāṇāmekatra pade yaḥ prayogaḥ so 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:2878: locanam vaiyākaraṇādigṛheṣu hi prākprayogasvātantryaprayogābhāvātṣaṣṭhyādyaśravaṇālliṅgasaṃkhyāvarahācca vācakavailakṣaṇyena dyotakā nipātā ityuddhoṣyata eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2879: prakarṣeṇa snigdhā iti praśabdaḥ prakarṣaṃ dyotayanniṅgudīphalānāṃ sarasatvamācakṣāṇa āśramasya saundaryātiśayandhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2886: samyagbhūtamupāṃśukṛtvā ā samantāccarantamityanena lokānujighṛkṣātiśayastattadācarataḥ parameśvarasya dhvanitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2893: prākprayogaśca svātantrayeṇa prayogābhāvaśca tasmāt prākprayogāditi vyastatayā pāṭhaḥ sādhīyān upasargasaṃjñāviśiṣṭānāṃ prasākṣādityādīnāṃ nipātānāṃ dhātoḥ prāgeva prayogādivaivamādīnāṃ pratiyogyādivācakapadaṃ vinā svatantratayā prayogasyābhāvāccetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2895: yathā candrasya candreṇa vā sadṛśaṃ mukhamityādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ śrūyate,
GK16andhvc3u:2896: tathā candra ivetyādau ṣaṣṭhyādikaṃ na śrūyate yatastasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2905: ūrjite guṇini dṛṣṭe sata, ye jīvanti sma utkṛṣṭajīvitā abhūvan /
GK16andhvc3u:2906: ye prītyā vapuṣi na mānti sma, ye prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitāḥ santaḥ pranṛtyanti smetyādyanvayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2910: ye svavapuṣīti pāṭhe tu jīvantītyādau nipātānāmapi tathaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:2912: yathā vā--- ye jīvanti na mānti ye sma vapuṣi prītyā pranṛtyanti ca prasyandipramadāśravaḥ pulakitā dṛṣṭe guṇinyūrjite /
GK16andhvc3u:2913: hā dhikkaṣṭamaho kva yāmi śaraṇaṃ teṣāṃ janānāṃ kṛte nītānāṃ pralayaṃ śaṭhena vidhinā sādhudviṣaḥ puṣyatā //
GK16andhvc3u:2918: tatsādhavo nana vidanta vidanti kintu kartu vṛthāprāṇayamasya na pārayanti
GK16andhvc3u:2922: ślāghātiśayo nirvedātiśayaśca aho bateti hā dhigiti ca dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2926: ta eva hi sarvaṃ vidanti sutarāmiti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2927: vākyapaunaruktyaṃ yathā---'paśya dvīpādanyasmādapi' iti vacanānantaraṃ 'kaḥ saṃdehaḥ dvīpādanyasmādapa' ityanenepsitaprāptiravidhnitaiva dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2928: 'kiṃ kim? svassthā bhavanti mayi jīvati' ityanenāmarṣātiśayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2945: airā hohinti pahā maṇorahāṇaṃ pi dullaṅghā //
GK16andhvc3u:2948: iti chāyā) atra hyacirādbhaviṣyanti panthāna ityatra bhaviṣyantītyasmin pade pratyayaḥ kālaviśeṣābhidhāyī rasaparipoṣahetuḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:2949: ayaṃ hi gāthārthaḥ pravāsavipralambhaśṛṅgāravibhāvatayā vibhāvyamāno rasavān /
GK16andhvc3u:2951: yathā---tadgehaṃ natamiti mandiramidaṃ labdhāvagāhaṃ divaḥ sā dhenurjaratī
GK16andhvc3u:2953: sa kṣudo musaladhvaniḥ kalamidaṃ saṅgītakaṃ yoṣitā- māścaryaṃ divasaurdvijo 'yamiyatīṃ bhūmiṃ samāropitaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:2955: tiṅantapadānupravaṣṭasyāpyarthakalāpasya kārakakālasaṃkhyopagraharūpasya madhye 'nvayavyatarekābhyāṃ sūkṣmadṛśā bhāgagatamapi vyañjakatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:2958: utprekṣyamāṇo varṣāsamayaḥ kampakārī kimuta vartamāna iti dhvanyate /
GK16andhvc3u:2970: samaviṣamāḥ samāḥ viṣamāśca deśāḥ nirviśeṣāḥ jalapravāhanimagnatayā ekarūpāḥ yeṣu te /
GK16andhvc3u:2982: atra śloke divasairityasmin pade prakṛtyaṃśo 'pi dyotakaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2984: atra ca sarvanāmnāmeva vyañjakatvaṃ hṛdi vyavasthāpya kavinā kvetyādiśabdaprayogo na kṛtaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:2985: anayā diśā locanam divasārthe hyatrātyantāsambhāvyamānatāmasyārthasya dhvani /
GK16andhvc3u:2988: tena prakṛtyaṃśena sambhūta sarvanāmavyañjakaṃ dṛśyata ityuktaṃ bhavatīti na paunaruktyam
GK16andhvc3u:2989: tathā hi taditi padaṃ natabhittītyetatprakṛtyaṃśasahāyaṃ samastāmaṅgalanidhānabhūtāṃ mūṣakādyākīrṇatāṃ dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:2991: na ca natabhittiśabdenāpyete daurbhāgyāyatanatvasūcakā viśeṣā uktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:2996: tadidaṃśabdādyabhāve tu sarvamasaṅgataṃ syaditi tadidamaṃśayoreva prāṇatvaṃ yojyam /
GK16andhvc3u:2997: etacca dviśaḥ sāmastyaṃ triśaḥ sāmastyamiti vyañjakamityupalakṣaṇaparam /
GK16andhvc3u:3002: nanu prakṛtyaṃśo dyotaka ityukatyaiva sarvanāmnāmapi vyañjakatve prāpte punastadvacanaṃ punaruktamityata āha---prakṛtyaṃśasya ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:3019: te locane ityatra pūrvamuktaṃ smārayati---evaṃvidha ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3033: dvayoḥ sambhūya tathā trayāṇāṃ sambhūya vyañjakatvamityetadupalakṣaṇamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3037: etacca sarvaṃ padavākyaracanādyotanoktyaiva gatārthamapi vaicitryeṇa vyutpattaye punaruktam
GK16andhvc3u:3038: nanu cārthasāmarthyākṣepyā rasādaya ityuktam, tathā ca subādīnāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3041: kiñjārthaviśeṣākṣepyatve 'pi rasādīnāṃ teṣāmarthaviśeṣāṇāṃ vyañjakaśabdāvinābhāvitvādyathāpradarśitaṃ vyañjakasvarūpaparijñānaṃ vibhajyopayujyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3042: śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cānyatra ca cārutvaṃ yadvibhāgenopadarśitaṃ tadapi teṣāṃ vyañjakatvenaivāvasthitamityavagantavyam
GK16andhvc3u:3043: yatrāpi tatsamprati na pratibhāsate tatrāpi vyañjake racanāntare yaddṛṣṭaṃ sauṣṭhavaṃ teṣāṃ pravāhapatitānāṃ tadevābhyāsādapoddhṛtānāmapyavabhāsata ityavasātavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3052: na vācakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahāropayogi yenāvācakasya vyañjakatvaṃ na syāt iti prāgevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3053: nanu na gītādivadrasābhivyañjakatve 'pi śabdasya tatra vyāpāro 'styeva ;
GK16andhvc3u:3060: srakcandanādayaḥ śabdāḥ śṛṅgāre cāravo bībhatse tvacārava iti rasakṛta eva vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3061: rasaṃ prati ca śabdasya vyañjakatvamevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:3069: vṛttāvanupadaṃ vakṣyamāṇasyādhikāṃśasya bodhanārthaṃ cākṣepaḥ kṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3081: ko 'nyathā tulye vācakatve śabdānāṃ cārutvaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ syat /
GK16andhvc3u:3082: anya evāsau sahṛdayasaṃvedya iti cet kimidaṃ sahṛdayatvaṃ nāma? kiṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3084: pūrvasmin pakṣe tathāvidhasahṛdayavyavasthāpitānāṃ śabdaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvaniyamo na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3087: tathāvidhaiḥ sahṛdayaiḥ saṃvedyo rasādisamarpaṇasāmarthyameva naisargikaṃ śabdānāṃ viśeṣa iti vyañjakatvāśrayyeva teṣāṃ mukhyaṃ cārutvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3089: tathāhi-'taṭī tāraṃ tāmyati' ityatra taṭaśabdasya puṇṭaśabdasya
GK16andhvc3u:3093: bhaṭṭendurājasya--- indīvaradyuti yadā bibhṛyānna lakṣma syurvismayaikasuhṛdo 'sya yadā vilāsāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3105: puṇyapariṇāmavaśādinduḥ indīvaradyuti lakṣya na bimṛyādyadā, asya vilāsāḥ vismayaikasuhṛdaḥ syuḥ yadā, tathāpi kapolatalakomalakāntiḥ kiṃ kiṃ syānnāmeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3113: candraṃ vilokya madhyasthasya kasyacidrasikasya vacana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3117: evaṃ rasādīnāṃ vyañjakasvarūpamabhidhāya teṣāmeva virodhirūpaṃ lakṣayitumidamupakramyate---
GK16andhvc3u:3118: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasādīn bandhum icchatā /
GK16andhvc3u:3119: yatnaḥ kāryaḥ sumatinā parihāre virodhinām // DhvK_3.17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3122: prabandhe muktake vāpi rasabhāvanibandhanaṃ pratyādṛtamanāḥ kavirvirodhipahihāre paraṃ yatnamādadhīta
GK16andhvc3u:3123: anyathā tvasya rasamayaḥ śloka eko 'pi samyaṅna samapdyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3124: locanam aniyantrītapuruṣecchāyatto hi samayaḥ kathaṃ niyataḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3130: śabdāntareṇa saha yā racanā tadapekṣo 'sau viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3132: ata eva racanayā prasādena cārutvena copabṛṃhitā eva śabdāḥ kāvye yojyā iti tātparyam // 15//
GK16andhvc3u:3133: rasādīnāṃ yadvyañjakaṃ varṇapadādiprabandhāntaṃ tasya svarūpamabhidhāyeti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3135: virodhināmapi lakṣaṇakaraṇe prayojanamucyate śakyahānatvaṃ nāma anayā kārikayā /
GK16andhvc3u:3137: nanu 'vibhāvabhāvānubhāvasañcāryaucityacāruṇaḥ' iti yaduktaṃ tata eva vyatirekamukhenaitadapyavagaṃsyate
GK16andhvc3u:3138: maivam ;vyatirekeṇa hi tadabhāvamātraṃ pratīyate na tu tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3139: tadabhāvamātraṃ ca na tathā dūṣakaṃ yathā tadviruddham /
GK16andhvc3u:3140: pathyānupayogo hi na tathā vyādhiṃ bālapriyā śabdagato viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3146: śakyahānatvaṃ nāma prayojanamanayā kārakayā ucyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3147: virodhināṃ lakṣaṇe jñāte teṣāṃ parihāraḥ śakya iti tadeva prayojanamityarthaḥ // 17 //
GK16andhvc3u:3151: vibhāvādyaucityaśālinaḥ kathāśarīrasya vidhirityādinā tadaucityavirahiṇo vidhirna kārya ityādyathamātramityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3154: vṛttau 'śāntā'dīti kāni punastāni virodhīni yāni yatnataḥ kaveḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3158: akāṇḍa eva vicchittir akāṇḍe ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3160: rasasya syād virodhāya vṛtty-anaucityam eva ca // DhvK_3.19 //
GK16andhvc3u:3166: prastutarasāpekṣayā virodhī yo rasastasya sambandhināṃ vibhāvabhāvānubhāvānāṃ parigraho rasavirodhahetukaḥ sambhavanīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3167: tatra virodhirasavibhāvaparigraho yathā śāntarasavibhāveṣu tadvibhāvatayaiva nirūpiteṣvanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3168: virodhirasabhāvaparigraho yathā priyaṃ prati praṇayakalahakupitāsu kāminīṣu vairāgyakathābhiranunaye
GK16andhvc3u:3169: virodhirasānubhāvaparigraho yathā praṇayakupitāyāṃ priyāyāmaprasīdantyāṃ nāyakasya kopāveśavivaśasya raudrānubhāvavarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3176: 'alaṅkṛtīnām' ityanena yaduktaṃ tadviruddhamanyadapi ca viruddhaṃ vṛtyanaucityamityanena
GK16andhvc3u:3180: virodhinī rasasya yo bhāvo vyabhicārī tasya parigrahaḥ, virodhinastu yaḥ sthāyī sthāyitayā bālapriyā 'śṛṅgārādī'ci ca nirdeśe bījamāha---hāsyaśṛṅgārayārityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3185: pratipattaryekasmin śame udbuddhe tadavyavadhānena rāgodbodhāsambhavāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3186: ataḥ śāntavibhāve varṇite tadanantarameva śṛṅgārādivibhāvavarṇanaṃ na kāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:3187: virodhirasasyetyādigranthaṃ ayaṃ cānyo rasabhaṅgaheturyatprastutarasāpekṣayā vastuno 'nyasya kathañcidanvitasyāpi vistareṇa kathanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3188: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre nāyakasya kasyacadvarṇayitumupakrānte kaveryamakādyalaṅkāranibandhanarasikatayā mahatā prabandhena parvatādivarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3189: ayaṃ cāparo rasabhaṅgaheturavagantavyo yadakāṇḍa locanam tatparigraho
GK16andhvc3u:3193: vairāgyakathāmirita vairāgyaśabdena nirvedaḥ śāntasya yaḥ sthāyī sa uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3194: yathā---'prasāde vartasva prakaṭaya mudaṃ santyaja ruṣam'
GK16andhvc3u:3199: na hi jñātaśuktikārajatatattvastadupādeyadhiyaṃ bhajate ṛte saṃvṛtimātrāt
GK16andhvc3u:3200: kathābhiriti bahuvacanaṃ śāntarasasya vyabhicāriṇo dhṛtiṃ matiprabhṛtīn saṅgṛhṇāta /
GK16andhvc3u:3201: nanvanyadanunmattaḥ kathaṃ varṇayet, kimuta vistarata ityāha---kathañjidanvitasyeti bālapriyā vivṛṇoti---virodhina ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3206: svata eva vyabhicāriṇaḥ vyabhicāratvena sthāyinaśca bodhanāya bhāva iti sāmānyata uktamityathaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3210: nidhānaṃ saukhyānāṃ kṣaṇamabhimukhaṃ sthāpaya mukham' iti dvitīyatṛtīyapādau /
GK16andhvc3u:3211: he mugdhe vivekarahite, gataḥ kāla eva hariṇaḥ asthiratvāt pratyetuṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3213: atra śāntasya vibhāvaḥ kālānityatvalakṣaṇo nibandhaḥ tatprakāśito nirvedo vyabhicārī cetyato 'tra virodhirasavibhāvabhāvayoḥ parigrahaḥ sa ca prakṛtarasapratikūla ityāha---manāgapītyādi nirvedānuvedhe iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3217: jñātaṃ viṣayāṇāṃ satatvaṃ duḥkhamiśritatvapariṇāmavirasatvādinā heyatvarūpaṃ tattvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3222: śuktau bhāsamānaṃ rajataṃ śuktikārajatamityucyate, jñātaṃ śuktikārajatatatvaṃ yena saḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3231: eva vicchittiḥ rasasyākāṇḍa eva ca prakāśanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3232: tatrānavasare virāmo rasasya yathā nāyakasya kasyacitspṛhaṇīyasamāgamayā nāyikayā kayācitparāṃ paripoṣapadarvī prāpte śṛṅgāre vidite ca paramparānurāge samāgamopāyacintocitaṃ vyavahāramutsṛjya svatantratayā vyāpārāntaravarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3233: anavasare ca prakāśanaṃ rasasya yathā pravṛtte pravṛttavividhavīrasaṅkṣaye kalpasaṅkṣayakalpe saṅgrame rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvannāyakasyānupakrāntavipralambhaśṛṅgārasya nimittamucitamantareṇaiva śṛṅgārakathāyāmavatāravarṇane /
GK16andhvc3u:3234: na caivaṃvidhe viṣaye daivavyāmohitatvaṃ kathāpuruṣasya parihāro yato rasabandha eva kaveḥ prādhānyena pravṛttinibandhanaṃ yuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3235: itivṛttavarṇanaṃ tadupāya evetyuktaṃ prāk 'ālokārthī yathā dīpaśikhāyāṃ yatnavāñjanaḥ' ityādinā /
GK16andhvc3u:3241: api tāvaditi śabdābhyāṃ duryodhanādestadvarṇanaṃ dūrāpāstamiti veṇīsaṃhāre dvitīyāṅkamevodāharaṇatvena dhvanati /
GK16andhvc3u:3246: yato rasabandha eva mukhyaḥ kavivyāpāraviṣayaḥ itivṛttamātravarṇanaprādhānye bālapriyā rāmadevaprāyasyāpi tāvadityatratyābhyāṃ tāmyāmityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3266: vṛttau prādhānye sati yadibandhanaṃ tasminniti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3268: punaścāyamanyo rasabhaṅgaheturavadhāraṇīyo yatparipoṣaṃ gatasyāpi rasasya paunaḥ--punyena dīpanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3269: ubhayukto hi rasaḥ svasāmagrīlabdhaparipoṣaḥ punaḥ punaḥ parāmṛśyamāṇaḥ parimlānakusumakalpaḥ kalpate /
GK16andhvc3u:3271: yathā nāyakaṃ prati nāyikāyāḥ kasyāściducitāṃ bhaṅgimantareṇa svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣakathane
