GK16andhvc3u:3272: yadi vā vṛttīnāṃ bharataprasiddhānāṃ kaiśikyādīnāṃ kāvyālaṅkārāntaraprasiddhānāmupanāgarikādyānāṃ vā yadanaucityamaviṣaye nibandhanaṃ tadapi rasabhaṅgahetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3273: evameṣāṃ rasavirodhināmanyeṣāṃ cānayā diśā svayamutprekṣitānāṃ parihāre satkavibhiravahitairbhavitavyam
GK16andhvc3u:3276: nīrasastu prabandho yaḥ so 'paśabdo mahān kaveḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3278: locanam sati yadaṅgāṅgibhāvarahitānāmavicāritaguṇapradhānabhāvānāṃ rasabhāvānāṃ nibandhanaṃ tannimittāni skhalitāni sarve doṣā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3280: vyaṅgyo 'rtho bhavatu mā vā bhūt kastatrābhiniveśaḥ?
GK16andhvc3u:3282: vṛttyanaucityameva cetibahudā vyācaṣṭe tadapītyanena caśabdaṃ kārikāgataṃ vyācaṣṭe /
GK16andhvc3u:3286: nāyakasya hi dhīrodāttādibhedabhinnasya sarvathā vīrarasānuvedhena bhavitavyamiti taṃ prati kātarapuruṣocitamadhairyayojanaṃ duṣṭameva /
GK16andhvc3u:3290: nanu kālidāsaḥ bālapriyā cakārau vākyālaṅkāre ityāśayena
GK16andhvc3u:3296: nāyakaṃ prati nāyakayā svayaṃ sambhogābhilāṣasya kathane nibaddhe
GK16andhvc3u:3310: bādhyānām aṅga-bhāvaṃ vā prāptānām uktir acchalā // DhvK_3.20 //
GK16andhvc3u:3313: svasāmagnyā labdhaparipoṣe tu vivakṣite rase virodhināṃ virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyānāmaṅgabhāvaṃ vā prāptanāṃ satāmuktiradoṣā /
GK16andhvc3u:3314: bādhyatvaṃ hi virodhināṃ śakyābhibhavatve sati nānyathā /
GK16andhvc3u:3316: aṅgabhāvaṃ prāptānāṃ ca teṣāṃ virodhitvameva nivartate /
GK16andhvc3u:3318: tatra yeṣāṃ naisargikī teṣāṃ tāvaduktāvavirodha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:3319: yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāre tadaṅgānāṃ locanam paripoṣaṃ gatasyāpi karuṇasya rativilāseṣu paunaḥpunyena dīpanamakārṣīt, tatko 'yaṃ rasavirodhināṃ parihāranirbandha ityāśaṅkyāha--pūrva iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3320: na hi vasiṣṭhādibhiḥ kathañcidyadi smṛtimārgastyaktastadvayamapi tathā tyajāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3323: evaṃ virodhināṃ parihāre sāmānyenokte pratiprasavaṃ viyataviṣayamāha---vivakṣita itī /
GK16andhvc3u:3329: tatkathanaṃ duṣyantādernāyakasyeva nāyikāyā api na doṣa iti darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3344: tadaṅgatve ca sambhavatyapi maraṇasyopanyāso na jyāyān /
GK16andhvc3u:3346: karuṇasaya tu tathāvide viṣaye paripoṣo bhaviṣyatīti cet-na;
GK16andhvc3u:3350: dīrghakālapratyāpattau tu tasyāntarā pravāhaviccheda evetyevaṃvidhetivṛttopanibandhanaṃ rasabandhapradhānena kavinā locanam tatra prathamaṃ svābhāvikaprakāraṃ nirūpayati---tadaṅgānāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3351: nirapekṣabhāvatayā sāpekṣabhāvavapralambhaśṛṅgāravirodhinyapi karuṇe ye vyādhyādayassarvathāṅgatvena dṛṣṭāḥ teṣāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3352: te hi karuṇe bhavantyeva ta eva ca bhavantīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3353: śṛṅgāre tu bhavantyeva nāpi ta eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:3363: nanvevaṃ sarva eva vyabhicāriṇa iti vighaṭitamityāśaṅkyāha---śṛṅgāre veti
GK16andhvc3u:3364: adīrghakāle yatramaraṇe viśrāntipadabandha eva notpadyate tatrāsya vyabhicāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3366: yadi tādṛśīṃ bhaṅgiṃ ghaṭayituṃ sukaveḥ kauśalaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:3373: karuṇe bhavantyeva te eva bhavantīti dvedhā niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3377: ālasyaugnyajugupsāvarjāssarvaṃ eva vyabhicāriṇa iti muninā uktatvādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3384: maraṇādūrdhvamadīrgho yaḥ kālastasmiṃstena vā pratyāpattiḥ nāyakayoḥ samāgamastatsambhave satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3390: labdhapratiṣṭhe tu vivakṣite rase virodhirasāṅgānāṃ bādhyatvenoktāvadoṣo
GK16andhvc3u:3391: yathā--- kvākāryaṃ śaśalakṣmaṇaḥ kva ca kulaṃ bhūyo 'pi dṛśyeta sā doṣāṇāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3392: praśamāya me śrutamaho kope 'pi kāntaṃ mukham /
GK16andhvc3u:3393: kiṃ vakṣyantyapakalmaṣāḥ kṛtadhiyaḥ svapne 'pi sā durlabhā cetaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3394: svāsthyamupaihi kaḥ khalu yuvā dhanyo 'dharaṃ pāsyati //
GK16andhvc3u:3395: locanam pūrvākārādhikacaturayā saṅgataḥ kāntayāsau līlāgāreṣvaramata punarnandanābhyantareṣu
GK16andhvc3u:3397: ata eva sukavinā maraṇe padabandhamātraṃ na kṛtam,
GK16andhvc3u:3399: padabandhaniveśe tu sarvathā śokodaya evātiparimitakālapratyāpattilābhe 'pi atha dūraparāmarśakasahṛdayasāmājikābhiprāyeṇa maraṇasyādīrghakālapratyāpatteraṅgatocyate, hanta tāpasavatsarāje 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:3406: bālapriyā maraṇādūrdhvaṃ jhaṭiti punaryogo vā nibadhyata'iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3415: prapūrvaślokena saṅgamāśāyā varṇitatvādatra maraṇasya vipralambhāṅgatvaṃ sphuṭamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3420: atiparimito 'lyalpaḥ kālastena pratyāpatteḥ saṅgamasya lābhaḥ sambhavaḥ pratītirvā tasminnapītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3427: ayuktakathanahetuko viṣādo vismayo vā hantetyanena prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3440: yathā vā puṇḍarīkasya mahāśvetāṃ prati pravṛttanirbharānurāgasya dvitīyamunikumāropadeśavarṇane
GK16andhvc3u:3441: svābhāvikyāmaṅgabhāvaprāptāvadoṣo yathā--- bhramimaratimalasahṛdayatāṃ pralayaṃ mūrcchāṃ tamaḥ śarīrasādam /
GK16andhvc3u:3442: maraṇaṃ ca jaladabhujagajaṃ prasahya kurute viṣaṃ viyoginīnām //
GK16andhvc3u:3446: iyaṃ locanam vitarka autsukyena matiḥ smṛtyā śaṅkā dainyena dhṛtiścintayā ca bādhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3452: pāṇḍukṣāmaṃ vaktraṃ hadayaṃ sarasaṃ tavālasaṃ ca vapuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3454: atra karuṇocito vyādhiḥ śleṣabhaṅgyā sthāpitaḥ kopāditi badhveti hanyata iti ca raudrānubhāvanāṃ rūpakabalādāropitānāṃ tadanirvāhādevāṅgatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3477: kṣetriyo rogaḥ kṣayaroga iti kecit tam /
GK16andhvc3u:3480: atra karuṇocitavyādheḥ vipralambhe samāropādaṅgatetyāha locane - atretyādi
GK16andhvc3u:3491: vṛttau aṅgabhāvagamanaṃ yadiyaṃ cāṅgabhāvaprāptiranyā yadādhikārikatvātpradhāna ekasminvākyārthe rasayorbhāvayorvā parasparavirodhinordvayoraṅgabhāvagamanaṃ tasyāmapi na doṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3493: kathaṃ tatrāvirodha iti cet, dvayorapi tayoranyaparatvena vyavasthānāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3494: anyaparatve 'pi virodhinoḥ kathaṃ virodhanivṛttiriti cet, ucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3497: pūrvaṃ hi virodhinaḥ prastutarasāntare 'ṅgatoktā, adhunā tu dvayorvirodhinorvastvantare 'ṅgabhāva iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3500: nanvanyaparatve 'pi svabhāvo na nivartate, svabhāvakṛta eva ca virodha
GK16andhvc3u:3508: tadeva kuru mā kārṣīriti bālapriyā cānyā aṅgabhāvaprāptiriti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3527: atra tadvirodho nāma tadasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ tadutpattipratibandhaśca ghaṭatvādīnāṃ paṭatvādibhiśśītasparśadīnāmuṇṇasparśādibhiśca sahāsāmānādhikaraṇyarūpo virodhaḥ svabhāvakṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3528: evaṃ teṣāṃ dravyatvādibhiḥ rūpādiguṇaiśca saha sāmānādhikaraṇyarūpāvirodhaśca bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3531: vithisthale pravṛttisāmagrīṃ niṣedhasthale nivṛttisāmagrīṃ cādāya tadanupraveśena virodhāvirodhau grāhyāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:3546: ata evātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇantīti viruddhavidhirvikalpaparyavasāyīti vākyavidaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3549: bālapriyā ata eva viruddhāyorekatraikadā prādhānyasya duṣṭatvādeva /
GK16andhvc3u:3551: atirātre atirātrayāge ṣoḍaśinaṃ somapātraviśeṣam gṛhṇanti yathā---- ehi gaccha patottiṣṭha vada maunaṃ samācara /
GK16andhvc3u:3554: atra hi vidhipratiṣedhayoranūdyamānatvena samāveśe na virodhastathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:3557: locanam krīḍāṅgatve na hyatra viruddhānāmarthānāmabhidhānamiti rājanikaṭavyavasthitātatāyidvayanyāyena viruddhānāmapyanyamukhaprekṣitāparatantrīkṛtānāṃ yena virodhaḥ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3558: kevalaṃ viruddhatvādaruṇādhikaraṇasthityā bālapriyā gṛhṇīyuḥ iti ṣoḍaśigrahaṇaṃ vihitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3559: punaśca “nātirātre ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇātī”tyanena tanniṣiddhañceti yadyapi grahaṇāgrahaṇayorviruddhayorvidhiḥ, tathāpi sa vidhiḥ ṣoḍaśinaṃ gṛhṇīyānna gṛhṇīyādvā iti vikalpe paryavasyatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3567: atra ehīti krīḍanti gaccheti krīḍantītyādirītyā bhāvābhāvarūpayorapi gamanāgamanādyoḥ pradhānabhūtakrīḍāyāṃ prakāratayānvayena tadaṅgatvānna duṣṭatvamiti darśayannāha locane--krīḍāṅgatvenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3574: rājanikaṭavyavasthitau rājāśrayatvena sthitau yāvātatāthinau mitho vaireṇa vadhodyatau puruṣau tayordveyaṃ tannyāyenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3577: autena krameṇa ehi gacchetyādiśrutikramema yaḥ svātmanāṃ parāmarśaḥ pratītaḥ tasmin satyapi
GK16andhvc3u:3582: parasparasya yadrūpaṃ svabhāvaḥ taccintāyāṃ kā kathā taccintā nodetyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3588: 'nanvitānāmevāruṇyapiṅgākṣītvādīnāṃ karaṇavibhaktyantapadārthānāṃ somakrayaṇabhāvanāyāṃ karaṇatvenādāvanvayaḥ, paścāt parasparānvayaḥ--- na ca raseṣu vidhyanuvādavyavahāro nāstīti śakyaṃ vaktum, teṣāṃ vākyārthatvenābhyupagamāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3589: vākyārthasya vācyasya ca yau vidhyanuvādau tau locanam yo vākyīya eṣāṃ pāścātyaḥ sambandhaḥ sambhāvyate sa vighaṭatām /
GK16andhvc3u:3592: na ca rasasya vācyatvaṃ tvayaiva soḍhamityāśaṅkamānaḥ pariharati---na ceti
GK16andhvc3u:3595: mukhyatayā ca rasa eva kāvyavākyārtha ityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:3626: yairvā sākṣātkāvyārthatā rasādīnāṃ nābhyupagamyate, taisteṣāṃ tannibhittatā tāvadavaśyamabhyupagantavyā
GK16andhvc3u:3629: dṛśyate viruddhobhayasahakāriṇaḥ kāraṇātkāryaviśeṣotpattiḥ viruddhaphalotpādanahetutvaṃ hi yugapadekasya kāraṇasya viruddhaṃ na tu viruddhobhayasahakāritvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3630: locanam yadi vā mā bhūdanūdyamānatayā viruddhayo rasayoḥ samāveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:3634: kāvyārtho vibhāvādirnimittaṃ yeṣāṃ rasādīnāṃ te tathā teṣāṃ bhāvastattā /
GK16andhvc3u:3635: anūdyamānā ye hastakṣepādayo rasāṅgabhūtā vibhāvādayastannimittaṃ yadubhayaṃ karuṇavipralambhātmakaṃ rasavastu rasasajātīyaṃ tatsahakāri yaseya vidhīyamānasya śāmbhavaśaravahnijanitaduritdāhalakṣaṇasya
GK16andhvc3u:3637: viruddhaṃ yadubhayaṃ vāritejogataṃ śītoṣṇaṃ tatsahakāri yasya taṇḍulādeḥ kāraṇasya tasmātkāryaviśeṣasya
GK16andhvc3u:3641: nanvabhineyārthe kāvye yadīdṛśaṃ vākyaṃ bhavettadā bālapriyā anvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:3647: hastakṣepādayo vibhāvādaya ityatra yathāsaṃkhyenānvayo na vivakṣitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3666: kiṃ ca nāyakasyābhinandanīyodayasya kasyacitprabhāvātiśayavarṇane tatpratipakṣāṇāṃ yaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ sa parīkṣakāṇāṃ na vaiklavyamādadhāti locanam yadi samastābhinayaḥ kriyate tadā viruddhārthaviṣayaḥ kathaṃ yugapadabhinayaḥ kartuṃ śakya ityāśayenāśaṅkamāna āha--evamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:3668: anūdyamānamevaṃvidhaṃ viruddhākāraṃ vācyaṃ yatra tādṛśo yo viṣayaḥ 'ehi
GK16andhvc3u:3669: gaccha patottiṣṭha' ityādistatra yā vārtā sātrāpīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3670: etaduktaṃ bhavati---'kṣipto hastāvalagna' ityādau prādhānyena bhītaviplutādidṛṣṭyupapādanakrameṇa prākariṇakastāvadarthaḥ pradarśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3671: yadyapyatra karuṇo 'pi parāṅgameva tathāpi vipralambhāpekṣayā tasya tāvannikaṭaṃ prākaraṇikatvaṃ maheśvaraprabhāvaṃ prati sopayogatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:3673: evaṃ ca sāsranetrotpalābhiratyantaṃ prādhānyena karuṇopayogābhinayakrameṇa leśatastu vipralambhasya karuṇena sādṛśyātsūcanāṃ kṛtvā /
GK16andhvc3u:3674: kāmīvetyatra yadyapi praṇayakopocito 'bhinayaḥ kṛtastathāpi tataḥ pratīyamāno 'pyasau vipralambhaḥ samanantarābhinīyamāne sa dahatu duritamityādau sāṭopābhinayasamarpito yo bhagavatprabhāvastatrāṅgatāyāṃ paryavasyatīti na kaścidvirodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3680: kintu vīrasya yo 'sau krodho vyabhicāratāṃ pratipadyate tatphalarūpo 'sau
GK16andhvc3u:3701: vaiklavyamityasya pratyuta prītyatiśayanimittatāṃ pratipadyata ityatastasya kuṇṭhaśaktikatvāttadvirodhavidhāyino na kaściddoṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3702: tasmādvākyārthībhūtasya rasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3704: locanam yathoktam--'raudrasya caiva yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3706: atrodāharaṇam--- kurabaka kucāghātakrīḍāsukhena viyujyase bakulaviṭapin smartavyaṃ te mukhāsavasevanam
GK16andhvc3u:3707: caraṇaghaṭanāśūnyo yāsyasyaśoka saśokatā- miti nijapuratyāge yasya dviṣāṃ jagaduḥ strayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3709: tasmin rase sthāyinaḥ pradhānabhūtasya vyabhicāriṇo vā yathā vipralambhaśṛṅgāra autsukyasya
GK16andhvc3u:3713: sa pādāghātādaśokastilakakuravakau vīkṣaṇālaṅganābhyām strīṇāṃ sparśātpriyaṅgurvikasati bakulaśśīdhugaṇḍūṣasekāt
GK16andhvc3u:3735: aṅgabhūtasya kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vā virodhī rasavirodhīti vaktuṃ na nyāyya ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3736: tathācāṅgabhūtasya kasyacidvirodhī yo lasaḥ tatsambandhiparigraho na doṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3738: bhāvasya vetyatra bhāvapadena sthāyī vyabhicārī ca vivakṣita ityāha locane---tasminnityādi
GK16andhvc3u:3741: athavā vākyārthībhūtasyāpi kasyacitkaruṇarasaviṣayasya tādṛśena śṛṅgāravastunā bhaṅgiviśeṣāśrayeṇa saṃyojanaṃ rasaparipoṣāyaiva jāyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3742: yataḥ prakṛtimadhurāḥ padārthāḥ śocaniyatāṃ prāptāḥ pragavasthābhāvibhiḥ saṃsmaryamāṇairvilāsairadhikataraṃ śokāveśamupajanayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:3743: yathā--- locanam adhunā pūrvasminneva śloke kṣipta ityādau prakārāntareṇa virodhaṃ pariharati---athaveti
GK16andhvc3u:3746: adhunā tu sa vipralambhaḥ karuṇasyaivāṅgatāṃ pratipannaḥ kathaṃ virodhīti vyavasthāpyate---tathā hi karuṇo raso
GK16andhvc3u:3750: śāṃbhavaśaravahniceṣṭitāvalokane prāktanapraṇayakalahavṛttāntaḥ smaryamāṇa idānīṃ vidhvastatayā śokavibhāvatāṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3753: atha veti ityasya sthāne athavetyādinā doṣābhāva ityanteneti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3757: apiśabdaḥ anantaroktanītyā rasaparapoṣaṇe āpātato virodhaṃ dyotayati
GK16andhvc3u:3770: adhunā tu ityasya iti vyavasthāpyata ityanena sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3782: avalokane ityapi pāṭhaḥ, smaryamāṇa ityanenāsya sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3788: naṣṭatayetyarthaḥ śokavibhāvatāmityasyānantaraṃ prakṛṣṭāmiti ca kvacit pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3790: tathācātra viśiṣṭavaiśiṣṭyanyāyena vipralambhopaskṛtaḥ karuṇaḥ tripuraripuprabhāvātiśayaṃ ayaṃ sa raśanotkarṣī pīnastanavimardanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3793: tadatra tripurayuvatīnāṃ śāmbhavaḥ śarāgnirārdrāparādhaḥ kāmī yathā vyavaharati sama tathā vyavahṛtavānityanenāpi prakāreṇāstyeva nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3794: tasmādyathā yathā nirūpyate tatā tathātra doṣābhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3795: ityaṃ ca---- krāmantyaḥ kṣayakomalāṅgulivaladraktaiḥ sadarbhāḥ sthalīḥ pādaiḥ pātitayāvakairiva patadbāṣpāmbudhautānanāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3796: bhītā bhartṛkarāvalambitakarāstvadvairinārthādhunā dāvāgniṃ parito bhramanti punarapyudyadvivāhā iva //
GK16andhvc3u:3799: idānīṃ teṣāmekaprabandhaviniveśane nyāyyo yaḥ kramastaṃ pratipādayitumucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3802: atra bhūriśravasaḥ samarabhuvi nipatitaṃ bāhuṃ dṛṣṭvā tatkāntānāmetadanuśocanam /
GK16andhvc3u:3803: raśanāṃ mekhalāṃ sambhogā vasareṣūrdhvaṃ karṣatīti rasanotkarṣī /
GK16andhvc3u:3813: bālapriyā tadālambitaṃ itibhāvaṃ vā upaskarotīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3827: eko raso 'ṅgīkartavyas teṣām utkarṣam icchatā // DhvK_3.21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3830: prabandheṣu mahākāvyādiṣu nāṭakādiṣu vā viprakīrṇatayāṅgāṅgibhāvena bahavo rasā upanibadhyanta ityatra prasiddhau satyāmapi yaḥ prabandhānāṃ chāyātiśayayogamicchati tena teṣāṃ rasānāmanyatamaḥ kaścidvivakṣito raso
GK16andhvc3u:3832: nanu rasāntareṣu bahuṣu prāptaparipoṣeṣu satsu kathamekasyāṅgitā na virudhyata ityāśaṅkyedamucyate--
GK16andhvc3u:3837: prabandheṣu prathamataraṃ prastutaḥ san punaḥ punaranusandhīyamānatvena sthāyī yo rasastasya sakalabandhavyāpino rasāntarairantarālavartibhiḥ samāveśo yaḥ locanam prasiddhe 'piti /
GK16andhvc3u:3846: yadyapi ramavakārādau paryāyabandhādau ca naikasyāṅgitvaṃ tathāpi nāyuktatā tasyāpyevaṃvidho yaḥ prabandhaḥ tadyathā nāṭakaṃ mahākāvyaṃ vā tadutkṛṣṭataramiti taraśabdasyārthaḥ // 21 //
GK16andhvc3u:3848: svayaṃ labdhaparipoṣatve kathamaṅgatvam? alabdhaparipoṣatve vā kathaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3849: rasatvamiti rasatvamaṅgatvaṃ cānyonyaviruddhaṃ teṣāṃ cāṅgatvāyoge kathamekasyāṅgitvamuktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3851: prastutasya samastetivṛttavyāpinastata eva vitatavyāptikatvenāṅgibhāvocitasya bālapriyā krama ityenena teṣāmityasya sambandha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3855: tathāpi ca tasyāpi nāyuktatā iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3866: kāryam ekaṃ yathā vyāpi prabandhasya vidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3867: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // DhvK_3.23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3869: tathā rasasyāpi vidhau virodho naiva vidyate // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:3870: locanam rasasya rasāntarairitivṛttavaśāyātatvena parimitakathāśakalavyāpibhiryaḥ samāveśaḥ samupabṛṃhaṇaṃ sa tasya sthāyitvenetivṛttavyāpitayā bhāsamānasya nāṅgitāmupahanti, aṅgitāṃ poṣayatyevetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3871: etaduktaṃ bhavati---aṅgabhūtānyapi rasāntarāṇi svavibhāvādisāmagnyā svāvasthāyāṃ yadyapi labdhaparipoṣāṇi camatkāragocaratāṃ pratipadyante,
GK16andhvc3u:3872: tathāpi sa camatkārastāvatyeva na parituṣya viśrāmyati kiṃ tu camatkārāntaramanudhāvati /
GK16andhvc3u:3874: yathāha tatrabhavān--- guṇaḥ kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ pradhānaṃ pratipadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3879: nyāyena caitadevopapadyate; kāryaṃ hi tāvadekamevādhikārikaṃ vyāpakaṃ prāsaṅgikakāryāntaropakriyamāṇamavaśyamaṅgīkāryam
GK16andhvc3u:3883: yadi vā evakāro bhinnakramaḥ, tathaiva tenaiva prakāreṇa
GK16andhvc3u:3887: 'svalpamātraṃ samutsṛṣṭaṃ bahudhā yadvisarpati' iti lakṣitaṃ bījam /
GK16andhvc3u:3888: bālapriyā kvacidgranthe bahuṣviti pāṭho na, 'kathamekasyāṅgitā na' ityasya sthāne ekasyāṅgiteti pāṭhaśca dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:3895: anyena kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ san tathā kṛtātmasaṃskāraḥ guṇaḥ pradhānasya aṅginaḥ bhūyasi upakāre vartate bhūyase upakārāya bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:3911: sandhyādimayasya prabandhaśarīrasya yathā kāryamekamanuyāyi vyāpakaṃ kalpyate na ca tatkāryāntarairna saṅkīryate, na ca taiḥ saṅkīryamāṇasyāpi tasya prādhānyamapacīyate, tathaiva rasasyāpyekasya sanniveśe kriyamāṇe virodho na kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:3912: pratyuta pratyuditavivekānāmanusandhānavatāṃ sacetasāṃ tathāvidhe viṣaye prahlādātiśayaḥ pravartate
GK16andhvc3u:3913: nanu yeṣāṃ rasānāṃ parasparāvirodhaḥ yathā---vīraśṛṅgārayoḥ śṛṅgārahāsyayo locanam bājātprabhṛti prayojanānāṃ vicchede yadavicchedakāraṇaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:3914: yāvatsamāptibandhaṃ sa tu binduḥ' iti bindurūpayārthaprakṛtyā nirvahaṇaparyantaṃ vyāpnoti tadāha---anuyāyīti /
GK16andhvc3u:3917: 'āgarbhādāvimarśādvā patākāvinivartate' iti prāsaṅgikaṃ yatpatākālakṣaṇārthaprakṛtiniṣṭhaṃ kāryaṃ yāni ca tato 'pyūnavyāptitayā
GK16andhvc3u:3918: prakarīlakṣaṇāni kāryāṇi tairityevaṃ pañcānāmarthaprakṛtīnāṃ vākyaikavākyatayā niveśa uktaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:3921: evamanena ślokenāṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇamitivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ca rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasyeti dvayaṃ nirūpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:3946: aṅgāṅgitāyāṃ dṛṣṭāntanirūpaṇaṃ rasāṅgāṅgibhāvasya itivṛttabalāpatitatvaṃ ceti dvayamanena ślokena nirūpitamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3953: teṣāṃ tu sa kathaṃ bhavedyeṣāṃ parasparaṃ bādhyabādhakabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:3958: yathāha muniḥ--'vīrasya caiva yatkarma so 'dbhutaḥ' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:3960: raudrakaruṇayorapi muninaivoktaḥ---- 'raudrasyaiva ca yatkarma sa jñeyaḥ karuṇo rasaḥ' iti
GK16andhvc3u:3965: ālambananimagnarūpatayā ca ratiruttiṣṭhati tataḥ palāyamānarūpatayā jugupseti samānāśrayatvena tayoranyonyasaṃskāronmūlanatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:3967: śāntasyāpi tattvajñānasamutthitasamastasaṃsāraviṣayanirvedaprāṇatvena sarvato nirīhasvabhāvasya viṣayāsaktijīvitābhyāṃ ratikrodhābhyāṃ virodha eva // 23 //
GK16andhvc3u:4002: paripoṣaṃ na netavyas tathā syād avirodhitā // DhvK_3.24 //
GK16andhvc3u:4005: aṅgini rasāntare śṛṅgārādau prabandhavyaṅgye sati avirodhī virodhī vā rasaḥ paripoṣaṃna netavyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4006: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayātyantamādhikyaṃ na kartavyamityayaṃ prathamaḥ paripoṣaparihāraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4009: vāgrahaṇasyāyamabhiprāyaḥ---aṅgirasāpekṣayā yasya rasāntarasyotkarṣo nibadhyate tadā tadaviruddho 'pi raso nibaddhaścodyāvahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4010: atha tu yuktyā ṅgini raso 'ṅgabhāvatānayenopapattirghaṭate tadviruddho 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:4011: raso vakṣyamāṇena viṣayabhedādiyojanenopanibadhyamāno na doṣāvaha iti virodhāvirodhāvakiñcitkarau
GK16andhvc3u:4016: nanu nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vācye ādhikyasya kā sambhāvanā yenoktamādhikyaṃna kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--utkarṣasāmya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4018: snehena raṇarasena ca bhaṭasya dolāyitaṃ hṛdayam //
GK16andhvc3u:4036: tatrāvirodhino rasasyāṅgirasāpekṣayā nyūnatvaṃ kartavyamiti vaktavye satītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4048: tasyāṃ yā abhyasūyā tayā hetunā hasitaḥ paśupattiḥ sandhyāṃ sevamānaḥ parameśvaro yayā sā
GK16andhvc3u:4053: ṇeheṇa raṇaraseṇa a bhaḍassa dolāiaṃ hiaam //
GK16andhvc3u:4054: yathā vā-- kaṇṭhācchittvākṣamālāvalayamiva kare hāramāvartayantī kṛtvā paryaṅkabandhaṃ viṣadharapatinā mekhalāyā guṇena /
GK16andhvc3u:4057: aṅgirasaviruddhānāṃ vyabhicāriṇāṃ prācuryeṇāniveśanam, niveśane vā kṣipramevāṅgirasavyabhicāryanuvṛttiriti dvitīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4062: etacca muktakaviṣayameva bhavati na tu prabandhaviṣayamiti kecidāhustaccāsat ; ādhikārikeṣvitivṛtteṣu trivargaphalasamaprādhānyasya sambhavāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4063: tathāhi---ratnāvalyāṃ sacivāyattasiddhitvābhiprāyeṇa pṛthivīrājyalābha ādhikārikaṃ phalaṃ kanyāratnalābhaḥ prāsaṅgikaṃ phalaṃ, nāyakabhiprāyeṇa tu viparyaya iti sthite mantribuddhau nāyakabuddhau ca svāmyamātyabuddhyekatvātphalamiti nītyā ekīkriyamāṇāyāṃ samaprādhānyameva paryavasyati /
GK16andhvc3u:4074: atra prakṛto raso vīraḥ bhaṭasyetyuktabalādgamyaḥ samaprādhānyena varṇitastadavirodhī śṛṅgāraḥ, kaṇṭhādityādau tu prakṛto raso vipralambhaḥ tadavirodhīhāsyassamaprādhānyena darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4080: trivargarūpaṃ yat phalaṃ tasya samaprādhānyaṃ yattasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4086: aṅgatvena punaḥ punaḥ pratyavekṣā paripoṣaṃ nīyamānasyāpyaṅgabhūtasya rasasyeti tṛtīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4089: yathā śānte 'ṅgini śṛṅgārasya śṛṅgāre vā śāntasya /
GK16andhvc3u:4092: aṅgino hi rasasya locanam rasa iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4093: nanvevaṃ nāsau parituṣṭo bhavedityāśaṅkya matāntaramāha--niveśane veti /
GK16andhvc3u:4094: ata eva vāgrahaṇamuttarapakṣadārḍhyaṃ sūcayati na vikalpam /
GK16andhvc3u:4098: yathā---'kopātkomalalola' iti śloke 'ṅgibhūtāyāṃ ratāvaṅgatvena yaḥ krodha
GK16andhvc3u:4099: upanibaddhastatra baddhvā dṛḍhaṃ ityamarṣasya niveśitasya kṣiprameva rudatyeti hasanniti ca ratyuciterṣyautsukyaharṣānusandhānam /
GK16andhvc3u:4101: atra ca tāpasavatsarāje vatsarājasya pajhavatīviṣayaḥ sambhogaśṛṅgāra udāharaṇokartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4103: vibhāvānubhāvānāṃ cāpi utkarṣo na kartavyo 'ṅgirasavirodhināṃ niveśanameva vā na kāryam, kṛtamapi cāṅgirasavibhāvānubhāvairuṣabṛṃhaṇīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4104: paripoṣitā api viruddharasavibhāvānubhāvā aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyā ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4122: aṅgirasasya ye vibhāvānu bhāvāḥ tadekarūpaṃ sat tadekarūpatāṃ sampādyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4124: aṅgatvaṃ pratijāgarayitavyāḥ aṅgatāṃ netavyāḥ virodhyavirodhisādhāraṇaṃ prakāramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4127: virodhiviṣayaḥ asādhāraṇaśca yo doṣaparihāraprakāraḥ tadgatatvena tatsambandhitvenetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4131: bahuraseṣu prabandheṣvekasya rasasya āpekṣikametatprakarṣa yogitvamaśakyapratikṣepamiti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4137: etaccāpekṣikaṃ prakarṣayogitvamekasya rasasya vahuraseṣu prabandheṣu rasānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvamanabhyupagacchatāpyaśakyapratikṣepamityanena prakāreṇāvirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca rasānāmaṅgāṅgibhāvena samāveśeprabandheṣu syādavirodhaḥ etacca sarvaṃ yeṣāṃ raso rasāntarasa vyabhicārībhavati iti darśanaṃ locanam iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4142: rasatvāyogāt, tadabhāve ca kathamaṅgāṅgitetyapi yeṣāṃ mataṃ tairapi
GK16andhvc3u:4143: kasyacidrasasya prakṛṣṭatvaṃ bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakatvamanyeṣāṃ cālpaprabandhānugāmitvamabhyupagantavyamitivṛttasaṅghaṭanāyā evānyathānupapatteḥ, bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakasya ca rasasya rasāntarairyadi na kācitsaṅgatistaditivṛttasyāpi na
GK16andhvc3u:4145: na ca catmakāraviśrāntervirodhaḥ kaściditi samanantaramevoktaṃ tadāha--anabhyupagacchatāpīti
GK16andhvc3u:4148: anyastu vyācaṣṭe--etaccāpekṣikamityādigrantho dvitīyamatamabhipretya yatra rasānāmupakāryopakārakatā nāsti, tatrāpi hi bhūyo
GK16andhvc3u:4150: etaccāsat; evaṃ hi etacca sarvamiti sarvaśabdena ya upasaṃhāra ekapakṣaviṣayaḥ bālapriyā ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4192: etatpakṣaviṣaya locanam matāntare 'pītyādinā ca yo dvitīyapakṣopakramaḥ so
GK16andhvc3u:4193: 'tīva duḥśliṣṭa ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha bahunā saṃlāpena /
GK16andhvc3u:4195: bhāvādhyāyasamāptāvasti ślokaḥ--- bahūnāṃ samavetānāṃ rūpaṃ yasya bhavedbahu /
GK16andhvc3u:4196: sa mantavyo rasasthāyī śeṣāḥ sañcāriṇo matāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:4198: tatroktakrameṇādhikāriketivṛttavyāpikā cittavṛttiravaśyameva sthāyitvena bhāti prāsaṅgikavṛttāntagāminī tu vyabhicāritayeti rasyamānatāsamaye sthāyivyabhicāribhāvasya na kaścidvirodha iti kecidvyācacakṣire tathā ca bhāgurirapi kiṃ rasānāmapi sthāyisañcāritāstītyākṣipyābhyupagamenaivottaramavocadbāḍhamastīti
GK16andhvc3u:4199: anye tu sthāyitayā paṭhitasyāpi rasasya rasāntare vyabhicāritvamasti,
GK16andhvc3u:4200: yathā krodhasya vīre vyabhicāritayā paṭhitasyāpi sthāyitvameva rasāntare,
GK16andhvc3u:4201: yathā tatvajñānavibhāvakasya nirvedasya śānte ; vyabhicāriṇo vā sata eva vyabhicāryantarāpekṣyā sthāyitvameva, yathā vikramorvaśyāmunmādasya caturthe 'ṅke itīyantamarthamavabodhayitumayaṃ ślokaḥ bahunāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4202: cittavṛttirūpāṇāṃ bhāvānāṃ madhye yasya bahulaṃ rūpaṃ yathopalabhyate sa sthāyī bhāvaḥ, sa ca raso sasīkaraṇayogyaḥ; śeṣāstu sañcāriṇa iti
GK16andhvc3u:4204: ata evānye rasasthāyīti ṣaṣṭhyā saptamyā dvitīyayā vāśritādiṣu bālapriyā iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4209: madhye yasya bhāvasya, rūpaṃ bahu bhūyaḥ prabandhavyāpakaṃ bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4213: saḥ sthāyī raso mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4217: tatroktakrameṇa tasmin śloke ukto yaḥ kramastena /
GK16andhvc3u:4226: atra vīra ityantamekaṃ vākyaṃ, śānta ityantaṃ dvitīyaṃ, caturthe 'ṅka
GK16andhvc3u:4231: saḥ sthāyī rasaśca mantavya iti yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:4241: rasasya rase rasaṃ sthāyīti vigraha iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4243: matāntare tu rasānāṃ sthāyino bhāvā upacārādrasaśabdenoktāsteṣāmaṅgatvaṃ nirvirodhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:4244: evamavirodhināṃ virodhināṃ ca prabandhasthenāṅginā rasena samāveśe sādhāraṇamavirodhopāyaṃ pratipādyedānīṃ virodhiviṣayameva taṃ pratipādayitumidamucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:4245: viruddhaikāśrayo yas tu virodhī sthāyino bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:4246: sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryas tasya poṣe 'py adoṣatā // DhvK_3.25 //
GK16andhvc3u:4250: tatra prabandhasthena sthāyināṅginā rasenaucityāpekṣayā viruddhaikāśrayo yo virodhī yathā vīreṇa bhayānakaḥ sa vibhinnāśrayaḥ kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4251: tasya vīrasya ya āśrayaḥ kathānāyakastadvipakṣaviṣaye sanniveśayitavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4252: tathā sati ca tasya virodhino 'pi yaḥ paripoṣaḥ sa nirdeṣaḥ vipakṣaviṣaye hi bhayātiśayavarṇane locanam gamigāmyādīnāmiti samāsaṃ paṭhanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4261: yastu sthāyīṃ sthāyyantareṇāsaṃbhāvyamānaikāśrayatvādvirodhī bhavedyathotsāhena bhayaṃ sa vibhinnāśrayatvena nāyakavipakṣādigāmitvena kāryaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4263: tasya virodhino 'pi tathākṛtasya tathānibaddhasya bālapriyā āśritādiṣu gamyādīnāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4283: evamaikādhikaraṇyavirodhinaḥ prabandhasthena sathāyinā rasenāṅgabhāvagamane nirvirodhitvaṃ yathā tathā taddarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4289: yaḥ punarekādhikaraṇatve nirvirodho nairantarye tu virodhī sa rasāntakhyavadhānena locanam paripuṣṭatāyāḥ pratyuta nirdeṣatā nāyakotkarṣādhānāt /
GK16andhvc3u:4293: aikādhikaraṇyamekāśrayeṇa sanbandhamātram, tena virodhī yathā---bhayanotsāhaḥ, ekāśrayatve 'pi sambhavati kaścinni rantaratvena
GK16andhvc3u:4327: locanam nimittena yo nirdeṣaḥ na virodhī kiṃ tu nirantaratvena nimittena virodhameti sa tathāvidhaviruddharasadvayāvaruddhena rasāntareṇa madhye niveśitena yuktaḥ kārya iti kārikārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4328: prabandha iti bāhulyāpekṣaṃ, muktake 'pi kadācidevaṃ bhavedapi /
GK16andhvc3u:4331: tatra hi--'rāgasyāspadamityavaimi na hi me dhvaṃsīti na pratyayaḥ'
GK16andhvc3u:4332: ityādinopakṣepātprabhṛti parārthaśarīravitaraṇātmakanirvahaṇaparyantaḥ śānto rasastasya viruddho malayavatīviṣayaḥ śṛṅgārastadubhayāviruddhamadbhutamantarīkutya kramaprasarasambhāvanābhiprāyeṇa kavinā nibaddhaḥ 'aho gītamaho vāditram'
GK16andhvc3u:4336: anantaraṃ ca nimittanaimittikaprasaṅgāgato yaḥ śekharakavṛttāntoditahāsyarasopakṛtaḥ śṛṅgārastasya viruddho yo vairāgyaśamapoṣako nāgīyakalebarāsthijālāvalokanādivṛttāntaḥ sa bālapriyā virodhavānityasya vivaraṇam---virodhametīti /
GK16andhvc3u:4343: parārthaṃ yaccharīravitaraṇaṃ tadātmakaṃ yannirvahaṇaṃ tatparyanta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4348: krameṇa yaḥ prasaraḥ ratirūpaśṛṅgārasya nāyake prasaraṇaṃ tasya sambhāvanārūpo ya abhaprāyastenetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4351: nirdeṣadarśanāḥ kanyakā ityuktyā vaktari ratyanāvirbhāvaprakāśanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4353: cittavṛttīnāṃ rāgādīnāṃ ye prasarāsteṣu, yadvā cittavṛttīnāṃ prasaro yeṣu viṣayeṣu teṣu yatprasaṃkhyānaṃ doṣadarśanaṃ, tadeva dhanaṃ yeṣāṃ te /
GK16andhvc3u:4357: nimittaṃ dharmādinaimittikaṃ dharmādikāraṇaṃ sthūladehādi tayoḥ prasaṅgena sambandhena /
GK16andhvc3u:4359: 'naṭavadvyavatiṣṭhate' yathā naṭo vividhaṃ rūpaṅgṛhītvā vyavaharati tathā
GK16andhvc3u:4366: śāntaśca tṛṣṇākṣayasuravasya yaḥ paripoṣastallakṣaṇo rasaḥ pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:4367: tathā coktam--- yacca kāmasukhaṃ loke yacca divyaṃ mahatsukham /
GK16andhvc3u:4372: nanu nāstyeva śānto rasaḥ tasya tu sthāyyeva nopadiṣṭo muninetyāśaṅkyāha--śāntaśceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4373: tṛṣṇānāṃ viṣayābhilāṣāṇāṃ yaḥ kṣayaḥ sarvato nivṛttirūpo nirvedaḥ tadeva sukhaṃ tasya sthāyibhūtasya yaḥ paripoṣo rasyamānatākṛtastadeva lakṣaṇaṃ yasya sa śānto rasaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4376: anye tu sarvacittavṛttipraśama evāsya sthāyīti manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4379: bālapriyā kāmāditattatpuruṣārthalābhaḥ krameṇaiva bhavatītyaṃśe upaṣṭambhakamidaṃ vacanamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4393: nivṛttaḥ bhojanādyaśeṣaviṣayāyā icchāyāḥ prasaro yataḥ puruṣāttasya bhāvastatvaṃ tasya kāle prasarakāle iti vā pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4398: sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ ratyādirūpāṇāṃ praśamaḥ prakarṣeṇa śama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4402: sarvacittavṛttipraśama ityanena sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāmabhāvasya vivakṣaṇedoṣaṃ darśayannāha--tṛṣṇetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:4403: tṛṣṇānāṃ sarvāsāṃ cittavṛttīnāṃ sadbhāvasya prasarasya yaḥ prasajyapratiṣedho 'tyantābhāvastadrūpatve
GK16andhvc3u:4412: yathā adharmādipadasya dharmavarodhipāpādikamarthaḥ, tathā tṛṣṇākṣayapadasya sarvañcittavṛttipraśamapadasya vā sarvacittavṛttivirodhī locanam anye tu--- svaṃ svaṃ nimittamāsādya śāntādbhāvaḥ pravartate punarnimittāpāye tu śānta eva pralīyate //
GK16andhvc3u:4413: iti bharatavākyaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ sarvarasasāmānyasvābhāvaṃ śāntamācakṣaṇā anupajātaviśeṣāntaracittavṛttirūpaṃ śāntasya sthāyibhāvaṃ manyante /
GK16andhvc3u:4421: na ca tadīyā paryantāvasthā varṇanīyā yena sarvaceṣṭoparamādanubhāvābhāvenāpratīyamānatā syāt
GK16andhvc3u:4424: tacchidreṣu pratyayāntarāṇa saṃskārebhyaḥ' bālapriyā cittavṛttiviśeṣo yadi
GK16andhvc3u:4430: asmātpūrvo 'yaṃ ślokaḥ--- bhāvā vikārā ratyādyāḥ śāntastu prakṛtarmataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4439: anupajātaviśeṣā bāhyavanitādiviṣayaviśeṣānāśrayā āntarī ātmaviṣayikā ca yā
GK16andhvc3u:4446: pakṣasyāsya sarvacittavṛtitiprāgabhāve paryavasānamasmatpakṣasya tu sarvacittavṛttipradhvaṃsābhāva iti viśeṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4455: janmanaḥ adarśanāt yato janma na bhavati, tasmādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4461: ceṣṭoparamādayo hi śāntasyānubhāvā vaktavyāste ca na prayogayogyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4472: pūrvabhūmau tu śāntasyāpi janakādeśceṣṭā dṛṣṭeveti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4473: cittasya kṣiptādyā locanam ita sūtradvayanītyā citrākārā yamaniyamādiceṣṭā rājyadhurodvahanādalakṣaṇā vā śāntasyāpi janakāderdṛṣṭaivetyanubhāvasadbhāvādyamaniyamādimadhyasambhāvyamānabhūyovyabhicārisadbhāvācca pratīyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:4474: nanu na pratīyate nāsya vibhāvāḥ santīta cet--na; pratīyata eva tāvadasau
GK16andhvc3u:4475: tasya ca bhavitavyameva prāktanakuśalaparipākaparameśvarānugrahadhyātmarahasyaśāstravītarāgapariśīlanādibhirvibhāvairitīyataiva vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicārisadbhāvaḥ sthāyī ca darśitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4477: ka evamāha sa nāstīti, yataḥ pratīyata evetyuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:4478: nanu pratīyate sarvasya ślāghāspadaṃ na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:4479: tarhi vītarāgāṇaṃ śṛṅgāro na bālapriyā nānāvasthāḥ, tā bhūmaya ityucyante
GK16andhvc3u:4483: atrādyasyeyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ-- “tasya cetasaḥ uktānnirodhasaṃskārāt praśāntavāhitā bhavati parihṛtavikṣepatayā sadṛśapravāhapariṇāma cittaṃ bhavatītyarthaḥ” iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4485: asyāpīyaṃ bhojavṛttiḥ---”tasmin samādhau sthitasya chidrevyantarāleṣu yāni pratyayāntarāṇi vyutthānarūpāṇi jñānāni tāni, prāgbhūtebhyo vyutthānānubhavajebhyaḥ saṃskārebhyaḥ ahaṃ mametyevaṃrūpāṇi kṣīyamāṇebhyo
GK16andhvc3u:4491: atra samādhikāle yamādiceṣṭā vyatthānakāle rājyadhurodvahanādiceṣṭeti vibhāgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4496: yamaniyamādīnāṃ yogāṅgānāṃ madhye antare sambhāvyamānāḥ bhūyāṃsaśca ye vyabhicāriṇaḥ matidhṛtismṛtyādayaḥ, teṣāṃ sambhavādityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4507: prāktanānāṃ kuśalānāṃ satkarmaṇāṃ paripākaḥ tathā parameśvarānugrahaḥ tathādhyātmarahasyaśāstreṣu vedāntādiṣu bītarāgeṣu ca pariśīlanaṃ tadādibhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4524: asau dharmapradhāno yadi nāma sarvajanānabhavagocaratā tasya nāsti naitāvatāsāvalokasāmānyamahānubhāvacittavṛttiviśeṣaḥ pratikṣeptuṃ śakya- /
GK16andhvc3u:4525: na ca vīre tasyāntarbhāvaḥ kartaṃ yukta- /
GK16andhvc3u:4528: tayoścaivaṃvidhaviśeṣasadbhāve 'pi yadyaikyaṃ locanam ślādhya iti so 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:4530: nanu dharmapradhāno 'sau vīra eveti sambhāvayamāna āha--na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:4540: nanvevaṃ dayāvīro dharmavīro dānavīro vā nāsau kaścit, śāntasyaivedaṃ nāmāntarakaraṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:4541: tathā hi muniḥ-- dānavīraṃ dharmavīraṃ yuddhavīraṃ tathaiva ca /
GK16andhvc3u:4549: 'tasya' śāntasya na ca yukta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4555: evaṃvidha ityādi sarvaṃ sādhayituṃ śaknomītyādi buddhireva prāṇā jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4581: śāntarasaprabhedatvam, itarathā tu vīraprabhedatvamiti vyavasthāpyamāne na kaścidvirodhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4583: tasya cāviruddharasavyavadhāne prabandhe virodhirasasamāveśe satyapi nirvirodhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:4588: sā tvasya vyabhicāriṇī bhavati na tu sthāyitāmeti, paryantanirvāhe tasyā mūlata eva vicchedāt
GK16andhvc3u:4589: ādhikārikatvena tu śānto raso na nibaddhavyaiti candrikākāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4592: sa cāyamasmadupādhyāyabhaṭṭatautena kāvyakautuke, asmābhiśca tadvivaraṇe bahutarakṛtanirṇayapūrvapakṣasiddhānta ityalaṃ bahunā // 26 //
GK16andhvc3u:4599: pāṭhaḥ sarveṣu dṛṣṭagrantheṣu dṛśyate, tasya ca viṣayetyādinā sambandho na ghaṭate cāto 'tra dharmavīradānavīrayorgrahaṇamiti pūraṇīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4600: yadi vā tathā granthe paṭhanīyamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4606: 'ahaṅkārarahitatvene'ti hetau tṛtīyā, rahitatve iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4624: vahutaraṃ yathā tathā kṛtanirṇayau kṛtavicārau pūrvapakṣasiddhāntau yasya saḥ // 26 //
GK16andhvc3u:4627: nivartate hi rasayoḥ samāveśe virodhitā // DhvK_3.27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4661: ekasminnekadaikasya ratijugupsayoranudayāt ; prakṛte ca bhūremudigdhatvādaviśiṣṭavīradehālambanako bībhatso divyatvaviśiṣṭavīradehālambanakaśca śṛṅgāra iti tayoḥ kathamekālambanakatmarūpaikāśrayatvamiti śaṅkāṃ pariharannāha--svetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4665: atra hi śṛṅgārabībhatsayostadaṅgayorvā vīrarasavyavadhānena samāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4667: viśeṣatas tu śṛṅgāre sukumāratamā hy asau // DhvK_3.28 //
GK16andhvc3u:4672: sa hi ratapāripoṣātmakatvādrateśca locanam anyathā vibhinnaviṣayatvātko virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4673: nanu vīra evātra raso na śṛṅgāro na bībhatsaḥ, kintu ratijugupase hi vīraṃ prati vyabhicārībhūte
GK16andhvc3u:4679: samastavākyārthānuyāyitayā pratītiriti madhyapāṭhābhāve 'pi sutarāṃ vīrasya vyavadhāyakateti bhāvaḥ // 27 //
GK16andhvc3u:4685: tathā ca svarlalanāgatasya śṛṅgārasya bībhatsasya ca dehadvayaikyābhimānī vīra eka eva viṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4688: sāhasena raṇamadhyanipātanādyanubhāvenākṣepalabhyagarvādisañcāriṇā ca vīrarasa eva pratīyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4698: atra vākyaṃ padasamudāyaḥ bhūroṇvityādivākyārthānvayitayā karmaṇaḥ na vetyādivākyārthānvayitayā kartuśca pratītirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4703: vīraścāsvādyata iti rītyā vīrasya madhye madhye āsvādaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4704: śrutakrameṇa bodhe tvādau bībhatso, yojana yā bodhe tvādau śṛṅgāra iti //
GK16andhvc3u:4706: 'sukumāratamo hi svalpenāpi nimittena bhaṅgasambhavātsukumāratamaḥ sarvebhyo rasebhyo manāgapi virodhisamāveśaṃ na sahate /
GK16andhvc3u:4708: bhavet tasmin pramādo hi jhaṭity evopalakṣyate // DhvK_3.29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4711: tatraiva ca rase sarvebhyo 'pi rasemyaḥ saukumāryātiśayayogini kaviravadhānavān prayatnavānsyāt
GK16andhvc3u:4712: tatra hi pramādyatastasya sahṛdayamadhye kṣipramevāvajñānaviṣayatā bhavati
GK16andhvc3u:4713: śṛṅgāraraso hi saṃsāriṇāṃ niyamenānubhavaviṣayatvātsarvarasebhyaḥ kamanīyatayā pradhānabhūtaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4719: locanam tato 'pi karuṇastato 'pi śṛṅgāra iti tamapratyayaḥ // 28-29 //
GK16andhvc3u:4723: śṛṅgārasya viruddhā ye śāntādayasteṣvapi tadaṅgānāṃ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ sambandhī sparśo na duṣṭaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4724: tayā bhaṅgyā rasāntaragatā api vibhāvānubhāvādyā varṇanīyā yayā śṛṅgārāṅgabhāvamupāgaman /
GK16andhvc3u:4725: yathā mamaiva stotre--- tvāṃ candracūḍaṃ sahasā spṛśantī prāṇaiśvaraṃ gāḍhaviyogataptā
GK16andhvc3u:4727: bālapriyā sa' iti kārikāpāṭhābhiprāyeṇa vyācaṣṭe---sa hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4737: yayā bhaṅgyā varṇanayā śṛṅgāravibhāvāditvaṃ prāpnuvanto bhavantītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4739: gāḍhaviyogena gāḍhaṃ gāḍhena vā tvadasparśena taptā saṃsāratāpamanubhavantī /
GK16andhvc3u:4740: sā viṣayāntarasañcāriṇī me saṃvit antaḥkaraṇaṃ tadvṛttirvātvāṃ spṛśantī kiñcidviṣayīkurvāṇā vilīya tvadākāratārūpatvasambandhamavāpya yatra jñāne śṛṅgāraviruddharasasparśaḥ śṛṅgārāṅgānāṃ yaḥ sa na kevalamavirodhalakṣaṇayoge sati na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ kāvyaśobhārthameva vā kriyamāṇo na duṣyati yāvadvineyānunmukhīkartuṃ
GK16andhvc3u:4742: śṛṅgārarasāṅgairunmukhīkṛtāḥ santo hi vineyāḥ sukhaṃ vinayopadeśān gṛhṇanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4743: sadācāropadeśarūpā hi nāṭakādigoṣṭhī locanam ityatra śāntavibhāvānubhāvānāmapi śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nirūpaṇam /
GK16andhvc3u:4744: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthaṃ naiva duṣyatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4749: vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ yā kāvyaśobhā tadarthamapi vā viruddhasamāveśaḥ na kevalaṃ pūrvoktaiḥ prakāraiḥ, na tu kāvyaśobhā
GK16andhvc3u:4754: nanu kāvyaṃ krīḍārūpaṃ kva ca vedādigocarā upadeśakathā
GK16andhvc3u:4760: yadvā--vilīyāpi vilīyate dravībhūyāpi atyantaṃ drutā bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4761: bhaktānāṃ cittadrutiḥ prasiddhā putrikāpakṣe tu candrakarasparśena kiñcidārdrībhūya punassarvāvayavāvacchedenārdrībhavatītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4767: avirodhī virodhī vetyādikārikābhiruktebhyaḥ pakṣebhyo 'nya ityarthaḥ, na tvatraiva pakṣadvayadyotaka iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4785: anyavyākhyānañca vineyānunmukhīkartuṃ vā kāvyaśobhārthaṃ veti vikalpaparaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:4788: kiṃ ca śṛṅgārasya sakalajanamanoharābhirāmatvāttadaṅgasamāveśaḥ kāvyeśobhātiśayaṃ puṣyatītyanenāpi prakāreṇa virodhini rase śṛṅgārāṅgasamāveśo na virodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:4789: tataśca satyaṃ manoramā rāmāḥ satyaṃ ramyā vibhūtayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4793: etacca prabhumitrasammitebhyaḥ śāstretihāsebhyaḥ prītapūrvakaṃ jāyāsammitatvena nāṭyakāvyagataṃ vyutpattikāratvaṃ pūrvameva nirūpitamasmābhiriti na punaruktabhayādiha likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:4800: atra hi śāntavibhāve sarvasyānityatve varṇyamāne na kasyacidvibhāvasya śṛṅgārabhaṅgyā nibandhaḥ kṛtaḥ, kiṃ tu satyamiti bālapriyā tatra sukhamityetadvyācaṣṭe--rañjaneti /
GK16andhvc3u:4811: śobhāyā atiśayo yeneti vyutpattimabhipretya prakṛtānuguṇaṃ vyācaṣṭe--alaṅkāretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:4814: 'rāmāḥ' ramaṇyaḥ kāmā iti ca pāṭhaḥ 'vibhūtayaḥ' aiśvaryāṇi /
GK16andhvc3u:4816: mattā yauvanādimadayuktāyā aṅganā praśastāṅgā nārī tasyāḥ apāṅgabhaṅgaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4819: rāmādīnāṃ manoramatve 'pi satyeva jāvite janaiḥ svopabhoghāyopādeyāstāḥ jīvitaṃ cāsthiramiti kiḍkṛtaṃ tāsāmupādeyatvamato ramyatve 'pi tāssarvā niṣphalā eveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4829: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvan muhyati na kvacit // DhvK_3.31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4831: viṣayaṃ sukaviḥ kāvyaṃ kurvanmuhyati na kvacit // 31 //
GK16andhvc3u:4832: itthamanenānantaroktena prakāreṇa rasādīnāṃ rasabhāvatadābhāsānāṃ parasparaṃ virodhasyāvirodhasya ca viṣayaṃ vijñāya sukaviḥ kāvyaviṣaye pratibhātiśayayuktaḥ kāvyaṃ kurvatra kvacinmuhmati evaṃ rasādiṣu virodhāvirodhanirūpaṇasyopayogitvaṃ pratipādya vyañjakavācyavācakanirūpaṇasyāpi tadviṣayasya tatpratipādyate--
GK16andhvc3u:4833: vācyānāṃ vācakānāṃ ca yad aucityena yojanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4837: locanam parahṛdayānupraveśenoktam; na khalvalīkavairāgyakautukaruciṃ prakaṭayāmaḥ, api tu yasya kṛte sarvamabhyarthyate tadevedaṃ calamiti;
GK16andhvc3u:4838: tatra mattāṅganāpāṅgabhaṅgasya śṛṅgāraṃ prati sambhāvyamānavibhāvānubhāvatvenāṅgasya lolatāyāmupamānatoktati priyatamākaṭākṣo hi sarvasyābhilaṣaṇīya iti ca tatprītyā pravṛttimān guḍajihvikayā prasaktānuprasaktavastutattvasaṃvedanena vairāgye paryavasyati vineyaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4840: rasādiṣu rasādiviṣaye vyañjakāni yāni vācyāni vibhāvādīni vācakāni ca suptiṅādīni teṣāṃ yannirūpaṇaṃ tasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:4854: sambhāvyamānena nāyakavibhāvatvena nāyikānubhāvatvena ca hetunā śṛṅgārāṅgasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4860: tathā ca yayā kayāpi vidhayā śṛṅgārāṅgayojanaṃ kāvyaśobhākaramiti bhāvaḥ // 3.0 //
GK16andhvc3u:4865: ayameva hi mahākavermukhyo vyāpāro yadrasādīneva mukhyatayā kāvyārthīkṛtya tadyvaktyanuguṇatvena śabdānāmarthānāṃ copanibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:4866: etacca rasāditātparyeṇa kāvyanibandhanaṃ bharatādāvapi suprasiddhameveti pratipādayitumāha--
GK16andhvc3u:4868: aucityavānyastā etā vṛttayo dvividhāḥ sthitāḥ // DhvK_3.33 //
GK16andhvc3u:4872: tatra rasānuguṇa aucityavānvācyāśrayo yo vyavahārastā etāḥ kaiśikyādyā vṛttayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4874: vṛttayo hi rasāditātparyeṇa saṃniveśitāḥ kāmapināṭyasya kāvyasya ca cchāyāmāvahanti /
GK16andhvc3u:4899: ālokārthītyādikārikayā prathamodyote yaduktaṃ tadevānayā kārikayā upasaṃhṛtamityarthaḥ // atra kecidāhuḥ--'guṇaguṇivyavahāro rasādīnāmitivṛttādibhiḥ saha yuktaḥ, na tu jīvaśarīravyavahāraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4900: rasādimayaṃ hi vācyaṃ pratibhāsate na tu rasādibhiḥ pṛthagbhūtam' iti /
GK16andhvc3u:4901: atrocyate--yadi rasādimayameva vāyyaṃ yathā gauratvamayaṃ śarīram /
GK16andhvc3u:4902: evaṃ sati yathā śarīre pratibhāsamāne niyamenaiva gauratvaṃ pratibhāsate sarvasya tathā vācyena sahaiva rasādayo 'pi sahṛdayasyāsahṛdayasya ca pratibhāseran /
GK16andhvc3u:4904: locanam ityādinā rasopayogajīvitaḥ śabdavṛttilakṣaṇo vyavahāra uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4914: bālapriyā kārikāyāmarthaśabdayoḥ rasādyanuguṇatvena aucityavān vyavahāro yaḥ, etā vṛttayaḥ etāḥ dvivadhāḥ sthitāścetyanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4916: rasopayoga eva jīvitaṃ yasya sa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4921: atra guṇasthānīyo rasādiḥ guṇisthānīya itivṛttādirūpo vācyārthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4936: yadi rasādimayo vācyārthastarhi sa niyamato rasādibhiḥ sahaiva sarvaiḥ pratīyamānassyādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4940: jātyatvamutkṛṣṭaratnagato syānmatam; ratnānāmiva jātyatvaṃ pratipattṛviśeṣataḥ saṃvedyaṃ vācyanāṃ rasādirūpatvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:4941: naivam; yato yathā jātyatvena pratibhāsamāne ratne ratnasvarūpānatiriktatvameva tasya lakṣyate tathā rasādīnāmapi vibhāvānubhāvādirūpavācyāvyatiriktatvameva lakṣyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:4942: na caivam; locanam nanu yadyasya dharmarūpaṃ tattatpratibhāne sarvasya
GK16andhvc3u:4944: māṇikyadharmo hi jātyatvalakṣaṇo viśeṣo na tatpratibhāse 'pi sarvasya niyamena bhātītyāśaṅkate---syāditi
GK16andhvc3u:4946: etaduktaṃ bhavati---atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve sati taddharmatvāditi viśeṣaṇamasmābhiḥ kṛtam
GK16andhvc3u:4958: tatpratibhāne śarīrādipratibhāse ityetaditi sambandhaḥ iti niyama ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4959: yatra yatra yaddharmatvaṃ tatra pratyakṣīyatadviṣayitāvyāpakaviṣayitākatvamiti vyāptiriti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:4965: tathā ca māṇikyadharme jātyatve vyabhicāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4978: yata ityādi na caivamityantasya parihāragranthasya bhāvamāha
GK16andhvc3u:4988: yatra yatra taddharmatvabhityatra atyantonmagnasvabhāvatve satītyapi niviṣṭamastītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:4990: unmagnarūpatā yathārūpasya gauratvāderasti tathā jātyatvasya netyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4995: na hi vibhāvānubhāvavyabhicāriṇa eva rasā iti kasyācidavagamaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:4996: ata eva ca vibhāvādipratītyavinābhāvinī rasādīnāṃ pratītiriti tatpratītyoḥ kāryakāraṇabhāvena vyavasthānātkramo 'vaśyambhāvī /
GK16andhvc3u:4997: sa tu lāghavānna prakāśyate 'ityalakṣyakramā eva santo vyaṅgyā rasādayaḥ'
GK16andhvc3u:4999: locanam vācyānāṃ dharmāstathāsati dvau pakṣau rūpādisadṛśā vā syurmāṇikyagatajātyatvasadṛśā vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5000: na tāvatprathamaḥ pakṣaḥ, sarvān prati tathānavabhāsāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5002: eṣa ca heturādye 'pi pakṣe saṅgacchata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5006: yato na vācyadharmatvena rasādīnāṃ pratītiḥ, yataśca tatpratītau vācyapratītiḥ sarvathānupayoginī tata eva hetoḥ krameṇāvaśyaṃ bhāvyaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5008: sa tu sahṛdayabhāvanābhyāsānna lakṣyate anyathā tu lakṣyetāpītyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:5009: yasyāpi pratītiviśeṣātmaiva rasa ityuktiḥ, prāktasyāpi vyapadeśivattvādrasādīnāṃ pratītarityevamanyatra
GK16andhvc3u:5010: nanu bhavantu vācyādatiriktā rasādayastatrāpi kramo na lakṣyata iti tāvattvayaivoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:5049: nanu śabda eva prakāraṇādyavacchinno vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ samameva pratītimupajanayatīti kiṃ tatra kramakalpanayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5050: na ha śabdasya vācyapratītiparāmarśa eva vyañjakatve nibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5054: kiṃ tu tadyvañjakatvaṃ teṣāṃ kadācitsvarūpaviśeṣanibandhanaṃ kadācidvācakaśaktinibandhanam
GK16andhvc3u:5055: tatra yeṣāṃ vācakaśaktinibandhanaṃ teṣāṃ yadi vācyapratītimantareṇaiva svarūpapratītyā niṣpannaṃ tadbhavenna tarhi vācakaśaktinibandhanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5057: tataścaikayaiva sāmagnyā sahaiva vācyaṃ vyaṅgyābhimataṃ ca rasādi bhātīti vacanavyañjanavyāpāradvayena na kiñcinditi tadāha--nanviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5058: yatrāpi gītaśabdānāmartho 'sti tatrāpi tatpratītiranupayoginī grāmarāgānusāreṇāpahastitavācyānusāratayā rasodayadarśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5059: na cāpi sā sarvatra bhavantī dṛśyate, tadetadāha---na ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5065: tataśca gītavadevārthāvagamaṃ vinaiva rasāvabhāsaḥ syātkāvyaśabdebhyaḥ, na caivamiti vācakaśaktirapi tatrāpekṣaṇīyā; sā ca vācyaniṣṭaiveti prāgvācye pratipattirityupagantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5073: apahastitaḥ anādṛtaḥ vācyānusāraḥ vācyarthapratītyanusaraṇaṃ yena rasodayena tasya bhāvastattā tayā /
GK16andhvc3u:5084: vācakaśaktirabhidhā saiva nibandhanaṃ prayojakaṃ yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:5093: na caivaṃ evaṃ na bhavati ca /
GK16andhvc3u:5098: sa tu kramo yadi lāghavānna lakṣyate tatkiṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5099: yada ca vācyapratītimantareṇaiva prakaraṇādyavcchinnaśabdamātrasādhyā rasādapratītiḥ syāttadanavadhāritaprakaraṇānāṃ vācyavācakabhāve ca svayamavyutpannānāṃ pratipattṝṇāṃ locanam vācyavācakabhāveti /
GK16andhvc3u:5101: etaduktaṃ bhavati--mā bhūdvācyaṃ rasādivyañjakam; astu śabdādeva tatpratītistathāpi tena svavācakaśaktistasyāṃ kartavyāyāṃ sahakāritayāvaśyāpekṣaṇīyetyāyātaṃ vācyapratīteḥ pūrvabhāvitvamiti nanu gītaśabdavadeva vācakaśaktiratrāpyanupayoginī, yattukvacacchrute 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:5102: kāvyerasapratītirna bhavati tatrocitaḥ prakaraṇāvagamādiḥ sahakārī nāstītyāśaṅkyāha--yadi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:5103: prakaraṇāvagamo hi ka ucyate? kiṃ vākyāntarasahāyatvam? atha vākyāntarāṇāṃ sambandhivācyam
GK16andhvc3u:5134: nanvevaṃ yatra śabdaḥ śruto 'rtho nādhigataśca tatra rasapratītiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5150: vākyāntaraṃ sahāyaḥ sahakāri yasya tattvaṃ sahakāri vāntaramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5152: sahabhāve ca vācyapratīteranupayogaḥ, upayoge vā na sahabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5153: yeṣāmapi svarūpaviśeṣapratītinimittaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ yathā gītādiśabdānāṃ teṣāmapi svarūpapratītervyaṅgyapratīteśca niyamabhāvī locanam svayamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:5155: na cānvayavyatirekavatīṃ vācyapratītimapahnutyādṛṣṭasadbhāvābhāvau śaraṇatvenāśritau mātsaryādadhikaṃ kiñcitpuṣṇīta ityabhiprāyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5158: evaṃ hyupayoga iti anupakārake sañjñākaraṇamātraṃ vastuśūnyaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5160: taddṛṣṭāntenaiva vayaṃ vācyapratīterapi pūrvabhāvitāṃ samarthayiṣyāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5175: nanu vākyena rasādipratītau kartavyāyāmadṛṣṭaviśeṣo 'pi sahakārī tadabhāvādeva vācyapratītivirahakāle rasāderapratītiriti śaṅkāṃ pariharati--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5203: tattu śabdasya kriyāpaurvāparyamananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsvāśubhāvanīṣu vācyenāvirodhinyabhidheyāntaravilakṣaṇe rasādau na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5204: locanam nanu saṃścetkramaḥ kiṃ na lakṣyata ityāśaṅkyāha--tattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5206: kriye vācyavyaṅgyapratīti yadi vābhidhāvyāpāro vyañjanāparaparyāyo dhvananavyāpāraśceti kriye tayoḥ paurvāparyaṃ na pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5209: tathā vācyenāvirodhini, virodhini tu lakṣyata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5210: kuto na lakṣyate iti nimittasaptamīnirdiṣṭaṃ hetvantaragarbhaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5212: ananyasādhyatatphalaghaṭanāsu ghaṭanāḥ pūrvaṃ mādhuryādilakṣaṇāḥ pratipāditā guṇānirūpaṇāvasare tāśca tatphalāḥ rasādipratītiḥ phalaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5213: yāsām, tathā ananyattadeva sādhyaṃ yāsām, na hyojoghaṭanāyāḥ karuṇādipratītiḥ sādhyā /
GK16andhvc3u:5214: etaduktaṃ bhavati---yato guṇavati kāvye 'saṅkīrṇaviṣayatayā saṅghaṭanā prayuktā tataḥ kramo na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5215: nanu bhavatvevaṃ saṅghaṭanānāṃ sthitiḥ, kramastu kiṃ na lakṣyate ata āha--āśubhāvinīṣu vācyapratītikālapratīkṣaṇena vinaiva jhaṭityeva tā rasādīn bhāvayanti bālapriyā śabdajanyakriyetyarthaḥ kriyāpadārthamāha--kriyete ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5244: ojoghaṭanayā karuṇādipratītirna hi sādhyetyanvayaḥ kintu vīrādipratītireveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5252: 'pyarthavijñāne pūrvāmevocitasaṅghaṭanāśravaṇa eva yata āsūtrito rasāsvādastena vācyapratītyuttarakālabhavena parisphuṭāsvādayukto 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:5254: abhyaste hi viṣaye 'vinābhāvapratītikrama itthameva na lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5255: abhyāso hyayameva yatpraṇidhānādināpi vinaiva saṃskārasya balavattvātsadaiva prabubhutsutayā avasthāpanamityevaṃ yatra dhūmastatrāgniriti hṛdayasthitatvādvyāpteḥ pakṣadharmajñānamātramevopayogi bhavatīti parāmarśasthānamākramati, jhaṭityutpannehi dhūmajñāne tadvyāptismṛtyupakṛte tadvijātīyapraṇidhānānusaraṇādipratītyantarānupraveśavirahādāśubhāvinyāmagnipratītau bālapriyā ghaṭanā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5257: tattvityādigranthena labdhaṃ kramastu kinna lakṣyata iti codyasyottaraṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5267: vācyapratītyuttarakāle yo bhavaḥ jananaṃ tena hetunā yaḥ parisphuṭāsvādaḥ tena yukto 'pi viśiṣṭo 'pi; parisphuṭāsvādaḥ yukto 'pīti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5284: abhyasta ityādinā samānyata uktaṃ viśiṣya darśayati--evamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5299: tābhyāṃ dhūmajñānavyāptismṛtibhyāṃ vijātīyaṃ yat praṇidhānānukaraṇādinā praṇidhānakaraṇādinā pratītyantaramālocanarūpaṃ kvacittu lakṣyata eva /
GK16andhvc3u:5302: arthaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye dhvanau tāvadabhidheyasya tatsāmarthyākṣiptasya cārthasyābhidheyāntaravilakṣaṇatayātyantavilakṣaṇe ye pratīti tayoraśakyanihnavo nimittanimittibhāva iti sphuṭameva tatra paurvāparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5304: tathāvidhe ca viṣaye vācyavyaṅgyeyoratyantavilakṣaṇatvādyaiva ekasya pratītiḥ saivetarasyeti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:5305: śabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye tu dhvanau--- gāvo vaḥ pāvanānāṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5306: paramaparimitāṃ prītimutpādayantu locanam kramo na lakṣyate tadvadihāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:5307: yadi tu vācyāvirodhī raso na syāducitā ca ghaṭanā na bhavettallakṣyetaiva krama iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5309: vyācacakṣe--tasya śabdasya phalaṃ tadvā phalaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītyātmakaṃ tasya ghaṭanā niṣpādanā yato 'nanyasādhyā śabdavyāpāraikajanyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:5310: na cātrārthasatattvaṃ vyākhyāne kiñcidutpaśmāma ityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena bahunā
GK16andhvc3u:5311: yatra tu saṅghaṭanāvyaṅgyatve nāsti tatra lakṣyata evetyāha--kvacittviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5316: iti hi pūrvaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikaṃ nāsya vyañjakatvenoktamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5330: iti hi pūrvamuktaṃ varṇasaṅghaṭanādikamasya vyañjakatvena noktamiti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5333: padaprakāśaśabdaśaktimūlānuraṇanarūpavyaṅgye 'pi dhvanau viśeṣaṇapadasyobhayārthasambandhayogyasya yojakaṃ padamantareṇa yojanamaśābdamapyarthādavasthitamityatrāpi pūrvavadabhideyatatsāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāramātrapratītyoḥ susthitameva paurvāparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5346: kūpa iti ca ahamiti cobhayasamānādhikaraṇatayā saṃvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5359: abhidheyasya vyaṅgyālaṅkārasya ca ye pratītī tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5377: abhidheyaṃ ca tatsāmarthyākṣiptālaṅkāraśca tāveva tanmātre iti ca vṛttyartho bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5382: ārthyapi ca pratipattisyathāvide viṣaye ubhayārthasambandhayogyaśabdasāmarthyaprasāviteti śabdaśaktimūlā kalpyate
GK16andhvc3u:5384: tatrāvivakṣitavācyatvādeva vācyeva saha vyaṅgyasya kramapratītivicāro na kṛtaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5385: tasmādabhidhānābhidheyapratītyoriva locanam nanvevamārthatvaṃ śabdaśaktimūlatvaṃ ceti viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha---ārthyapīti
GK16andhvc3u:5387: etacca vitatya pūrvameva nirṇītamiti na punarucyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5389: andhaśabdāderupahatacakṣuṣkādiḥ svo viṣayaḥ, tatra yadvaimukhyamanādara ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5393: evaṃ rasādayaḥ kaiśikyādīnāmitivṛttabhāgarūpāṇāṃ vṛttīnāṃ jīvitamupanāgarikādyānāṃ ca sarvasyāsyobhayasyāpi vṛttivyavahārasya rasādiniyantritaviṣayatvāditi yatprastutaṃ tatprasaṅgena rasādīnāṃ vācyātiriktatvaṃ samarthayituṃ kramo vicārita ityetadupasaṃharati--tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5401: evaṃ vivakṣitānyaparavācye vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramaṃ pratipādya sarvatrāpi vyaṅgyavyañjakayoḥ kramo 'stīti darśayitumāha--vṛttau 'avivakṣite'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5414: krameṇa yā pratītiḥ tadvicāraḥ vācyārthavyaṅgyārthapratītyoḥkramasya vicāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5419: nanu rasādeḥ vṛttijīvitatvamupakrāntaṃ vācyavyaṅgyapratītikramaśca tasmādityādinā upasaṃhṛtaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5429: vyañjakatvaṃ nāma vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanam, na hi vyañjakatvaṃ vyaṅgyatvaṃ cārthasya vyañjakasidydhadhīnaṃ vyaṅgyatvam, vyaṅgyāpekṣayā ca vyañjakatvāsiddhirityanyonyasaṃśrayādavyavasthānam /
GK16andhvc3u:5430: nanu vācyavyatiriktasya vyaṅgyasya locanam śabdarūpasya pūrvaṃ pratītistato 'bhidheyasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5434: udyotārambhe yaduktaṃ vyañjanamukhena dhvaneḥ svarūpaṃ pratipādyata iti tadidānīmupasaṃharanvyañjakabhāvaṃ prathamodyote samarthitamapi śiṣyāṇāmekapraghaṭṭakena hṛdi niveśayituṃ pūrvapakṣamāha--tadevamiti kaściditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5438: bālapriyā vṛttyuktānumāne dṛṣṭāntasya sādhanavaikalyaśaṅkāṃ parihartuṃ vyācaṣṭe--abhidhānasyetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:5445: ityādītyādipadena sūciteṣu kiñcit padyārddhamapi darśayati---ata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5461: kimidamityatra kiṃśabdaḥ ākṣepe praśne vā, tatra heturnokta ityata
GK16andhvc3u:5470: śabdasya siddhiḥ prāgeva pratipāditā tatsadydhadhīnā ca vyañjakasiddhiriti kaḥ paryanuyogāvasaraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5475: ataśca na vyañjakasidhyā tatsiddhiryenānyonyāśrayaḥ śaṅkyeta, api tu hetvantaraistasya sādhitatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5478: astvasau dvitīyo 'rthaḥ, tasya yadi vyaṅya iti nāma kṛtam, vācya ityapi kasmānna kriyate? vyaṅgya iti vā vācyābhimatasyāpi kasmānna kriyate?
GK16andhvc3u:5480: abhidhā bālapriyā vyañjakatvamarthasya vyaṅgyatvaṃ ca 'na hi'svato na bhavati hi /
GK16andhvc3u:5491: tathā ca yato 'rthasya vyaṅgyatvamato vyañjakatvaṃ śabdasyaiva tacca vyaṅgyārthaprakāśanaṃ na hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5497: vismaraṇamāśaṅkya tatratyaṃ prāgiti padaṃ vyācaṣṭe locane---prathametyādi
GK16andhvc3u:5506: sa tvartha ityasya vyākhyānam--asau dvitīyo 'rtha iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5521: yo 'rthaḥ paryanto yasyāḥ tatra vācyatayaivāsau vyapadeṣṭuṃ yuktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5524: kiṃ tasya vyāpārāntarakalpanayā? tasmāttātparyaviṣayo yo 'rthaḥ sa tāvanmukhyatayā vācyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5525: yā tvantarā tathāvidhe viṣaye vācyāntarapratītiḥ sā tatpratīterupāyamātraṃ padārthapratītiriva vākyārthapratīteḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5526: locanam hi yatparyantā tatraivābhidhāyakatvamucitam, tatparyantatā ca pradhānībhūte tasminnartha iti mūrdhābhiṣiktaṃ dhvaneryadrūpaṃ nirūpitaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5531: upāyamātramityanena sādhāraṇyoktyā bhāṭṭaṃ prābhākaraṃ vaiyākaraṇaṃ ca pūrvapakṣaṃ sūcayati
GK16andhvc3u:5532: bhāṭṭamate hi--- vākyārthamitaye teṣāṃ pravṛttau nāntarīyakam /
GK16andhvc3u:5536: nanvastu paryantībhūtārthaṃ prati vācakatvaṃ, tataḥ kimata āha--tatparyantatyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5537: tatparyantatā tāmabhidhāṃ prati paryantatā avadhitā tātparyaviṣayateti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:5561: teṣāṃ padānāṃ vākyajananadvāreṇa vākyārthamitaye eva pravṛttiḥ, tasyāṃ satyām svārthapratipādanaṃ nāntarīyakamavinābhāvabalādāyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:5562: yathānnapākārthaṃ atrocyate---yatra śabdaḥ svārthamabhidadhāno 'rthāntaramavagamayati tatra yattasya svārthābhidhāyitvaṃ yacca tadarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ tayoraviśeṣo viśeṣo vā /
GK16andhvc3u:5563: na tāvadaviśeṣaḥ; yasmāttau dvau vyāpārau bhinnaviṣayau bhinnarūpau ca
GK16andhvc3u:5565: tathāhi vācakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ śabdasya svārthaviṣayaḥ gamakatvalakṣaṇastvarthāntaraviṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5566: locanam iti śabdāvagataiḥ padārthaistātparyeṇa yo 'rtha utthāpyate sa eva
GK16andhvc3u:5567: vākyārthaḥ, sa eva ca vācya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5571: etaccāsmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva vitatya nirṇītamiti na punarāyasyate granthayojanaiva tu kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5575: vācakatvaṃ gamakatvaṃ ceti svarūpato bhedaḥ svārthe 'rthāntare ca krameṇeti viṣayataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5577: no cetsa tasya na kaściditi ko viṣayārthaṃ bālapriyā pravṛttānāṃ kāṣṭhānāṃ jvalanam /
GK16andhvc3u:5578: ataḥ padānāṃ vākyārthamitiparyanta evābhidhāvyāpāro yathā kāṣṭhavyāpāraḥ pākānta ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5591: utpattyapekṣyā padārthavākyārthayornimittanimittibhāvoktiḥ, pratītistu prathamaṃ vākyārthasya prābhākaramate kāryānvitābhidhānāditi bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5601: samayāpekṣatvātsvārthe abhidhā tadanapekṣatvādanyatrārthe avagamanavyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5606: nanu na gamyate tasmācchabdātkintu tatsambandhivaśādityata āha--no
GK16andhvc3u:5609: na ca svaparavyavahāro vācyavyaṅgyayorapahṇotuṃ śakyaḥ, ekasya sambandhitvena pratīteraparasya sambandhisambandhitvena /
GK16andhvc3u:5611: yadi ca svasambandhitvaṃ sākṣāttasya syāttadārthāntararatvavyavahāra eva na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5620: yāvatā na sākṣātsambandhitvaṃ tena yukta evārthāntaravyavahāra iti viṣayabheda uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5621: nanu bhinne 'pi viṣaye akṣaśabdāderbahvarthasya eka evābhidhālakṣaṇo vyāpāra ityāśaṅkya rūpabhedamupapādayati--rūpabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5624: yadeva vācakatvaṃ tadeva gamakatvaṃ yadi syādavācakasya gamakatvamapi na syāt, gamakatve naiva vācakatvamapi na syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5625: na caitadubhayamapi gītaśabde śabdavyatirikte cādhovaktratvakucakampanabāṣpāveśādau bālapriyā tasya arthāntarasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5645: āvṛttyapekṣatve 'pi tatra tatrārthe abhidhaiva vyāpāra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5646: svarūpabhede prasiddhiṃ hetumuktvā punarhetvantaroktau bījaṃ darśayati--vipratipannaṃ pratīti
GK16andhvc3u:5647: vipratipannaṃ vācakatvameva gamakatvaṃ nānyadanubhūyata iti vadantam /
GK16andhvc3u:5650: gamakatve sati vācakatvamapi naiva na syāditi yojanā /
GK16andhvc3u:5655: tasmādbhinnaviṣayatvādbhinnarūpatvācca svārthābhidhāyitvamarthāntarāvagamahetutvaṃ ca śabdasya yattayoḥ spaṣṭa eva bhedaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5657: śabdavyāpāragocaratvaṃ tu tasyāsmābhiriṣyata eva, tattu vyaṅgyatvenaiva na
GK16andhvc3u:5663: vācyatvaṃ hyabhidhāvyāpāraviṣayatā na tu vyāpāramātraviṣayatā, tathātve tu siddhasādhanamityetadāha--śabdavyāpāreti
GK16andhvc3u:5664: nanu gītādau mā bhūdvācakatvamiha tvarthāntare 'pa śabdasya
GK16andhvc3u:5668: gītaśabde bāṣpāveśādau ca nāstītyanvayaḥ, kintu avagamakatvamevāstīti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5690: vyañjanāvyāpāraviṣayatāyā asmanmatasiddhāyāssādhanāt siddhasādhanaṃ nāma doṣa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5706: tatra ca tasyārthāntarasya pratīteḥ śabdāntareṇa svārthābhidhāyinā yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā /
GK16andhvc3u:5708: yataḥ padārthapratītirasatyaiveti locanam yadviṣayīkaraṇaṃ tatra prakāśanoktireva yuktā na vācakatvoktiḥ śabdasya, nāpi vācyatvoktirarthasya tatra yuktā, vācakatvaṃ hi samayavaśādavyavadhānena
GK16andhvc3u:5711: vācyatvaṃ hi samayabalena nirvyavadhānaṃ pratipādyatvaṃ yathā tasyaivārthasya śabdāntaraṃ prati padāha--prasiddheti /
GK16andhvc3u:5712: prasiddhena vācakatayābhidhānāntareṇa yaḥ sambandho vācyatvaṃ tadeva tatra vā yadyogyatvaṃ tenopalakṣitasya /
GK16andhvc3u:5713: na caivavidhaṃ vācakatvamarthaṃ prati śabdasyehāsti, nāpi taṃ śabdaṃ prati tasyārthasyoktarūpaṃ vācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:5715: atha ca pratīyate so 'rtho na ca vācyavācakatvavyāpāremeti vilakṣaṇa evāsau vyāpāra iti yāvat
GK16andhvc3u:5721: na vācakatvoktiryuktetyatra hetutvena svārthābhidhāyineti padaṃ vācakatvanirvacanapūrvakamavatārayati---vācakatvaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5753: yathāhi ghaṭe niṣpanne tadupādānakāraṇānāṃ na pṛthagupalambhastathaiva vākye tadarthe vā pratīte padatadarthānāṃ teṣāṃ tadā vibhaktatayopalambhe vākyārthabuddhireva dūrībhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:5754: na tveṣa vācyavyaṅgyayornyāyaḥ, na hi vyaṅgye pratīyamāne
GK16andhvc3u:5760: saugatakāpilamate tu yadyapyupādātavya ghaṭakāle upādānānāṃ na sattā ekatra kṣaṇakṣayitvena paratra tirobhūtatvena tathāpi pṛthaktayā nāstyupalambha itīyatyaṃśe dṛṣṭantaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5764: arthāntarapratītyanukūlā vākyasya yā śaktissā tātparyaśaktireva na tvadabhimateti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5766: yathā padārthe pratīte tātparyaśaktyā vākyārtho gamyate, tathā vākyārthe pratīte 'rthāntarañceti na yuktamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5780: nanu yairapīti sāmānyenoktirnaṃ ghaṭate sautagakāpilamatayorupādeyakāle upādānābhāvāditi śaṅkate--saugatetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:5790: yadyapi padārthavākyārthayoreva prakṛtatvaṃ, tathāpi padavākyagrahaṇaṃ dṛṣṭāntārtham /
GK16andhvc3u:5793: vākye pratīte tasmātpadānāṃ vākyārthe pratīte tasmātpadārthanāñca pṛthaktayā upalambho nāstītyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5803: ghaṭapratītāvutpannāyāṃ na pradīpaprakāśo nivartate tadvadyvaṅgyapratītau vācyāvabhāsaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5805: nanvevaṃ yugapadarthadvayayogitvaṃ vākyasya prāptaṃ tadbhāve ca tasya vākyataiva vighaṭate, tasyā ekārthyalakṣaṇatvāt; naiṣa doṣaḥ;
GK16andhvc3u:5807: vyaṅgyasya hi kvacitprādhānyaṃ vācyasyopasarjanabhāvaḥ locanam evaṃ padārthavākyārthanyāyaṃ tātparyaśaktisādhakaṃ prakṛte viṣaye nirākṛtyābhimatāṃ prakāśaśakti sādhayituṃ taducitaṃ pradīpaghaṭanyāyaṃ prakṛte yojayannāha---tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:5808: yato 'sau padārthavākyāthanyāyo neha yuktastasmāt prakṛtaṃ nyāyaṃ vyākaramapūrvakaṃ dārṣṭāntike yojayati--yathaiva hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5809: nanu pūrvamuktam--- yathā padārthadvāreṇa vākyārthaḥ sa pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5811: iti tatkathaṃ sa eva nyāya iha yatnena nirākṛta ityāśaṅkyāha--yattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:5819: dūrībhāvaśca neṣṛ ityatastayoḥ pṛthagupalambhonābhyupeya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5830: ekaḥ artho yasya tasya bhāvaḥ aikārthyam /
GK16andhvc3u:5832: nanvekārthatvaṃ na lakṣaṇaṃ śleṣālaṅkāraviṣayasyānekārthasyāpi vākyatvāditi śaṅkāmabhiprāyapradarśanena pariharati--sakṛdityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5834: tatra vyaṅgyaprādhānye dhvanirityuktameva; vācyaprādhānye tu prakārāntaraṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5840: yatrāpi tasya prādhānyaṃ tatrāpi kimiti tasya svarūpamapahnūyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5841: locanam śruto hi śabdo yatraiva samayasmṛtiṃ karoti sa cedanenaivāgamitaḥ tadviramyavyāpārābhāvātsamayasmaraṇānāṃ bahūnāṃ yugapadayogātko
GK16andhvc3u:5843: punaḥ śrutastu smṛto vāpi nāsāviti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5850: nanu yatparaḥ śabdaḥ sa śabdārtha iti vyaṅgyasya prāghānye vācyatvameva
GK16andhvc3u:5851: nyāyyam, tarhyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktaṃ vyaṅgyatvamiti cetsiddho naḥ pakṣaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:5861: nanu samayasmaraṇañcedarthāvagame kāraṇaṃ, tarhi tānyapi bahūni
GK16andhvc3u:5862: bhavantityāśaṅkāyāṃ tāni krameṇa yugapadveti vikalpādyaṃ nirākaroti--viramyavyāpārābhāvāditi
GK16andhvc3u:5864: nanu śleṣaviṣaye vahvarthatvaṃ dṛśyata ityata āha--punarityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5865: śrutastu smṛto vāpītyubhayatra śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5866: yadvā śrutaḥ anusaṃhitaḥ śabda iti śeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5870: tathāca śleṣasthale āvṛtyā bodhādvākyatadartho bhinnau payorekatvañcaupacārikamiti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5874: tathāca vācyopasarjanako vyaṅgyo vyaṅgyopasarjanakavācyo vaika evārtho vākye na pratipādyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5877: tahyaprādhānye kiṃ yuktamiti siddhāntī pṛṣṭvā pūrvapakṣiṇa
GK16andhvc3u:5883: evaṃ tāvadvācakatvādanyadeva vyañjakatvam; itaśca vācakatvādyvañjakatvasyānyatvaṃ yadvācakatvaṃ śabdaikāśrayamitarattu śabdāśrayamarthāśrayaṃ ca śabdārthayordvayorapi vyañjakatvasya pratipāditatvāt guṇavṛttistūpacāreṇa lakṣaṇayā cobhayāśrayāpi bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:5884: kintu tato 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ svarūpato viṣayataśca bhidyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5886: tacca prādhānye 'pi vidyata iti svarūpamaheyameveti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5892: etacca vitatya dhvanilakṣaṇe 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' iti vāgrahaṇaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:5893: 'vyaṅktaḥ' iti dvirvacanaṃ ca vyācakṣāṇairasmābhiḥ prathamoddyota eva
GK16andhvc3u:5895: evaṃ viṣayabhedātsvarūpabhedātkāraṇabhedācca vācakatvānmukhyātprakāśakatvasya bhedaṃ pratipādyobhayāśrayatvāviśeṣāttarhi vyañjakatvagauṇatvayoḥ ko bheda ityāśaṅkyāmukhyādapi pratipādayitumāha--guṇavṛttiriti /
GK16andhvc3u:5897: bālapriyā śabdasya sambandhī vācyo lakṣyo vārthaḥ tatsambandhitvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5910: vṛttāvita ityanena yadityādivakṣyamāṇaḥ āśrayabhedarūpo hetuḥ parāmṛśyata ityakṣipretya vyācaṣṭe--anenetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:5916: arthasya vayañjakatvāśrayatvaṃ śabdāyattameveti yadyapi śabda eva vācakatvasyeva vyañjakatvasyāpi mukhya āśraya iti kāraṇaikyamasti, tathāpi sahakāribhedātkāraṇarūpasya śabdasya bhedo 'pītyarthaḥ śabdārthayorityādervivaraṇam---etaccetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5918: evaṃ mukhyādvācakatvādabhedaṃ pratipādya amukhyādapi pratipādayitumāheti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5927: na hyarthādyvaṅgyatrayapratītiryā tasyā amukhyatvaṃ manāgapi lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:5934: vyañjakatvamārge tu yadārtho 'rthāntaraṃ dyotayati tadā svarūpaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:5937: yadi ca yatrātiraskṛtasvapratītirartho 'rthāntaraṃ lakṣayati tatra lakṣaṇāvyavahāraḥ kriyate, tadevaṃ sati lakṣaṇaiva mukhyaḥ śabdavyāpāra iti prāptam /
GK16andhvc3u:5939: locanam upacāralakṣaṇayoḥ prathamoddyota eva vibhajya nirṇītaṃ svarūpamiti na punarlikhyate
GK16andhvc3u:5950: bālapriyā ca yā guṇavṛttiḥ sā ubhayāśrayāpīti vṛttau yojaneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:5973: tadanyasthale nanu tvatpakṣe 'pi yadārtho vyaṅgyatrayaṃ prakāśayati tadā śabdasya kīdṛśo vyāpāraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5977: yato vyañjakatvasya rasādayo 'laṅkāraviśeṣā vyaṅgyarūpāvacchinnaṃ vastu ceti trayaṃ viṣayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:5978: tatra rasādipratītirguṇavṛttiriti locanam kīdṛśa iti mukhyo vā na vā prakārāntarābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:5979: makhyatve vācakatvamanyathā guṇavṛttiḥ, guṇonimittaṃ sādṛśyādi taddvārikā
GK16andhvc3u:5981: mukhya evāsau vyāpāraḥ sāmagrobhedācca vācakatvādyvatiricyata ityabhiprayeṇāha--ucyata iti /
GK16andhvc3u:5983: samayānupayogātpṛthagābhāsamānatvācceti tribhiḥ prakāraiḥ prakāśakatvasyaitadviparītarūpatrayāyāśca guṇavṛtteḥ svarūpabhedaṃ vyākhyāya viṣayabhedamapyāha--viṣayabhedo 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:5986: bālapriyā tu syādityāśaṅkya pariharati--'yadi ce' tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:5996: tasminsati kiṃ syādityataḥ krameṇa dūṣaṇamāha--mukhyatva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6021: na kenaciducyate na ca śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6024: tacca na sarvaṃ guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ prasidydhanuroghābhyāmapi gauṇānāṃ śabdānāṃ prayogadarśanāt
GK16andhvc3u:6028: locanam vyañjakatvasya yo viṣayaḥ sa guṇavṛtterna viṣayaḥ anyaśca tasyā viṣayabhedo yojyaḥ tatra prathamaṃ prakāramāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:6033: vastuno yatpūrvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ kṛtaṃ tadyvācaṣṭe--cārutvapratītaya iti /
GK16andhvc3u:6042: na sarvamiti yathāsmābhirvyākhyātaṃ tathā sphuṭayati--yadapi ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6044: adhunetararūpopajīvakatvena taditarasmāttaditararūpopajīvakatvena ca taditarasmādityanena paryāyeṇa vācakatvādguṇavṛtteśca bālapriyā vastumātraṃ bhavatu guṇavṛtterviṣayaḥ vyaṅgyatvāvacchinnantu na
GK16andhvc3u:6050: na ca śakyate vaktumityatra gamyaṃ hetumāha--lakṣaṇetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6080: vyañjakatvaṃ hi kvacidvācakatvāśrayeṇa vyavatiṣṭhate, yathā vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau
GK16andhvc3u:6082: tadubhayāśrayatvapratipādanāyaiva ca dhvaneḥ prathamataraṃ dvau prabhedāvupanyastau /
GK16andhvc3u:6083: tadubhayāśritatvācca tadekarūpatvaṃ tasya na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:6085: na ca lakṣaṇaikarūpamevānyatra locanam dvitayādapi bhinnaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6087: co 'vadhāraṇe bhinnakramaḥ, apiśabdo 'pi na kevalaṃ pūrvokto hetukalāpo yāvattadubhayāśrayatvena mukhyopacārāśrayatvena yadvyavasthānaṃ tadapi vācakaguṇavṛttivilakṣaṇasyaiveti vyāptighaṭanam tenāyaṃ tātparyārthaḥ--tadubhayāśrayatvena
GK16andhvc3u:6134: na ca teṣāṃ vācakatvaṃ lakṣaṇā vā kathañcillakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6136: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvasya darśanādvācakatvādiśabdadharmaprakāratvamayuktaṃ vaktum
GK16andhvc3u:6137: yadi ca vācakatvalakṣaṇādīnāṃ śabdaprakārāṇāṃ prasiddhaprakāravilakṣaṇatve 'pi vyañjakatvaṃ prakāratvena parikalpyate tacchabdasyaiva prakāratvena kasmānna parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6165: vṛttau 'śabdaprakārāṇām' iti nirdhāraṇe ṣaṣṭhī, prakāratvenetyanenāsya sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6173: parikalpanaṃ tadevaṃ śābde vyavahāre trayaḥ prakārāḥ---vācakatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6175: tatra vyañjakatve yadā vyaṅgyaprādhānyaṃ tadā dhvaniḥ, tasya cāvivakṣitavācyo vivakṣitānyaparavācyaśceti dvau prabhedāvanukrāntau prathamataraṃ tau savistaraṃ nirṇītau /
GK16andhvc3u:6176: anyo brūyāt--nanu vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau guṇavṛttitā locanam vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvāmiti yadi paryāyau kalpyete tarhi vyañjakatvaṃ śabda
GK16andhvc3u:6177: ityapa paryāyatā kasmānna kalpyate, icchāyā avyāhatatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6178: vyañjakatvasya tu viviktaṃ svarūpaṃ darśitaṃ tadviṣayāntare kathaṃ viparyastatām /
GK16andhvc3u:6179: evaṃ hi parvatagato dhūmo 'nagnijo 'pi syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6182: nanu vācaktvarūpopajīvakatvādguṇavṛttyanujīvakatvāditi ca hetudvayaṃ yaduktaṃ tadavivakṣitavācyabhāge siddhaṃ na bhavati tasya
GK16andhvc3u:6184: yadyapi ca tasya tadubhayāśrayatvena vyavasthānāditi brūvatā
GK16andhvc3u:6185: nirṇītacaramevaitat, tathāpi guṇavṛtteravivakṣitavācyasya ca durnirūpaṃ vailakṣaṇyaṃ yaḥ paśyati taṃ pratyāśaṅkānivāraṇārtho 'yamupakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6203: vācakāśrayaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ vācakatvādimūlaṃ na cetparvatagato dhūmo
GK16andhvc3u:6204: 'nagnijaśca syādato viparyāso na yukta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6215: la avivakṣitavācyasyeti dhvaneśeṣa ritiḥ yo vailakṣaṇyaṃ durnirūpaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6221: guṇavṛttivyavahāraḥ, na hi guṇavṛttau yadā nimittena kenacidviṣayāntare
GK16andhvc3u:6226: guṇavṛttivyavahārābhāve hetuṃ darśayituṃ tasyā eva guṇavṛttestāvadvṛttāntaṃ darśayati--na hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:6227: guṇatayā vṛttirvyāpāro guṇavṛttiḥ guṇena nimittena sādṛśyādinā ca vṛttiḥ arthāntaraviṣaye 'pi śabdasya sāmānādhikaraṇyamiti gaumaṃ darśayati /
GK16andhvc3u:6228: yadā vā svārthamiti bālapriyā ayamupakramaḥ vṛttikāropakramaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6251: ata eva ca vivakṣitānyaparavācye dhvanau vācyavācakayodvayorapi svarūpapratītirarthāvagamanaṃ dṛśyata iti vyañjakatvavyavahāro yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6252: svarūpaṃ prakāśayannepa parāvabhāsako vyañjaka ityucyate, tathāvidhe viṣaye vācakatvasyaiva vyañjakatvamiti guṇavṛttivyavahāro niyamenaiva na śakyate kartum /
GK16andhvc3u:6255: ata eva atyantatiraskṛtasvārthaśabdena viṣayāntaramākrāmati cetyanena śabdena tadeva bhedadvayaṃ darśayati--ata eva ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6256: yata eva na tatroktatahetubalādguṇavṛttavyavahāro nyāyyastata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6258: ucyata iti pradīpādiḥ, indriyādestu karaṇatvānna vyañjakatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6261: uktaguṇavṛttiśabdārthābhiprāyeṇa 'yadā nimittene' tyādigranthena gauṇīṃ 'yadā vā svārthami' tyādagranthena lakṣaṇāñca darśayatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6269: vivakṣitavācyatvaṃ tadā na hyupapadyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6272: gaṅgādiśabdo hi gaṅgātīratvādinā kevalatīratvādinā vā gaṅgāyāstīrameva
GK16andhvc3u:6282: nanu vyañjakatvaṃ jñāpakatvaṃ, tattu mukhyamindriyādestataḥ kiṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6293: tasya prabhedadvaye guṇavṛttiprabhedadvayarūpatā lakṣyata eva yataḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6297: vyañjakatvaṃ ca yathoktacārutvahetuṃ locanam evamabhyupagamaṃ pradarśakṣepaṃ darśayati---avivakṣiteti
GK16andhvc3u:6300: avivakṣitavācyasya yatprabhedadvayaṃ tasmin gaumalākṣaṇikatvātmakaṃ prakāradvayaṃ lakṣyate nirbhāsyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6302: gumavṛtteryomārgaḥ prabhedadvayaṃ sa āśrayo nimittatayā prākkakṣyāniveśī yasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6306: nanu vyañjaktvena kathaṃ śūnyā guṇāvṛttirbhavati, yataḥ pūrvamevoktam--
GK16andhvc3u:6308: yaduddiśya phalaṃ tatra śabdo naiva skhaladgatiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:6310: na hi prayojanaśūnya upacāraḥ prayojanāṃśaniveśī ca vyañjanavyāpāra iti bhavadbhirevābhyādhāyītyāśaṅkyābhimataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ viśrāntisthānarūpaṃ tatra nāstītyāha--vyañjakatvaṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6321: nanu guṇavṛttirhi vyañjakatvaśūnyāpi dṛśyata ityanenaivāvivikṣitavācyasya guṇavṛttirūpatvābhāve siddhe vyañjakatvañcetyādigranthaḥ kimarthaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6330: vyañjakatvaṃ na vyañjanakaraṇatvamātramatra vivakṣitaṃ, kintu viśrāntisthānabhūtavyañjanakaraṇatvam
GK16andhvc3u:6334: sā abedopacārarūpā yathetyādyanvayo yāpītyādivākye vācyetyādervyaṅgyetyādeścānuṣaṅgaśca bodhyaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6340: yathā ca 'priye jane nāsti punaruktam' ityādau /
GK16andhvc3u:6341: yāpi lakṣaṇarūpā guṇavṛttiḥ sāpyupalakṣaṇīyārthasaṃbandhamātrāśrayeṇa cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītiṃ vināpi sambhavatyeva, yathā--mañcāḥ krośantītyādau viṣaye /
GK16andhvc3u:6347: cārurūpaṃ viśrāntisthānaṃ, tadabhāve sa vyañjakatvavyāpāro naivonmīlati,
GK16andhvc3u:6354: yathā pīno devadatto divā na bhuṅkta ityādau śrutasya pīnatvāde rupapādakatayā rātribhojanādikaṃ kalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6355: kalpitasya tasyārthāntarasya pīnatvādyupapādana eva paryavasānañca tathā guṇavṛttisthale 'rthāntarasya lakṣyasya padāntarābhidheyārthopapādana eva
GK16andhvc3u:6359: priya iti tīkṣṇatvādatyādivadguṇarūpahetukathanaṃ punaruktapadenānupādeyatvaṃ lakṣyata iti pūrvamevoktam /
GK16andhvc3u:6360: eṣūdāharaṇeṣu tīkṣṇatvādiguṇānāmādhikyaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ, tattu na cārutvakārīti
GK16andhvc3u:6363: upalaṇīyo lakṣyo yo 'rtho mañjasthabālakādistena saha yassambandha
GK16andhvc3u:6367: atra mañcasthabālakānāṃ bahutvādakaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tadapi na cārutvakāri /
GK16andhvc3u:6369: nanu vināpi cāruvyaṅgyapratītiṃ vyañjanāvyāpāro bhavatvityata āha--tadabhāva ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6375: kṣaṇa eva dṛṣṭo naṣṭaśca divyavibhavo yasya saḥ tathāvidho yaḥ prākṛto daridraḥ puruṣaḥ tadvat
GK16andhvc3u:6376: tasya yathā pratyāvṛtya prākṛtavibhāva eva tathā vyañjanāvyāpārasya yatra tu sā cārurūpavyaṅgyapratītihetustatrāpi vyañjakatvānupraveśenaiva vācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6377: asambhavinā cārthena yatra vyavahāraḥ, yathā---'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm'
GK16andhvc3u:6379: locanam nanu yatra vyaṅgye 'rthe viśrāntistatra kiṃ kartavyamityāśaṅkyāha--yatra tviti
GK16andhvc3u:6382: vācakatve hi tvayaivāṅgīkṛto vyañjanavyāpāraḥ prathamaṃ dhvaniprabhedamapratyācakṣaṇeneti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6383: kiñca vastvantare mukhye sambhavati sambhavadeva vastvantaraṃ mukhyamevāropyate viṣayāntaramātratastvāropavyavahāra
GK16andhvc3u:6384: jīvitamupacārasya, suvarṇapuṣpāṇāṃ tu mūlata evāsambhavāttaduccayanasya tatra ka āropavyavahāraḥ; 'suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīm' iti hi syādāropaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6385: tasmādatra vyañjanavyāpāra eva pradhānabhūto nāropavyavahāraḥ, sa paraṃ vyañjanavyāpārānarodhitayottiṣṭhati
GK16andhvc3u:6388: vyaṅgyameva hi prayojanarūpaṃ pratītiviśrāmasthāmāropite tvasambhavati pratitiviśrāntirāśaṅkanīyāpi na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6406: nanu tayorubhayossatve kuta āropavyavahāra ityata āha---viṣayāntaramātrata
GK16andhvc3u:6418: nanu tarhi suvarṇapuṣpāṃ pṛthivīmiti prayogaḥ kathamupapadyata ityata
GK16andhvc3u:6430: nanvasambhavadapi viṣaye guṇavṛttau satyāmapi dhvanivyavahāra eva yuktyanurodhī /
GK16andhvc3u:6431: tasmādavivakṣitavācye dhvanau dvayorapi prabhedayorvyañjakatvaviśeṣāviśiṣṭā gumavṛttirna tu tadekarūpā sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā pratītihetutvādviyaṣāntare locanam satyāmapīti vyañjanavyāpārasampattaye kṣaṇamātramavalambitāyāmiti bhāvaḥ. tasmāditi /
GK16andhvc3u:6432: vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yo viśeṣastenāviśiṣṭā avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣo bhedanaṃ yasyāḥ vyañjakatvaṃ na tasyā bheda ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6433: yadi vā vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena vyāpāraviśeṣemāviśiṣṭā nyakkṛtasvābhāvā āsamantādvyāptā /
GK16andhvc3u:6435: tena vyañjakatvalakṣaṇena sahaikaṃ rūpaṃ yasyāḥ sā tathāvidhā na bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:6437: vivakṣitavācyaniṣṭhavyañjakatvavat, na hi guṇavṛtteścārupratītihetutvamastīti bālapriyā vyaṅgyamātrānvitamāropitameva pratītiviśrāntisthānamastu, kiṃsa cārarūpavyaṅgyasamāśrayaṇenetyata āha--āropita ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6448: vyañjakatvaprādhānyasyānyāprādhānyasya ca pratipāditasyopasaṃhāraparatayāpyetaṃ granthaṃ vyācaṣṭe--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6451: yadvā viśiṣṭaṃ viśeṣaḥ ādaraḥ avidyamānaṃ viśiṣṭaṃ yasyāsseti
GK16andhvc3u:6456: nanu tathāpi guṇavṛttervyañjakatvaikarūpatvamastviti śaṅkāyāmuktaṃ, na tu tadekarūpeti tadvivṛṇoti--tenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6459: yato guṇavṛttiḥ sahṛdayahṛdayāhlādinī pratīyamānā ca na bhavatyato na tadekarūpeti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6460: vyaṅgyagataṃ sahṛdayahṛdayāhṇādakatvaṃ pratīyamānatvañca vyañjakatve samāropya guṇavṛttestanniṣedhapūrvaktaṃ tadekarūpatvaṃ niṣiddhamiti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6472: api ca vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yaḥ śabdārthayorgharmaḥ sa prasiddhasambandhānurodhīti na kasyācidvimativiṣayatāmarbahati
GK16andhvc3u:6473: śabdārtharyorhi prasiddho yaḥ sambandho vācyavācakabhāvākhyāstamanurundhāna eva vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo vyāpāraḥ sāmagrantarasambandhādaupādhikaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:6474: ata eva vācakatvāttasya viśeṣaḥ vācakatvaṃ hi śabdaviśeṣasya niyata ātmā vyutpattikālādārabhya tadavinābhāvena tasya prasiddhatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6479: niyatasvabhāvācca vācyavācakatvādaupādhikatvenāniyataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ kathaṃ na bhinnanimittamiti darśayati--api ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:6484: athāpi cetyādigrantho 'bhāvavādinaḥ prati sthūṇānikhanananyāyena vyañjakatvasādhaka ityabhiprāyeṇāvatārayati--niyatetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:6496: nanu sāmagryantarasambandhajanitatve 'pyayaṃ vyāpāro vācakavyāpāratvādabhidhaivāstvityata āha--ata evetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6512: naiṣa doṣaḥ; yataḥ śabdātmani tasyāniyatatvam, na tu sve viṣaye vyaṅgyalakṣaṇe /
GK16andhvc3u:6515: tathaivedaṃ yathā darśitaṃ locanam saphuṭayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:6518: aniyatatvādyathāruci kalpyeta pāramārthikaṃ rūpaṃ nāstīti; na cāvastunaḥ parīkṣopapadyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6522: na hi dhūme vahnigamakatvaṃ sadātanam,anyagamakatvasya vahnyagamakatvasya ca darśanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6551: yasya yaraya vyaṅgyo 'rtho vidyate tasya tasya
GK16andhvc3u:6566: śabdātmanyaniyatatvādeva ca tasya vācakatvaprakāratā na śakyā kalpayitum /
GK16andhvc3u:6567: yadi hi vācakatvaprakāratā tasya bhavettacchabdātmani niyatatāpi syādvācakatvavat /
GK16andhvc3u:6568: sa ca tathāvidha aupādhiko dharmaḥ śabdānāmautpattikaśabdārthasambanthavādinā vākyatattvavidā pauruṣāpauruṣeyayorvākyayorviśeṣamabhidadhatā niyamenābhyupagantavyaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6569: tadanabhyupagame hi tasya śabdārthasambandhanityatve satyapyapauruṣeyapauruṣeyayorvākyayorarthapratipādane locanam svasminviṣaye ca gṛhīte trairūpyādau na vyabhicarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6573: janmanā dvitīyo bhāvavikāraḥ sattārūpaḥ sāmīpyāllaṇāto vānutpattiḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6575: vyāptisusmūrṣā hetau sādhyasya yā vyāptiḥ, tatsmaraṇecchā /
GK16andhvc3u:6577: pakṣadharmatājijñāsādīnāmanumitiṃ prati prayojakatvaṃ prācīnābhyupagataṃ tadvārā ca liṅgatvasya tadadhīnatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6585: tatra trairūpyasya liṅge abādhitatvādessādhye ca grahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6586: na vyabhicaratīti jñāpakatvaṃ svaviṣaye na vyabhicaratītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6587: svaviṣayāvyabhicārīti vṛttestu jñāpakatvasya viṣaye jñāpye vahnyādau na vyabhicaratītyevārthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6592: nanvevaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ na kasya cidvimativiṣayatāmarhantītyuktamayuktaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvalakṣaṇasya śabdārthasambandhasyāniyatatvenautpattikasūtravirodhādityāśaṅkāṃ sa cetyādigranthena pariharatītyavatārayati--na kasyacidityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6596: kṛtyoktam 'autpattikastu śabdasyārthena sambandha' ityādijaiminīyaṃ sūtraṃ manasi kṛtyoktam 'autpattike'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6600: jāyate asti vardhate vipariṇamate apakṣīyate naśyatīti ṣaṅvikārā bhāvānāmuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6601: tatra dvitīyassattārūpo vikāraḥ utpattipadārthena janmanā sāmīpyānnimittāllakṣyata ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6604: tadabhyupagame tu pauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāṃ puruṣecchānuvidhānasamāropitaupādhikavyāpārāntarāṇāṃ satyapi svābhidheyasambandhāparityāge mithyārthatāpi bhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:6605: locanam rūḍhyā vā autpattikaśabdo nityaparyāyaḥ tena nityaṃ yaḥ śabdārthayoḥ śaktilakṣaṇaṃ saṃbandhamicchati jaimineyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6607: tataśca puruṣadoṣānupraveśasyākiñcitkaratvāttannibandhaṃ pauruṣeyeṣu vākyeṣu yadaprāmāṇyaṃ tanna sidhyet /
GK16andhvc3u:6608: pratipattureva hi yaditathā pratipattistarhi vākyasya na kaścidaparādha iti kathamaprāmāṇyam
GK16andhvc3u:6610: bālapriyā ityanuṣaṅgaḥ virodharūpasambandhena nimittena janmanā tpattirlakṣyata ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6628: nirviśeṣatvaṃ syādityatreṣṭāpattiṃ parihartuṃ nirviśeṣatve doṣaṃ darśayati--tataścetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:6630: puruṣe vaktari yaḥ kādācitko doṣasya bhramāderanupraveśaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:6635: pauruṣeyeṣu laukikeṣu vākyeṣu ayathārthavākyeṣu aprāmāṇyam yathārthatvanimittakamaprāmāṇyam
GK16andhvc3u:6648: puruṣecchāyāḥ vaktṛpuruṣābhiprāyasyānuvidhānāddhetoḥ samāropitaṃ kalpitamata evaupādhikañca yadvyāpārāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣāmityarthaḥ /
