GK16andhvc3u:6650: tathā hi--himamayūkhaprabhṛtīnāṃ nirvāpitasakalajīvalokaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmeva priyāvirahadahanadahyamānamānasairjanairālokyamānānāṃ satāṃ santāpakāritvaṃ prasiddhameva /
GK16andhvc3u:6655: pauruṣeyāṇi ca vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayanti /
GK16andhvc3u:6656: sa ca vyaṅgya eva locanam nanu dharmāntarābhyupagame 'pi kathaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6657: mithyārthatā, na hi prakāśakatvalakṣaṇaṃ svadharmaṃ jahāti śabda
GK16andhvc3u:6660: yadāha--”evamayaṃ puruṣā vedeti bhavati pratyayaḥ na tvevamayamartha” iti
GK16andhvc3u:6661: tathā prāmāṇāntaradarśanamatra bādhyate, na tu bālapriyā
GK16andhvc3u:6672: sāmagnyantarasampātena sampāditamata evaupādhikaṃ dharmāntaraṃ yeṣu teṣām
GK16andhvc3u:6676: tathāvidhaṃ śītalatvamudvahatāmityanenāparityaktasvabhāvatvaṃ priyāvirahetyādanā sāmagryantaretyādyuktaṃ santāpakāritvamityanena viruddhakriyatvañca darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6679: pauruṣeyāṇi vākyāni prādhānyena puruṣābhiprāyameva prakāśayantītyatra jaiminisūtrabhāṣyakṛdvacanaṃ pramāṇayati--yadāheti /
GK16andhvc3u:6691: nanvaneva nyāyena sarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāṃ dhvanivyavahāraḥ prasaktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6693: satyametat; kiṃ tu vakrabhiprāyuprakāśanena yadvyañjakatvaṃ tatsarveṣāmeva laukikānāṃ vākyānāmaviśiṣṭam
GK16andhvc3u:6694: tattu vācakatvānna bhidyate vyaṅgyaṃ hi tatra nāntarīyakatayā vyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:6699: bālapriyā nanvastu puruṣābhiprāyo vyaṅgyaḥ vyāpārāntarañca vyañjakatvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6701: tathā abhiprāyavyañjakatvena prakāreṇa atra pauruṣeyavākye viṣaye /
GK16andhvc3u:6716: apauruṣeyāṇāṃ vākyānāntu vakturabhāvena teṣāṃ sarveṣāmeva prāmāṇyañceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:6721: anena śabdasya vyaṅgyena saha yassambandhastasya vācyavācakabhāvatvaṃ nāstīti darśitaṃ, tatra hetumāha locane--aniyatatvādityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6730: yadvyajakatvaṃ tattu vācakatvānna bhidyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6735: yasya tu vivakṣitatvena vyaṅgyasya sthitiḥ tadyvañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakam /
GK16andhvc3u:6742: kāvyavākyebhyo hi na nayanānayanādyupayoginī pratītirabhyarthyate, api tu pratītiviśrāntikāriṇī, sā cābhiprāyaniṣṭhaina nābhipretavastuparyavasānā /
GK16andhvc3u:6751: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādyvaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6756: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata
GK16andhvc3u:6769: nanu sāpi vācyaparyavasāyinyastu, tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya
GK16andhvc3u:6775: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6777: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6787: yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6788: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya ghvanivyavahārasya na prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6789: tathā darśitabhedatrayarūpaṃ tātparyeṇa dyotyamānamabhiprāyarūpamanabhiprāyarūpaṃ ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣa dhavnilakṣaṇe nātivyāptirna cāvyāptiḥ tasmādvākyatattvavidhāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6791: 'yaṃ dhvanivyavahāra iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra sāstīti darśayati--parinisciteti /
GK16andhvc3u:6792: paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ śabdākhyaṃ prakāśaparāmarthasvabhāvaṃ brahma vyāpakatvena bṛhadviśeṣaśaktinirbharatayā ca bṛṃhitaṃ viśvanirmāṇaśaktīśvaratvācca bṛṃhaṇam yairiti /
GK16andhvc3u:6800: gokarmakānayanādikriyārūpārthaṃ vinā abhiprāyāsiddhirataśca na vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvaṃ vācyādvyaṅgyamiveti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6805: nanu dhvanyudāharaṇeṣvapi laukikavākyeṣviva vivakṣitatvāparaparyāyaṃ prādhānyaṃ vācyasya vidyata
GK16andhvc3u:6818: nanu sāpi vācyaparyaṃvasāyinyastu, tanmūlakatvāditi kathaṃ vyaṅgyasya
GK16andhvc3u:6824: ataśca vācyasya na vivakṣitatvalakṣaṇaṃ prādhānyaṃ kāvyavākyeṣviti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6826: vṛttāvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ yadyvaṅgyantu tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sacchaśabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśyate tadvivakṣitaṃ bhavatīti śambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6835: guṇībhūtvayaṅgyasthale 'bhiprāyarūpavyaṅgyasya yattvabhiprāyaviśeṣarūpaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ śabdārthābhyāṃ prakāśate tadbhavati vivakṣitaṃ tātparyeṇa prakāśyamānaṃ sat /
GK16andhvc3u:6836: kintu tadeva kevalamaparimitaviṣayasya dhvanivyavahārasya ya prayojakamavyāpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:6837: tathā darśitabhedatrayarūpaṃ tātparyeṇa dyotyamānamabhiprāyarūpamanabhiprāyarūpaṃ ca sarvameva dhvanivyavahārasya prayojakamiti yathoktavyañjakatvaviśeṣe dhvanilakṣaṇe nātivyāptirna cāvyāptiḥ tasmādvākyattvavidāṃ matena tāvadyvañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śābdo vyāpāro na virodhī pratyutānuguṇa eva lakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:6838: pariniścitanirapabhraṃśaśabdabrahmaṇāṃ vipaścitāṃ matamāśrityaiva dhvanivyavahāra iti locanam evaṃ mīmāṃsakānāṃ nātra vimatiryukteti pradarśya vaiyākaraṇānāṃ naivātra sāstīti darśayati--pariniściteti paritaḥ niścitaṃ pramāṇena sthāpitaṃ nirapabhraṃśaṃ galitabhedaprapañcatayā avidyāsaṃskārarahitaṃ śabdākhyaṃ prakāśaparāmarśasvabhāvaṃ brahma vyāpakatvena bṛhadviśeṣaśaktinirbharatayā bṛṃhitaṃ viśvanirmāṇaśaktīśvaratvācca bṛṃhaṇam yairiti /
GK16andhvc3u:6849: paritaḥ bahumukhānvādinaḥ prati doṣaviśeṣavācināpabhraṃśaśabdenātra sarvadoṣaheturavidyāsaṃskāro lakṣyata ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe--galitetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6854: śabda ityartha iti cākhyā yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:6861: viśeṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6865: viseṣāṇāṃ vyaṣṭirūpāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ śaktibhirnirbharatāpūrṇatā tayā cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6870: viśvasya yāni nirmāṇāni tadviṣayā yāḥ śaktayaḥ taiḥ saha kiṃ virodhāvirodhau cintyete /
GK16andhvc3u:6871: kṛtrimaśabdārthasambandhavādināṃ tu yuktividāmanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ vyañjakabhāvaḥ śabdānāmarthāntarāṇāmivāvirodhaśceti na pratikṣepyapadavīmavatarati /
GK16andhvc3u:6873: tatra kā kathā vācakatvavyañjakatvayoḥ, avidyāpade tu tairapi
GK16andhvc3u:6876: evaṃ vākyavidāṃ padavidāṃ cāvimativiṣayatvaṃ pradarśya māṇatattvavidāṃ tārkikāṇāmapi na yuktātra vimatiriti darśayitumāha--kṛtrimeti /
GK16andhvc3u:6877: kṛtrimaḥ saṅketamātrasvabhāvaḥ parikalpitaḥ śabdārthayoḥ sambandha iti ye vadanti naiyāyikasaugatādayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6889: vācakalakṣaṇasya śabdasya vācakatvātpṛthagvyañjakatvāṅgīkāre virodhāvirodhau mīmāṃsakavaccintanīyāviti taissaha kimityādyuktamayuktamiti śaṅkāyāṃ tātparyamāha--etaduktamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6910: asya śabdasyāyamartha ityupadeśassa iti ca kecit /
GK16andhvc3u:6921: vācakatve hi tārkikāṇāṃ vipratipattayaḥ pravartantām, kimidaṃ svābhāvikaṃ śabdānāmāhosvitsāmayikamityādyāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6922: vyañjakatve tu tatpṛṣṭhabhāvini bhāvāntarasādhāraṇe lokaprasiddha evānugamyamāne ko vimatīnāmavasaraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6923: locanam nanvanubhavena dvicandrādyapi siddhaṃ tacca vimatipadamityāśaṅkyāha--avirodhaśceti
GK16andhvc3u:6924: avidyamāno virodho nirodho bādhakātmako dvitīyena jñānena yasya tenānubhavasiddhaścābādhitaścetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:6927: naitat; na hi vācakatve sā vimatiḥ, api tu vācakatvasya
GK16andhvc3u:6932: akṣinikocādeḥ sāṅketikatvaṃ cakṣurādikasyānādiryogyateti dṛṣṭvā bālapriyā yathā dīpādiḥ parikalpitanijaviṣayādanyaṃ viṣayamapi prakāśayati, tathā śabdo 'pi saṅketitādanyaṃ viṣayaṃ prakāśayatīti teṣāmapyanubhavasiddha evāyaṃ śabdānāṃ vyañjakabhāva iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6936: taccetyasya sthāne na ca neti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6949: vācakatve dharmiṇi na vimatiḥ, kintu tatra naisargikatvādidharma
GK16andhvc3u:6956: vācakatvasya vipratipattiviṣayatvaṃ vyañjakatvasya tadabhāvañca darśayan bhāvamāha--akṣītyādi
GK16andhvc3u:6966: alaukike hyarthe tārkikāṇāṃ vimatayo nikhilāḥ pravartante na tu laukike /
GK16andhvc3u:6967: na hi nīlamadhurādhiṣvaśeṣalokendriyagocare bāghārahite tattve parasparaṃ vipratipannā dṛśyante
GK16andhvc3u:6968: na hi bādhārahitaṃ nīlaṃ nīlamiti bruvannapareṇa pratiṣidhyate naitannīlaṃ pītametaditi /
GK16andhvc3u:6969: tathaiva vyañjakatvaṃ vācakānāṃ śabdānāmavācakānāṃ ca gītadhvanīnāmaśabdarūpāṇāṃ ca ceṣṭādīnāṃ locanam kāmamastu saṃśayaḥ śabdasyābhidheyaprakāśane vyañjakatvaṃ tu yādṛśamekarūpaṃ bhāvāntareṣu tādṛgeva prakṛte 'pīti niścataikarūpe kaḥ saṃśayasyāvakāśa ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6970: naitannīlamiti nīle hi na bipratipattiḥ, api tu prādhānikamidaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:6971: pāramāṇavamidaṃ jñānamātramidaṃ tucchadamiti tatsṛṣṭāvalaukikya eva vipratipattayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6975: 'pyādyasyārthena saha sambandhasya sāṅkatikatvaṃ dvitīyasyārthena saha sambandhasya naisargikatvañca dṛṣṭverthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6977: śabdasya vācakatve kimidaṃ sāṅketikamāhosvinnaisargikamiti vācakatvadharmikassaṃśayaḥ kāmaṃ bhavatvityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:6983: na tu laukika ityuktamupapādayati vṛttau 'na hī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:6999: etanna nīlametatpītamiti na hi pratiṣidhyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7001: nīle etanna nīlamiti vipratipattirna hīti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7005: api tbityalaukikya eva vipratipattaya iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7024: aśabdamarthaṃ ramaṇīyaṃ hi sūcayanto vyāhārāstathā vyāpārā nibaddhāścānibaddhāśca vidagghapariṣatsu vividhā vibhāvyante /
GK16andhvc3u:7025: tānupahāsyatāmātmanaḥ pariharan ko 'tisandadhīta sacetāḥ locanam aśabdamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7031: lakṣaṇe śatrādeśaḥ ātmanaḥ karmabhūtasya yopahasanīyatā tasyāḥ parihāreṇepalakṣitastāṃ parijīhīrṣurityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7046: yenārthaṃsyāśabdatvaṃ ramaṇīyatvañca bhavati, tathābhūto vyāpāro vyañjakatvalakṣaṇo yeṣāṃ tathābhūtā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7081: vyañjakatvamityādigranthasya brūyāt, astyatisandhānāvasaraḥ vyañjakatvaṃ śabdānāṃ gamakatvaṃ tacca liṅgatvamataśca vyaṅgyapratītirliṅgipratītireveti liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva teṣāṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo nāparaḥ kaścit /
GK16andhvc3u:7082: ataścaitadavaśyameva boddhavyaṃ yasmādvakrabhiprāyāpekṣayā vyañjakatvamidānīmeva tvayā pratipāditaṃ vakrabhiprāyaścānumeyarūpa eva /
GK16andhvc3u:7089: vyañjakatvaṃ nāpahnūyate tattvatiriktaṃ na bhavati api tu liṅgiliṅgabhāva evāyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7094: śabdasya vyāpāraḥ san viṣayaḥ śabdavyāpāraviṣayaḥ, anye tu bālapriyā
GK16andhvc3u:7105: paroktaṃ svīkṛtyāpi svasiddhāntasthāpanāya yo vādassa prauñavādaḥ taṃ vadatīti prauḍhavādī, tasya bhāvastatta tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7110: vṛttau 'tat kiṃ naḥ chinnam' ityuktasyaiva vivaraṇam--'vācakatve'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7112: prasiddho yaśśabdasya prakāro dharmo 'bhidhā lakṣaṇā ca tadvilakṣaṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7120: vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvamastvityuktyā siddhaṃ nassamīhitamiti manyamānaṃ pūrvapakṣiṇaṃ pratyāha--'na punari'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7122: na punarayaṃ paramārtho yadvyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvameva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiśca liṅgipratītireveti
GK16andhvc3u:7123: yadapi svapakṣasiddhaye 'smaduktamanūditaṃ tvayā vakrabhiprāyasya vyaṅgyatvenābhyupagamāttatprakāśane śabdānāṃ liṅgatvameveti
GK16andhvc3u:7127: vivakṣā ca śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchā śabdenārthaprakāśanecchā ceti dviprakārā /
GK16andhvc3u:7131: te tu dve apyanumeyo viṣayaḥ śabdānām /
GK16andhvc3u:7134: prayoktā hi kadācitsvaśabdenārthe locanam śabdasya yo vyāpārastasya viṣayo viśeṣa ityāhuḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7139: śabda uccarite yāvati bālapriyā iti yadayaṃ punarna paramārthaṃ iti
GK16andhvc3u:7142: liṅgiliṅgabhāvena liṅginirūpitaliṅgatvena śūnyaḥ vinā kṛtaḥ tadasamānādhikaraṇa iti yāvat
GK16andhvc3u:7143: śūnye iti pāṭhe pradīpālokādāvityasya viśeṣaṇaṃ tat /
GK16andhvc3u:7150: yadi hi vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvo liṅgiliṅgabhāva eva syānna tadatiriktaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:7151: tarhi yatra yatra vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvastatra tatra liṅgiliṅgabhāvo 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:7152: bhavet, na cāsāvasti pradīpādau vyabhicāradarśanādatastayoraikyanna bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7153: nanu vaktrabhiprāyasya vyañjakatvantu śabdasya liṅgatvameva vaktṛjñānānumāpakatvaṃ śabdasyeti vadatāṃ prābhākarāṇāṃ matasya saṃvādakatvādityāśaṅkāyāmuktaṃ vṛttau 'yadapī'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7162: tatra śabdaprayuyukṣā arthapratipipādayiṣā cetyubhayyapi vivakṣānumeyā tāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7163: yastu pratipipādayiṣāyāṃ karmabhūto 'rthasyatra śabdaḥ karaṇatvena vyavasthitaḥ na tvasāvanumeyaḥ, tadviṣayā hi pratipipādayiṣaiva
GK16andhvc3u:7165: na ca tatra śabdasyakaraṇatve yaiva liṅgasyetikartavyatā pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā sāsti, api bālapriyā uccaritaśabdajanyapratipattiviṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7171: śabdasvarūpaprakāśanecchayoccaritena śabdenāyaṃ prāṇīti śroturyā prāṇitvamātrasya pratipattiḥ mātrapadenārthasya vyavacchedaḥ sā phalaṃ yasyāssetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7175: śabdaviśeṣasya pratipipādayiṣitārthabodhānukūlasya vākyasya yadavadhāraṇaṃ vakturanusandhānaṃ tasminnavasitā paryavasitā tadutpādanena kṛtārtheti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7176: ata eva vyavahitāpi śābdabodhaṃ prati vyavadhānavatyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:7178: śabdenārthaviśeṣasyāvadhāraṇe śroturbodhe avasitā paramparayā tadutpādiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:7181: śabdaḥ karaṇaṃ yasya tathābhūto vyavahāraśśābdabodhaḥ, tasyanibandhanaṃ nimittamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7195: pratipādanaṃ prati karaṇatvāttathāvidhārthaṃ prati karaṇatvaṃ bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7202: pakṣadharmatvagrahaṇādikā liṅgasyetikartavyatā yā sā tatra śabdasya karaṇatvena cāstīti yojanā
GK16andhvc3u:7210: tattacchabdasya tattadarthe yassaṅketastasya sphuraṇaṃ smaraṇaṃ sa tu dvividho 'pi pratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitayā svarūpeṇa prakāśate,
GK16andhvc3u:7212: vivakṣāviṣayatvaṃ hi tasyārthasya śabdairliṅgitayā pratīyate na tu svarūpam /
GK16andhvc3u:7213: yadi hi liṅgitayā tatra sabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ syattacchabdārthe locanam tvanyaiva saṃketasphuraṇādikā tanna tatra śabdo liṅgam /
GK16andhvc3u:7214: itikartavyatā ca dvidhā--ekayābhidhāvyāpāraṃ karoti ditīyayā vyañjanāvyāpāram /
GK16andhvc3u:7240: gopanakṛtaṃ yatsaundaryaṃ sūkticārutvaṃ tadāderyo lābho niṣpattistadabhisandhānādikayetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7258: ayamarthassatyaḥ, ayamartho mithyā ityādayo viruddhā vādāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7259: ayamarthassatyo mithyā vetyādisaṃśayāśca vastutaḥ pravartante tatpravṛttirna syādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7262: tatra yathā tadvivādā na pravartante tathetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7265: samyaṅ mithyātvāda vivādā eva na pravarteran dhūmādiliṅgānumitānumeyāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:7271: vaktricchā hi vācyāderarthasya bālapriyā kenacilliṅgena kasyacidarthasyānumitirniścayarūpaiva bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7274: nanu vyaṅgyatvenābhimatasyārthasya śabdena sambandhe sati tatra
GK16andhvc3u:7275: vyāpārassiddhyati, sa eva netyāśaṅkāyāmuktameva smārayati vṛttau 'vyaṅgyaścārthaṃ' ityādi
GK16andhvc3u:7281: nanu vācyasya sākṣātsambandhaḥ vyaṅgyasya tu taddvāraka ityata
GK16andhvc3u:7284: ata eva saṃyogasaṃyuktasamavāyādīnāṃ sannikarṣatvābhidhānaṃ saṅgacchata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7285: vyaṅgyasya vācyasāmarthyākṣiptatayā tena saha sambandhasya vācyadhaṭitatvamuktaṃ draḍhīkartuṃ pūrvoktaṃ smārayati--'vācye'tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7307: vyaṅgyatvenābhimato 'rtho na śabdasya liṅgaliṅgibhāvena sambandhī śabdapratipādyatvādvācyavadityanumānamanena darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:7316: upādhiśabdo 'tra vyāvartakaparyāya ityāśayena vyācaṣṭe locane vaktricchetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7318: anena vaktrāyamartho vivakṣita iti pratītau vivakṣā hyarthasya viśeṣeṇatvena bhāsate /
GK16andhvc3u:7319: tasmādityuktaṃ draḍhayituṃ pūrvoktameva smārayati eva vyaṅgye liṅgtayā śabdānāṃ vyāpāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7321: pratiyamāne tasminnabhiprāyarūpe 'nabhiprāyarūpe ca vācakatvenaiva vyāpāraḥ samnbandhāntareṇa vā /
GK16andhvc3u:7324: na ca vyañjakatvaṃ liṅgatvarūpameva ālokādiṣvanyathā dṛṣṭatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7325: tasmātpratipādyo viṣayaḥ śabdānāṃ na liṅgitvena sambandhī vācyavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7326: yo hi liṅgitvena teṣāṃ sambandhī yathā darśito viṣayaḥ sa na vācyatvena pratīyate, api tūpādhitvena /
GK16andhvc3u:7327: pratipādhasya ca viṣayasya liṅgitve tadviṣayāṇāṃ vipratipattīnāṃ laukikaireva kriyamāṇānāmabhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7336: icchāyāṃ loko na vipratipadyate 'rthe tu vipratipattimāneva /
GK16andhvc3u:7362: pravṛttiḥ,arthasvarūpaṃ hi śabdasya viṣayaḥ, anumānasya tu tadgataṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7364: yathā ca vācyaviṣaye pramāṇāntarānugamena samyaktvapratītau kvacitkriyamāṇāyāṃ tasya pramāṇāntaraviṣayatve styapi na śabdavyāpāraviṣayatāhānistadyvaṅgyasyāpi /
GK16andhvc3u:7366: na caitāvatā vācyasya pratotirānumānikī kiṃ tu tadgatasya tato 'dhikasya
GK16andhvc3u:7385: ebhirvacanairvākyārthasya satyatvamevāptoktatvarūpānumānena niścetavyamiti labhyata iti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7402: kāvyaviṣaye ca vyaṅgyapratītināṃ satyāsatyanirūpaṇasyāprayojakatvameveti tatra pramāṇāntaravyāpāraparīkṣopahāsāyaiva sampadyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7403: tasmālliṅgipratītireva sarvatra vyaṅgyapratītiriti na śakyate vaktum /
GK16andhvc3u:7408: na hi teṣāṃ vākyanāmāgriṣṭomādivākyavatsatyārthapratipādanadvāreṇa pravartakatvāya prāmāṇyamanviṣyate, prītamātraparyavasāyitvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7412: nāyaṃ sahṛdayaḥ kevalaṃ śuṣkatarkopakramakarkaśahṛdayaḥ pratītiṃ parāmarṣṭuṃ nālamityeṣa upahāsaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7413: nanvevaṃ tarhi mā bhūdyatra yatra vyañjakatā tatra tatrānumānatvam; yatra yatrānumānatvaṃ tatra tatra vyañjakatvamiti kathamapahnūyata
GK16andhvc3u:7416: nanvabhiprāyaviṣayaṃ yadvyañjakatvamanumānaikayogakṣemaṃ taccenna prayojakaṃ dhvanivyavahārasya tarhi kimarthaṃ bālapriyā teṣāṃ kāvyarūpāṇām
GK16andhvc3u:7435: vṛttau tadvyañjakatvaṃ dhvanivyavahārasyāprayojakamityevoktamaprayojakatve heturnokta ityato 'bhipretaṃ hetuṃ darśayannāha--tadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7440: abhiprāyo vivakṣā, tadvyatirikto viṣayo rasālaṅkārādirūpo vyaṅgyaḥ tatrāvyāpārādvyāparaṇābhāvādityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7445: api tu vyañjakatvalakṣaṇaḥ śabdānāṃ vyāpāra autpattikaśabdārthasambandhavādināpyabhyupagantavya iti pradarśanārthamupanyastam /
GK16andhvc3u:7446: tadbhi vyañjakatvaṃ kadācilliṅgatvena kadācidrūpāntareṇa śabdānāṃ vācakānāmavācakānāṃ ca sarvavādibhirapratikṣepyamityayamasmābhiryatna ākhdhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7447: tadevaṃ guṇavṛttivācakatvādibhyaḥ śabdaprakārebhyo niyamenaiva tāvadvilakṣaṇaṃ vyañjakatvam
GK16andhvc3u:7450: yata eva hi kvacidanumānānenābhiprāyādau kvacitpratyakṣeṇa dīpālokādau kvacitkāraṇatvena gītadhvanyādau kvacidabhidhayā vikṣitānyapare kvacidguṇavṛttyā avivakṣitavācye 'nugṛhyamāṇaṃ vyañjakatvaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tata
GK16andhvc3u:7451: eva tebhyaḥ sarvebhyo vilakṣaṇamasya rūpaṃ nassidhyati tadāha--tadevamiti
GK16andhvc3u:7452: nanu prasiddhasya kimarthaṃ rūpasaṃkocaḥ kriyate abhidhāvyāpāraguṇavṛttyādeḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7463: yata eva hi abhiprāyadiviṣayaṃ śabdasya vyañjakatvamanumānainānumityā /
GK16andhvc3u:7467: avivakṣitavācyagataṃ vyañjakatvaṃ guṇavṛtyā ca anugṛhyamāṇaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ, tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7472: anenāyaṃ prayogaḥ pradarśitaḥ--vimataṃ vyañjakatvamanumānādiprakārebhyo vilakṣaṇaṃ teṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapi anuvartamānatayāvabhāsamānatvāt, yadyeṣu vyāvartamāneṣvapyanuvartamānatayāvabhāsate tattebhyo bhinnaṃ yathā kusumebhyaḥ sūtramiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7476: prasiddhasyābhidhāvyāpāragumavṛtyāde rūpasaṅkocaḥ kimarthaṃ kriyata iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7488: evaṃ hi sati sattāmātralakṣaṇe kṛte sakalasadvastulakṣaṇānāṃ paunaruktyaprasaṅgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7492: na vayaṃ saṃjñāniveśanādi niṣedhāma iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7498: tripadārthasaṅkarī sattetyanenaiva dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ lakṣitatvācchrutismṛtyāyurvadadhanurvedaprabhṛtīnāṃ bālapriyā viśiṣṭaṃ rūpamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7508: kriyate, tarhi tāṃ na niṣedhāma ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7509: vastuni hi samucitā vimatirna nāmamātra iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7519: dravyaguṇakarmaṇāṃ trayāṇāṃ sattāvatvādikaṃ lakṣaṇamabhihitaṃ, tanmanasi kṛtyoktaṃ vṛttau 'sattāmātre' tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7530: yatra vyaṅgyānvaye vācya-cārutvaṃ syāt prakarṣavat // DhvK_3.34 //
GK16andhvc3u:7537: evaṃ yāvaddhvanerātmīyaṃ rūpaṃ bhedopabhedasahitaṃ yacca vyañjakabhedamukhena rūpaṃ tatsarvaṃ pratipādya prāṇabhūtaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvamekapraghaṭṭakena śiṣyabuddhau viniveśayituṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7538: vyañjakavādasthānaṃ racitamiti dhvaniṃ prati yadvaktavyaṃ taduktameva /
GK16andhvc3u:7539: adhunā tu guṇaibhūto 'pyayaṃ vyaṅgyaḥ kavivācaḥ pavitrayatītyamunā dvāreṇa tasyaivātmatvaṃ samarthayitumāha--prakāra bālapriyā ityukterupayogamāha locane--vimativiṣayateve heturiti saṃśayasya viśeṣānavadhāraṇamūlakatvaṃ hi prasiddham /
GK16andhvc3u:7542: yata eva vipratipattirvastutatvānavabodhanibandhanā tadavadhāraṇe sati notpattumarhati, tata evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7548: prathamodyote tāvatsopoddhātaṃ dhvanessāmānyalakṣaṇamevoktaṃ, dvitīye tvavivakṣitavācyādibhedastadbhedāśca pradarśitāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7551: tatsarvaṃ pratipādyetyanena, tāvataiva dhvanisvarūpapratipādanaṃ nirvyūḍhamiti darśayati
GK16andhvc3u:7555: nanu kāvyasyātmā dhvanirityabhyupagamena kāvyātmabhūtadhvanisvarūpapratipādanamātravṛttatvāt kimarthaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyapratipādanaṃ kṛtaṃ, tasya kāvyātmatvābhāvādityato 'bhiprāyaṃ darśayannavatārayati--adhunetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7565: cārutvaprakarṣahetutvena vyaṅgyānvayasya kārikāyāndarśitatvānna vyaṅgyasambandhamātraṃ vyaṅgyo 'rtho lalanālāvaṇyaprakhyo yaḥ pratipāditastasya prādhānye dhvanirityuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7566: tasya tu guṇībhāvena vācyacārutvaprakarṣe guṇībhūtvayaṅgyo nāma kāvyaprabhedaḥ prakalpyate
GK16andhvc3u:7567: tatra vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasya tiraskṛtavācyebhyaḥ prīyamānasya kadācidvācyarūpavākyārthāpekṣayā guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:7568: yathā-- lāvaṇyasindhuraparaiva hi keyamatra yatrotpalāni śaśinā saha
GK16andhvc3u:7570: unmajjati dviradakumbhataṭī ca yatra yatrāpare kadalikāṇḍamṛṇāladaṇḍāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7576: 'yatrārthaḥ śabdo vā' ityatrāntare vyaṅgyaṃ ca vastvāditrayaṃ tatra vastuno vyaṅgyasya ye bhedā uktāsteṣāṃ krameṇa guṇabhāvaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7580: atra sindhuśabdena paripūrṇatā, utpalaśabdena kaṭākṣacchaṭāḥ, śaśiśabdena
GK16andhvc3u:7583: tatra caiṣāṃ svārthasya sarvathānupapatterandhaśabdoktena nyāyena tiraskṛtavācyatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:7602: vastumātrasya vyaṅgyasyetyādivṛttyuktaṃ sarvaṃ krameṇa pradarśayiṣyannadau bhūmikāṃ racayati locane--abhilāṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7621: 'aparaiva hi keyaṃ' ityuktigarbhīkṛte vācyeṃ'śe cārutvacchāyāṃ vidhatte,
GK16andhvc3u:7623: sundaratvaṃ cātyāsambhāvyamānasamāgamasakalalokasārabhūtakuvalayādibhāvavargasyātisubhagakādhikaraṇav iśirāntalabdhasamuccayarūpatayā vismaya vibhāvanāprāptipuraskāreṇa vyaṅgyārthopaskṛtasya tathā vicitrasyaiva vācyarūponmajjanenābhilāṣādivibhāvatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7625: niḥśvāsāndha ivādarśa ityatrāndhaśabdavyākhāyane ya ukto nyāyastenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7630: aparaiva hīti keyamiti coktibhyāṃ sāmānyātmanākroḍīkṛta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7638: svasya vācyasya ya ātmā svarūpantasya yadunmajjanamuddhurakandharatayāvasthānaṃ tayā upalakṣitasya
GK16andhvc3u:7639: tathā nimajjinaṃ vyaṅgyajātaṃ pūrvoktaṃ yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7645: tathā sakalalokasārabhūtāśca ye kuvalayādayo bhāvāḥ padārthasteṣāṃ vargasya /
GK16andhvc3u:7646: atisumagaṃ yadekādhikaraṇaṃ nāyikārūpaṃ tatra yā viśrāntiḥ saṃśliṣyāvasthitistāyā labdhaṃ samuccarūpaṃ saṅghātarūpatvaṃ yena tasya bhāvastattā tayā hetunā /
GK16andhvc3u:7647: yā vismayavibhāvatāprāptistasyāḥ puraskāreṇa purassarīkāreṇeti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7652: tarhi vyaṅgyasya prādhānyamāpatitaṃ tasyaiva vibhāvatāprāptau prayojakatvādityata āha--vācyarūponmajjaneneti
GK16andhvc3u:7657: yathohāhṛtam---'saṅketakālamanasam' locanam ata eveyati yadyapi vācyasya prādhānyaṃ , tathāpi rasadhvanau tasyāpi guṇateti sarvasya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya prākare mantavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:7664: bālapriyā vyaṅgyasya kaṭākṣavadanādervācyakuvalayacandrādirūpatvena darśanaṃ hyabhilāṣādijanane nimittamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7673: yadi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprabhede vācyārthasyaiva prādhānyaṃ syāttdā dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmeti tatra tatroddhoṣyamāṇamasaṅgataṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7676: lāvaṇyadravasundarīkṛtanadīviṣayetyanena lāvaṇyasindhurityetadvivṛtaṃ lāvaṇyamayī lāvaṇyasundarīkṛtā vā sindhuriti vigrahaḥ, sindhuśabdo na tiraskṛtavācyo vyañjaka iti ca bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7678: asmin pakṣe kuvalayādīnāmatisubhagaikādhikaraṇasamāveśakṛtasaubhāgyalābho na sāmañjasyena bhavatītyasvarasamanya ityanena sūcayan pakṣāntaramāha--yadi vetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7680: yuvatigataniratiśayalāvaṇyapūravyāptatvāllāvaṇyamayī sindhuryasāyassetyarthātsandhuśabdo 'trāpi pakṣe mukhyārthaka eva, na ca prāguktadoṣastaruṇyā eva varṇanīyatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7687: jahatsvārthalakṣaṇāyā eva vaktavyatayā kathamatiraskṛtavācyatvamiti śaṅkāṃ parijihīrṣuḥ pratyuta tatpadasya yogarūḍhyā raktimavācakatvameva,
GK16andhvc3u:7689: rasādirūpavyaṅgyasya guṇībhāvo rasavadalaṅkāre darśitaḥ; tatra ca teṣāmādhikārikavākyāpekṣayā guṇībhāvo vivahanapravṛttabhṛtyānuyāyirājavat
GK16andhvc3u:7691: locanam etacca prathamoddyota eva nirūpitam anurāgaśabdasya cābhilāṣe taduparaktatvalakṣaṇayā lāvaṇyaśabdavatpravṛttirityabhiprāyeṇātiraskṛtavācyatvamuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:7697: nanvatyarthaṃ pradhānabhūtasya rāsadeḥ kathaṃ guṇībhāvaḥ, guṇībhāve vā kathamacārutvaṃ na syādityāśaṅkya pratyuta sundaratā bhavatīti
GK16andhvc3u:7700: evaṃ vastuno rasādeśca guṇībhāvaṃ pradarśyālaṅkārātmano 'pi tṛtīyasya vyaṅgyaprakārasya taṃ darśayati---vyaṅgyālaṅkārasyeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7702: evaṃ prakāratrayasyāpi guṇabhāvaṃ pradarśya bahutaralakṣyavyāpakatāsyeti darśayitumāha---tatheti
GK16andhvc3u:7707: tatpadārthastadvastu taduparaktaṃ yena tattvaṃ vastūparañjakatvaṃ tena nimittena lakṣaṇayetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7713: rasavadalaṅkāraviṣayaḥ prākdarśita iti ca vṛttau pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7718: nanu pradhānasyāpi sato rasādeḥ kavivivakṣāvaśādguṇībhāvaḥ kinna syādityata āha--guṇībhāve veti /
GK16andhvc3u:7721: na hi rājño vivāhapravṛttamṛtyānuyāyitvamasundaraṃ bhāti, pratyuta bhṛtyotkarṣaviśeṣo 'pi rājotkarṣātiśayāyaiva kalpiṣyata iti cārutvameva puṣṇātīti bhāvaḥ // 3.4 //
GK16andhvc3u:7725: sukhāvahā ityanena teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojya tathā---
GK16andhvc3u:7727: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yam eva yojyāḥ sumedhasā // DhvK_3.35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7729: ye ca teṣu prakāro 'yameva yojyaḥ sumedhasā // 35 //
GK16andhvc3u:7734: lacchī duhidā jāmāuo harī taṃsa dhariṇiā gaṅgā /
GK16andhvc3u:7735: locanam prasannāni prasādaguṇayogādgabhīrāṇi ca vyaṅgyārthakṣepakatvātpadāni yeṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:7739: yastvetaṃ prakāraṃ tatra yojayituṃ na śaktaḥ sa paramalīkasahṛdayabhāvanāmukulitalocanoktyopahasanīyaḥ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7742: tathā gṛhiṇī gaṅgā yasyāḥ samabhilaṣaṇīye sarvasminvastunyapahata upāyabhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7744: tena gaṅgāsnānaharicaraṇārādhanādyupāyaśatalabdhāyā lakṣmyāścandrodayapānagoṣṭhyupabhogalakṣaṇaṃ mukhyeṃ phalamiti trailokyasārabhūtatā bālapriyā ityatra tatprakārasya cārutvehetutvaṃ darśitamityāśayenāha--cārutvaheturityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7746: sahṛdayatvapratiṣṭālābhaścaitatprakārayojanakauśalaśālitānibandhana eveti tadarthibhistadviṣaye mahāprayatna ādheya iti darśayituṃ sumedhasetyuktamityāha--yastvetamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7748: ayaṃ na sahṛdayaḥ kintvalīkasahṛdayabhāvanayā asatyasya sahṛdayatvastha bhāvanayā rasāsvādavaivaśyaṃ manasaḥ prakaṭayituṃ mukulitalocana āste,
GK16andhvc3u:7764: yasyāṃ snānādyadārādhanāditaśca yā labhyate sā gaṅgāsya gṛhiṇyeva, sa harirasya jāmātaiva, sā lakṣmīrasyātmajaiva, labdhāyā āmiamiaṅkā a suā aho kuḍumbaṃ mahoahiṇo //
GK16andhvc3u:7766: prāyeṇaiva parāṃ chāyāṃ bibhral lakṣye nirīkṣyate // DhvK_3.36 //
GK16andhvc3u:7771: sa tu tathārūpaḥ prāyeṇa sarva eva parīkṣyamāṇo lakṣye nirīkṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7773: locanam pratīyamānā satī aho kuṭumbaṃ mahodadherityahośabdācca guṇībhāvamanubhavati // 3.5
GK16andhvc3u:7774: evaṃ niralaṅkāreṣūttānatāyāṃ tucchatayaiva bhāsamānamamunāntaḥsāreṇa kāvyaṃ pavitrīkṛtamityuktvālaṅkārasyāpyanenaiva
GK16andhvc3u:7779: bālapriyā lakṣmyāssampadrūpāyā upabhogābhāve cālabdhakalpatvāccandrodayakāle vāruṇyupabhogo hi mukhyaṃ phalaṃ, sa candrassā vāruṇī cāsya putrabhāvameva bhajata iti mahodadhireva trailokyasāra itīyānartho 'tra dhvananavyāpārādavagamyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7780: sa cāvagatassannaho kuṭumbamiti śabdaspṛṣṭatayā guṇībhāvamavalambate yataḥ, tadvyaṅgyārthajātopaskṛta eva vācyārtho vismayavibhāvatāṃ prāpnoti camatkārātiśayañca vidhatta iti // 3.4//
GK16andhvc3u:7783: lakṣmīrityādyuktodāharaṇe na kaścidalaṅgāraḥ sphuṭo 'vagamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7797: vyaṅgyāṃśānugama ityatra vyaṅgyasya vācyaṃ pratyaṃśatvaṃ guṇībhūtatvamevetyāha--aṃśatvaṃ guṇamātratvamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:7799: nāmagrahaṇe nāmaikadeśagrahaṇamiti nyāyenaikadeśaśabda ekadeśavivartirūpakapara iti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:7801: kṛtaiva ca sā mahākavibhiḥ kāmapi kāvyaccharvipuṣyati, kathaṃ hyatiśayayogitā svaviṣayaucityena kriyamāṇā satī kāvye locanam
GK16andhvc3u:7802: tadayamarthaḥ--ekadeśavivartirūpake--- rājasaṃsairavījyanta śaradaiva saronṛpāḥ ityatra haṃsānāṃ yaccāmaratvaṃ pratīyamānaṃ tannṛpā iti vācye 'rthe vācye 'rthe guṇatāṃ prāptamalaṅkārakārairyāvadeva darśitaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:7805: vyaṅgyaṃ yadalaṅkārāntaraṃ vastvantaraṃ ca saṃspṛśanti ye svātmanaḥ saṃskārāyāśliṣyantīti te tathā /
GK16andhvc3u:7808: kāvyaśobhāṃ puṣyatīti yaduktaṃ tatra hetumāha---kathaṃ hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:7810: atiśayayogitā kathaṃ notkarṣamāvahet kāvye nāstyevāsau prakāra ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7811: svaviṣaye yadaucityaṃ tena ceddhṛdayasthitena tāmatiśayoktiṃ kaviḥ karoti
GK16andhvc3u:7812: yathā bhaṭṭendurājasya-- yadviśramya vilokiteṣu bahuśo niḥsthemanī locane yadgātrāṇi daridrati pratidinaṃ lūnābjinīnālavat /
GK16andhvc3u:7843: karoti cettadā nāstyevāsau prakāra iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7845: bhāmahenāpyatiśayoktilakṣaṇe yaduktam--- locanam dūrvākāṇḍaviḍambakaśca nibiḍo yatpāṇḍimā gaṇḍayoḥ kṛṇṇe yūni sayauvanāsu vanitāsveṣaiva veṣasthitiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:7846: atra hi bhagavato manmathavapuṣaḥ saubhāgyaviṣayaḥ sambhāvyata evāyamatiśaya iti tatkāvye lokottaraiva śobhollasati /
GK16andhvc3u:7851: nanvatiśayoktiḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu vyaṅgyatayāntalīṃnaivāsta iti yaduktaṃ tatkatham? yato bhāmaho 'tiśayoktiṃ sarvālaṅkārasāmānyarūpāmavādīt /
GK16andhvc3u:7852: na ca sāmānyaṃ śabdādviśeṣapratīteḥ pṛthagbhūtatayā paścāttanatvena cakāstīti kathamasya vyaṅgyatvamityāśaṅkyāha--bhāmaheneti
GK16andhvc3u:7855: bhagavata iti manmathavapuṣa ityatra, tacca sambhāvyata evetyatra ca hetuḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7877: mahatvaṃ stanayoḥ pratīyata iti atiśayoktirvyaṅgyā, parantviyaṃ stanayostathāvidhamahatvasyāsambhāvyamānatvenānaucityavatīti
GK16andhvc3u:7890: 'saiṣā' yeyamuktātiśayoktiḥ saiveti tattadalaṅkārāṇāṃ viśeṣatvaṃ tatsāmānyarūpatvañcātiśayokteriti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7891: bhavatvevaṃ tāvatā prakṛte kimāyātamityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7893: vyaṅgyaṃ hi vācyāta pṛthaktayā tatpratītyuttaraṃ śabdātpratīyate samānyantvanyathā gaurityādiśabdena saiṣā sarvaiva vakroktiranayārtho vibhāvyate /
GK16andhvc3u:7896: tatrātiśayoktiryamalaṅkāramadhitiṣṭhati kavipratibhāvaśāttasya cārutvātiśayayogo 'nyasya locanam bhāmahenāpi yaduktaṃ tatrāyamevārtho
GK16andhvc3u:7899: yātiśayoktirlakṣitā saiva sarvā vakroktiralaṅkāra prakāraḥ sarvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:7901: śabdasya hi vakratā abhidheyasya ca vakratā lokottīrṇena
GK16andhvc3u:7907: bālapriyā sāmānyaviśeṣayorapṛthaktayā samakālamevāvabhāsādityalaṅkāraviśeṣapratītyutaraṃ tatpṛthaktayā bhāsamānatvaṃ vyāpakaṃ vyāpakaṃ nivartamānaṃ svavyāpyaṃ vyaṅgyatvamapi
GK16andhvc3u:7947: tasyāścālaṅkārāntarasaṃkīrṇatvaṃ locanam viśeṣeṇa ca bhāvyate rasamayīkriyate, iti tāvattenoktaṃ, tatra ko 'sāvartha ityatrāha abhedopacārātsaiva sarvālaṅkārarūpeti /
GK16andhvc3u:7951: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ---yadi tāvadatiśayokteḥ sarvālaṅkāreṣu sāmānyarūpatā sā tarhi tādātmyaparyavasāyinīti tadyvatirikto naivālaṅkāro dṛśyata iti kavipratibhānaṃ na tatrāpekṣaṇīyaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7960: upacāre hi tritayamavaśyaṃ vakta; nimittaṃ prayojanaṃ mukhyārthabādhaśceti
GK16andhvc3u:7976: yathā khaṇḍamuṇḍādiviśeṣeṣu gotvāderanuvṛttatayā sāmānyarūpatvantathā upamādiviśeṣeṣvatiśayokteranuvṛttatayā sāmānyātmakatvātsarvā vakroktissaivetyabhedavyapadeśo mukhyo vā,
GK16andhvc3u:7977: sāmānyaviśeṣabāvasyāvivakṣayānayā vācoyuktyā dhvanireva kāvyātmeti pakṣapratikṣepārthamatiśayokteḥ kāvyajīvitatvaṃ vā vivakṣitamiti vikalpaṃ manasi kṛtyādyandūṣayati--yadi tāvadityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:7985: yathā khaṇḍādīnāṃ svata eva gotvādyākāraśālitvaṃ nānyāpekṣaṃ tathā upamāderatiśayayogitvamapīti kavipratibhātāratamyakṛtātiśayatāratamyayogitvamupalabhyamānaṃ kadācidvācyatvena kadācidyvaṅgyatvena vyaṅgyatvamapi locanam alaṅkāramātraṃ ca na kiñciddṛśyeta /
GK16andhvc3u:7986: atha sā kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā, tathāpyanaucityenāpi nibadhyamānā tathā syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:7987: aucityavatī jīvitamiti cet--aucityanibandhanaṃ rasabhāvādi muktvā nānyatkiñcidastīti tadevāntaryāmi mukhyaṃ jīvitamityabhyupagantavyaṃ na tu
GK16andhvc3u:7989: etena yadāhuḥ kecit--aucityaghaṭitasundaraśabdārthamaye kāvye kimanyena dhvaninātmabhūteneti te svavacanameva dhvanisadbhāvabhyupagamasākṣibhūtaṃ manyamānāḥ pratyuktāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8000: kāvyajīvitatvenetthaṃ vivakṣitā kāvyajīvitatvapradarśanāya sarvā vakroktisyaiṣetyuktā tathāpītyaṅgīkṛtya vādasūcakam /
GK16andhvc3u:8001: kimatiśayoktimātrasya jīvitatvaṃ vivakṣitaṃ, kiṃ vā yatkiñcidviśiṣṭasya?
GK16andhvc3u:8021: sarvā vakroktissaiṣeti nirdeśo mukhaṃ candra ityādivadabhedopacāra evetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8028: tasyā ityasya vācyatvenetyanenāpi sambandha iti vyācaṣṭe--sāpītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8037: ayaṃ ca prakāro 'nyeṣāmapyalaṅkārāṇāmasti, teṣāṃ tu na sarvaviṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8039: yeṣu cālaṅkāreṣu sādṛśyamukhena tattvapratilambhaḥ yathā rupakopamātulyayogatānidarśanādiṣu teṣu gamyamānadharmamukhenaiva yatsādṛśyaṃ tadeva śobhātiśayaśāli bhavatīti te sarve 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:8042: teṣu prakāreṣu madhye ya ādyaḥ prakārastasmin /
GK16andhvc3u:8043: nanvatiśayoktireva cedevambhūtā tatkimapekṣayā prathamaṃ tāvaditi kramaḥ sūcita ityāśaṅkyāha--ayaṃ cati /
GK16andhvc3u:8051: sthātumārabdhāyā api aparaiveti śabdena spṛṣṭatvādvācyatvamāpatitamiti dvayorvācyatvamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8062: kramo hi satsveva bahuṣu kramikeṣu ghaṭeta, nānyatheti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8076: rūpakādau sādṛśyaṃ vyaṅgyamupamā tu tatsvarūpaiveti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8090: tathā hi 'prabhāmahatyā śikhayeva dīpaḥ' ityādau sphuṭaiva dīpakacchāyā
GK16andhvc3u:8098: upamāgarbhatva ityapamāśabdena sarva eva tadviśeṣā rūpakādayaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8101: 'tayā sa pūtaśca vibhūṣitaśca' ityetena dīpasthānīyena dīpanāddīpakamatrānupraviṣṭaṃ pratīyamānatayā, sādhāraṇadharmābhidhānaṃ bālapriyā haraṇañca bhāmahīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8123: anena dīpa iveti dīpayatīti vā dīpakaśabdavyutpattirdarśitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8130: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ ca teṣāṃ tathājātīyānāṃ sarveṣāmevoktānuktānāṃ sāmānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8131: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite locanam hyetadupamāyāṃ spaṣṭenābhidhāprakāreṇaiva
GK16andhvc3u:8134: sulakṣitā iti yatkilaiṣāṃ tadvinirmuktaṃ rūpaṃ na tatkāvye 'bhyarthanīyam
GK16andhvc3u:8146: ākṣepaścobhayatra vibhāṣāsu vikalpātmakaviśeṣābhidhitsayā iṣṭasyāpi vidheḥ pūrvaṃ niṣedhanātpratiṣedhena bālapriyā atra
GK16andhvc3u:8152: ayamarthaḥ---atropamāyāmapekṣito dharmaḥ pūtatvādistayetyādinā spaṣṭamabhidhīyate, na punardīpakābhiprāyeṇa dīpasthānīyo 'rthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8154: sa pūtaścetyādivākyārthatrayasya bodho hyādau jāyate, taduttarantu pūtatvavibhūṣitatvayordīpādyupamānatrayahimavadupameyātmakānekānugamo 'vagamyata iti dīpakamatra vyaṅgyatayānupraviṣṭamiti /
GK16andhvc3u:8155: mālopamātiriktopāttadharmakopamāsthale tu dharmasyobhayatra sambandhaḥ spaṣṭamabhidhīyata iti na dīpakasya vyaṅgyatayānupraveśa iti mālopametyuktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8178: ekaikasya svarūpaviśeṣakathanena tu sāmānyalakṣaṇarahitena pratipādapāṭheneva śabdā na śakyante tattvato nirjñātum, ānantyāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8183: na caivamādi kāvyopagīti, guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataivātrālaṅkāratāyāṃ marmabhūtā lakṣitāḥ tān suṣṭu lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:8184: yayā supūrṇa kṛtvā lakṣitāḥ saṅgṛhītā bhavanti, anyathā tvavaśyamavyāptirbhavet /
GK16andhvc3u:8188: vyaṅgyasya ca cārutvaṃ rasābhivyaktiyogyatātmakam, rasasya svātmanaiva viśrāntidhāmna ānandātmakatvamiti nānavasthā kāciditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8191: nanu sarveṣvalaṅkāreṣu nālaṅkārāntaraṃ vyaṅgyaṃ cakāsti; tatkathaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyena bālapriya vibhāṣāsvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8194: jalabāhulyapradarśanāya kuṇḍikāṃ viṣayīkṛtya samudra iti nirdeśādbhede abhedarūpātiśayoktiriti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8200: tallakṣaṇe sarva evaite sulakṣitā bhavantītyetasya vivaraṇam--guṇībhūtetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8204: uktena sāmānyalakṣaṇena vinā tattadviśeṣalakṣaṇasyaiva kathana ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8205: kvacadgranthe tūpamā hītyādikassaṅgṛhītā bhavantītyanto grantho na dṛśyate
GK16andhvc3u:8206: nanu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvemeva sarveṣāmalaṅkārāṇāṃ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ tallakṣaṇena teṣāṃ sulakṣitatvaṃ bhavatītyuktamayuktamatiśayoktayādīnāmalaṅkārasāmānyarūpatvāttallakṣaṇenaiva ca caritārthatvādityata āha--na cetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8213: yaduktantallakṣaṇe sarva ete sulakṣitā iti tadākṣipya
GK16andhvc3u:8216: dīpakādau kvacideva cakāstyākṣepādau tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca prakārāntareṇāpi vyaṅgyārthānugamalakṣaṇena viṣayatvamastyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:8219: sarvathā nāstyeva sahṛdayahṛdayahāriṇaḥ kāvyasya sa locanam lakṣitena sarveṣāṃ saṃgrahaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8220: maivam; vastumātraṃ vā raso vā vyaṅgyaṃ sadguṇībhūtaṃ bhaviṣyati
GK16andhvc3u:8226: kena lakṣaṇīyatvaṃ dhvanivyatirikto yaḥ prakāro vyaṅgyatvenārthānugamo nāma tadeva lakṣaṇaṃ tenetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8227: vyaṅgye lakṣite tadguṇībhāve ca nirūpite kimanyadasya lakṣakriyatāmiti tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8233: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvamityatra vyaṅgyapadenālaṅkāramātranna vivakṣim; kintu vasturasādikañcāto nāvyāpakamidamityāha--maivamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8235: yatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasthale 'laṅkāro na cakāsti tatreti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8237: vyaṅgyatvenārthānugamo vācyaṃ prati guṇabhāvaḥ, sa lakṣaṇamasādhāraṇadharmaḥ svarūpaṃ vā yasya prakārāntarasya teneti tadarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8258: yatra vyaṅgyānvaya ityādinā guṇībhāvaśca nirūpita iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8268: locanam yatprāguktaṃ sakalasatkavikāvyopaniṣadbhūtamiti tanna pratāraṇamātramarthavādarūpaṃ mantavyamiti darśayitum--tadidamiti // 3.6
GK16andhvc3u:8271: pratīyamānakṛtā chāyā śobhā, sa ca lajjāsadṛśī
GK16andhvc3u:8274: pratīyamānā cchāyā antarmadanodbhedajahṛdayasaundaryarūpā yayā, lajjā hyantarudbhinnamānmathavikārajugopayiṣārūpā madanavijṛmbhaiva /
GK16andhvc3u:8280: kārikāyāṃ mukhyetyasya bhūṣetyanena sambandha iti darśayati--mukhyā
GK16andhvc3u:8288: gopanaiva sāro yasya tattathāvidhaṃ saundaryameva prāṇā yasyāstasyā
GK16andhvc3u:8294: pakṣe 'tra chāyāpadārtho na kāntiḥ, kintu yoṣitāṃ yauvanārambhasambhāvinī
GK16andhvc3u:8296: antarmadanodbhedajaṃ tadghṛdayasaundaryantadeva rūpaṃ yasyāssā madanodbhedarūpamanovikārātmiketi yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8304: akṣuṇṇāste cetasā kevalena sthitvaikānte santataṃ bhāvanīyāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8306: tathā pratīyamānasya priyatamābhilāṣānunāyanamānaprabhṛteḥ cāyā kāntiḥ yayā /
GK16andhvc3u:8307: śṛṅgārarasataraṅgiṇī hi lajjāvaruddhā nirbharatayā tāstān vilāsānnetragātravikāraparamparārūpān prasūta iti gopanāsārasaundaryalajjāvijṛmbhitametaditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8309: manmathācāryeṇa tribhuvanavandyamānaśāsanena ata eva lajjāsādhvasadhvaṃsinā dattā yeyamalaṅghanīyājñā tadanuṣṭhāne 'vaśyakartavye sati sādhvasalajjātyāgena visrambhasambhogakālopanātāḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8312: pratikṣaṇamunmiṣantaste, kevalenānyātrāvyagreṇaikāntāvasthānapūrvaṃ sarvendriyopasaṃhāreṇa bhāvayituṃ bālapriyā tatpadaṃ vyācaṣṭe--pratīyamānasyetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8318: rājā jñāto 'pyanatilaṅghanīyā hyācāryājñā “gurau ruṣṭe na kaścane”tyādivacanādata ācāryatvarūpaṇam
GK16andhvc3u:8327: akṛtakāḥ akṛtrimāḥ tathā sambhogasya yā paribhāvanā āsvādaḥ, tatra tadavasara iti yāvat /
GK16andhvc3u:8339: sā vyaṅgyasya guṇī-bhāve prakāram imam āśritā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8342: yā caiṣā kākvā kvacidarthāntarapratītirdṛśyate sā vyaṅgyasyārthasya guṇībhāve sati guṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇaṃ kāvyaprabhedamāśrayate /
GK16andhvc3u:8347: tatra hi sākāṅkṣanirākāṅkṣādikrameṇa paṭhyamāno 'sau śabdaḥ prakṛtārthātiriktamapi vāñchatīti laulyamasyābhidhīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8348: yadi vār iṣadarthe kuśabdastasya bālapriyā arhā ityasyaiva
GK16andhvc3u:8355: uktaṃ vyaṅgyaṃ vācyārthopaskārakaṃ satkāvyasya cārutvaṃ sampādayatītyarthaḥ // 3.7 //
GK16andhvc3u:8358: nanu laulyamicchā tatkathamatra ghaṭata ityata āha--tatra hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8361: yathoktaṃ kāvyānuśāsane--”sā ca kākurdvidhā sākāṅkṣā nirākāṅkṣā ca,
GK16andhvc3u:8363: yasmādvākyādyādṛśassaṅketabalenārthaḥ prīyate, na tādṛśa eva, kintu nyūnābhyadhikaḥ pramāṇabalena nirṇayayogyastadvākyaṃ sākāṅkṣaṃ tadviparītaṃ nirākāṅkṣam. vaktṛgāta hyākāṅkṣā vākye upacaryate sā ca prakaraṇabalānniścīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8365: viṣayo 'pi trividhaḥ arthāntaraṃ tadarśagata eva viśeṣastadarthābhāvo ve”tyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8381: tena hṛdayasthavastupratīterīṣadbhūmiḥ kākuḥ tayā yār'thāntaragatiḥ sa kāvyaviśeṣa imaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaprakāramāśritaḥ. atra heturvyeṅgyasya tatra guṇībhāva eva bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8383: na tu pratīteratra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ, pratītidvāreṇa vā kāvyasya nirūpitam
GK16andhvc3u:8384: anye tvāhuḥ---vyaṅgyasya guṇībhāve 'yaṃ prakāraḥ anyathā tu tatrāpi dhvanitvameveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8385: taccāsat; kākuprayoge sarvatra śabdaspṛṣṭatvena vyaṅgyasyonmīlitasyāpi guṇībhāvāt kākurhi śabdasyaivala kaściddharmastena spṛṣṭaṃ 'gaupyaivaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8387: ata eva 'bhama dhammia' ityādau kākuyojane guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva
GK16andhvc3u:8390: bhavanti iti, mayi jīvati iti, ghārtarāṣṭrā iti ca
GK16andhvc3u:8395: arthāntaragatirityanenārthāntarāvagamakaḥ kāvyaviśeṣo vivakṣita iti vakṣyati tadāśayena setyetadvyācaṣṭe--sa kāvyaviśeṣa iti /
GK16andhvc3u:8396: guṇībhāva iti saptamī nimitte guṇībhāvaddhetorityartha ityāha--tatretyādi
GK16andhvc3u:8398: arthāntaragātirityasya arthāntarasya pratītiriti yathāśrutārthakatve arthāntarapratītereva guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ vaktavyaṃ bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8402: anye tu kākusthale yatra tadvyaṅgyasya prādhānyantatra dhvanitvaṃ, yatra guṇībhāvastatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ tadetadvyaṅgyasya guṇībhāva ityanena
GK16andhvc3u:8422: sākāṅkṣā dīptā gadgadena tārāpraśamanoddīpanābhyāṃ citritā viśeṣavatī cetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8424: āma asaio orama paivvae ṇa tueṃ maliṇiaṃ sīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8425: kiṃ uṇa jaṇassa jāa vva cāndilaṃ taṃ ṇa kāmemo //
GK16andhvc3u:8426: śabdaśaktireva hi svābhidheyasāmarthyākṣiptakākusahāyā satyarthaviśeṣapratipattiheturna kākumātram. viṣayāntare svecchākṛtātkākumātrāttathāvidhārthapratipattyasambhavāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8427: sa cārthaḥ kākuviśeṣasahāyaśabdavyāpāropārūḍho 'pyarthasāmarthyalabhya iti vyaṅgyarūpa eva
GK16andhvc3u:8432: āma asatyaḥ uparama pativrate na tyā malinitaṃ śīlam /
GK16andhvc3u:8433: kiṃ punarjanasya jāyeva nāpitaṃ taṃ na kāmayāmahe //
GK16andhvc3u:8439: kiṃ punarjanasya jāyeva manmathāndhīkṛtā, candilaṃ nāpitamiti pāmaraprakṛtiṃ na kāmayāmahe iti nirākāṅkṣagadgadopahāsagarbhā /
GK16andhvc3u:8440: eṣā hi kayācinnāpi tānuraktayā kulavadhvā dṛṣṭāvinayāyā upahāsyamānāyāḥ pratyupahāsāveśagarbhoktiḥ kākupradhānaiveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8442: bālapriyā dīptatārāvalaṅkārāntargatau praśamanoddīpane tvaṅgāntargate iti vivekaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8444: mayi jīvati dhārtarāṣṭrāḥ svasthā bhavantīti vācyārtha ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8464: pativrata iti na malinitamityatra ca kākvā tattadabhāvo vyaṅgya ityabhiprāyeṇāha--pativrata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8469: anugama ityasya tadviśiṣṭavācyapratītistadā guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatayā tathāvidhārthadyotinaḥ kāvyasya vyapadeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8471: prabhedasyāsya viṣayo yaś ca yuktyā pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8472: vidhātavyā sahṛdayair na tatra dhvani-yojanā // DhvK_3.38 //
GK16andhvc3u:8475: saṅkīrṇo hi kaściddhvanerguṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya ca lakṣye dṛśyate mārgaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8478: vācakatve 'nugamo guṇatvaṃ vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratītyā tatraiva kāvyasya prakāśakatvaṃ kalpyate; tena na tathā vyapadeśa iti kākuyojanāyāṃ sarvatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyataiva ata eva 'mathnāmi kauravaśataṃ samare na kopāt' ityādau viparītalakṣaṇaṃ ya āhuste na samyakyarāmamṛśuḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8493: pratijñātakauravaśatavadhasya kruddhasya bhīmasenasya vacanamidamata eva na mathnāmītyādau viparītalakṣaṇeti kecittadāha--viparītetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8500: kintūccāraṇakāla eva kākubalānmathanādiniṣedhasya niṣeṣapratiyogitvenaiva na mathnāmi netyākārikā pratītirato mathanādiniṣedhasya vācyasya niṣedho vyaṅgya eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:8502: na dṛśyate candro 'treti vyutpattyā darśaśabdo 'māvāsyāyāṃ prayujyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8506: pramukha evānyatarāvadhāraṇaniyamāsambhavo yatra yuktiparāmarśaṃ tatra yasya yuktisahāyatā tatra tena vyapadeśaḥ kartavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8508: yathā--- patyuḥ śiraścandrakalāmanena spṛśeti sakhyā parihāsapūrvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8509: sā rañjayitvā caraṇau kṛtāśīrmākhyena tāṃ nirvacanaṃ jaghāna //
GK16andhvc3u:8515: śirodhṛtā yā candrakalā tāmapi paribhaveti sapatnīlokāpajaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8524: guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatvaṃ, yadā tu vyaṅgyādeva nyakkṛtavācyāttadā dhvanitvamiti cārutvapratītirūpakāryabalādeva tadanyatarāvadhāraṇasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8534: 'nirvacanam' ityadivṛttigranthena darśataṃ vyaṅgyaṃ tasya guṇībhāvaṃ ca
GK16andhvc3u:8547: yathā ca--- prāyacchatoccaiḥ kusumāni māninī vipakṣagotraṃ dayitena lambhitā /
GK16andhvc3u:8548: na kiñcidūce caraṇena kevalaṃ lileśa bāṣpākulalocanā bhuvam //
GK16andhvc3u:8549: ityatra 'nirvacanaṃ jaghāna' 'na kiñjidūce' iti pratiṣedhamukhena vyaṅgyasyārthasyoktyā kiñcidviṣayīkṛtatvādguṇībhāva eva śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:8550: yadā vakroktiṃ vinā vyaṅgyo 'rthastātparyeṇa pratīyate tadā tasya
GK16andhvc3u:8562: evaṃvidheṣu śṛṅgārāvasareṣutāmevāyaṃ smaratīti mānanapradarśanamevātra na yuktamiti sātiśayamanyusaṃbhāro vyaṅgyo vacananiṣedhasyaiva vācyasya saṃskāraḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8579: 'na kiñcidūca' ityasya prayojanaṃ darśayan vyaṅgyamāha--evaṃ vidheṣvityādi
GK16andhvc3u:8595: yathā ca--- durārādhā rādhā subhaga yadanenāpi bhṛjata-
GK16andhvc3u:8602: he subhaga ! yat patitametadaśru anena prāṇeśājadhanavasanenāpi mṛjatastava rādhā durārādhā strīcetaḥ kaṭhoraṃ tadupacārairalaṃ, he tvaṃ viram, anunayeṣvevamudito hariḥ vaḥ kalyāṇaṃ kriyādityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8620: kaṭhoraṃ strīcetastadalamupacārairvirama he kriyātkalyāmaṃ vo hariranunayaṣvevamuditaḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8621: locanam yanmāṃ vismṛtya tāmeva kupitāṃ manyase /
GK16andhvc3u:8625: yadi tūcyate iyatāpyādareṇa kimiti kopaṃ na muñcasi, tatkiṃ kriyate kaṭhorasvabhāvaṃ strīcetaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8626: strīti hi premādyayogādvastuviśeṣamātrametat; tasya caiṣa svabhāvaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8627: ātmani caitatsukumārahṛdayā yoṣita iti na kiṃñcidvajrasārādhikamāsāṃ hṛdayaṃ yadevaṃvidhavṛttāntasākṣātkāre 'pi sahasradhā na dalati /
GK16andhvc3u:8630: anunayeṣviti bahuvacanenavāraṃ vāramasya bahuvallabhasyeyameva sthitiriti saubhāgyātiśaya uktaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8633: yastu triṣvapi ślokeṣu pratīyamānasyaiva rasāṅgatvaṃ vyācaṣṭe sma /
GK16andhvc3u:8635: evaṃ hi vyaṅgyasya yā guṇībhūtatā prakṛtā saiva samūlaṃ truṭyet /
GK16andhvc3u:8636: rasādivyatiriktasya hi vyaṅgyasya rasāṅgabhāvayogitvameva bālapriyā patitamiti bhūtanirdeśena vyaṅgyamāha--gata ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8645: evaṃ bodhanīyaṃ prati vyaṅgyamuktvā rādhagataṃ vyaṅgyamāha--ātmanītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8652: uktasya vyaṅgyajātasya vācyaṃ prati tasya rasaṃ prati
GK16andhvc3u:8658: vyākhyāturasyāyamāśayaḥ- yasya hi mukhyaṃ prādhānaṃ taṃ pratyevaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8659: guṇībhāvo 'nyāyyaḥ rasasyaiva ca tatprādhānyamiti nedaṃ vyākhyānaṃ sādhīyaityupahāsoktyā darśayati--sa devamityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8660: yathā kaścinnirdhanatayā devaṃ vikrīya dhanaṃ sampādya tadyātrotsavaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:8666: vyaṅgyaikasvabhāvasya rasādestāvatsvata eva prādhānyaṃ, tadvayatiriktasya tu tadaṅgatvenetyatastasya tadaṅgatve prādhānyamevāpatati, na tu guṇatvamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8667: evaṃ sthite ca 'nyakkāro hyayameva' ityādiślokanirdiṣṭānāṃ padānāṃ vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyapratipādane
GK16andhvc3u:8671: teṣu hi vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭatvaṃ vācyasya pratīyate na tu vyaṅgyarūpapariṇatatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:8672: tasmādvākyaṃ tatra dhvaniḥ, padāni tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyāni /
GK16andhvc3u:8673: na ca kevalaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyānyeva padānyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyadhvanervyañjakāni yāvadarthāntarasaṃkramitavācyāni dhvaniprabhedarūpāṇyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:8675: yatra tu vākye rasāditātparye nāsti guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaiḥ padairudbhāsite 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:8678: ramante ca saha strībhiḥ kuśalāḥ khalu mānavāḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8679: locanam prādhānyaṃ nānyatkiñcidityalaṃ pūrvavaṃśyaiḥ saha vivādena /
GK16andhvc3u:8683: eṣa ca ślokaḥ pūrvameva vyākhyāta iti na punarlikhyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8685: yadyapi cātra viṣayanirvedātmakaśāntarasapratītirasti, tathāpi camatkāro 'yaṃ vācyaniṣṭha eva /
GK16andhvc3u:8686: vyaṅgyaṃ tvasambhāvyatvaviparītakāritvādi bālapriyā ato vācyaṃ pratyeva guṇībhāvo vaktavya iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8698: rājasevādivyavahāropalakṣitasya viṣopabhogatulyasya sarvasyāpi laukikavyavahārasya viṣayavairasyāpādakatayā śāntarasavyañjakatvāditi śaṅkāmanūdya pariharati--yadyapītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8702: yato rājāderapi sevādikaṃ kurvanti, tato mānavāḥ kuśalāḥ salviti vācyārthaprayukta ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8704: vācyavyaṅgyayoḥ prādhānyāprādhānyaviveke paraḥ prayatno vidhātavyaḥ, yena dhvanirguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoralaṅkārāṇāṃ cāsaṅkīrṇe viṣayaḥ sujñāto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8705: anyathā tu prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya eva vyāmohaḥ pravartate /
GK16andhvc3u:8706: yathā--- locanam tasyaivānuyayi, taccāpiśabdābhyāmubhayato yojitābhyāṃ caśabdena sthānatrayayojitena khaluśabdena cobhayato yojitena mānavaśabdena spṛṣṭameveti guṇībhūtam /
GK16andhvc3u:8709: yatra vyaṅgyaṃ nāstyeva tatra teṣāṃ śuddhānāṃ prādhānyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8715: tata eva ca camatkāra ityata āha--vyaṅgyantvityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8724: rājānamapi sevante api viṣamapi upabhuñjate api iti karmaṇā kriyayā ca yojitābhyāmityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8726: sevākriyāyā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sulabhāpāyatayā samāhitamatibhirapi duranuṣṭheyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8729: eko dyotako bahuṣvantya iti nyāyādramante ceti cakārasya samuccayārthakasya kriyātrayeṇa yojanetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8731: khaluśabdaḥ kuśalaśabdena mānavaśabdena ca yojanīya ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8739: prasiddhālaṅkāraviṣaya evetyevakāreṇa kimuta vyaṅgyaviṣaya ityartho darśita ityāha--vyaṅgyaprakārastvityādi
GK16andhvc3u:8752: lāvaṇyadraviṇavyayo na gaṇitaḥ kleśo mahān svīkṛtaḥ svacchandasya sukhaṃ janasya vasataḥ cintānalo dīpitaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8753: eṣāpi svayameva tulparamaṇābhāvādvarākī hatā ko 'rthaścetasi vedhasā vinihitastanvyāstanuṃ tanvatā //
GK16andhvc3u:8754: ityatra vyājastutiralaṅkāra iti vyākhyāyi kenacittanna cuturastram; yato
GK16andhvc3u:8761: cireṇa hi yo vyayaḥ sampadyate na tu vidyudiva jhaṭiti tatrāvaśyaṃ gaṇanayā bhavitavyam /
GK16andhvc3u:8768: yatsvayaṃ nirmīyate tadeva ca nihanyata iti mahadvaiśasamapiśabdena vakāreṇa coktam /
GK16andhvc3u:8770: na svātmano na lokasya na nirmitasyetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8772: rāgiṇo hi varākī hateti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitamamaṅgalopahataṃ cānuvitaṃ vacanam
GK16andhvc3u:8779: pādatrayoktānaṃ trayāṇāmekena yogyo na kaścidartho nirūpyamāṇo dṛśyata
GK16andhvc3u:8793: varākīti kṛpaṇatāliṅgitaṃ hatetyamaṅgalopahataṃ ca vacanaṃ rāgiṇo hyanucitamiti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8794: rāgī hi tannimagnacittavṛttitayā tāmeva bahumanyamānastadrūpasuṣamāsudhāmāsvādayan kathaṅkāraṃ tasyāḥ śocyatvamamaṅglatvaṃ ca paryālocayediti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8799: ātmanyapi tadrūpāsambhāvanāyāṃ rāgatāyāṃ ca paśuprāyatvaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8800: nanu ca rāgiṇo 'pi kutaścitkāraṇātparigṛhītakatipayakālavratasya vā rāvaṇaprāyasya vā sītādiviṣaye duṣyantaprāyasya vānirjñātajātiviśeṣe śakuntalādau kimiyaṃ svasaubhāgyābhimānagarbhā tatstutigarbhā coktirna bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:8801: vītarāgasya vā anādakālābhyastarāgavāsanāvāsitatayā madhyasthatvenāpi tāṃ vastutastathā paśyato neyamuktiḥ na saṃbhāvyā /
GK16andhvc3u:8802: na hi vītarāgo viparyastān bhāvān paśyati /
GK16andhvc3u:8805: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi hyaprastutaḥ sambhavannevārtho vaktavyaḥ, nahi tejasītthamaprastutapraśaṃsā sambhavati--aho bālapriyā sati,
GK16andhvc3u:8808: kāmamastu svātmavyatiriktajanāpekṣayā tulyaramaṇābhāvasya sambhāvanā svātmāpekṣayāpi tatsambhāvanā na yuktetyatastadvacanamatyantānucitamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8822: vītarāgasya vā iyamuktina na sambhāvyeti sambandhathaḥ,
GK16andhvc3u:8850: na cāyaṃ ślokaḥ kvacitprabandha iti śrūyate, yena tatprakaraṇānugatārthatāsya parikalpayate
GK16andhvc3u:8852: yasmādanena vācyena guṇībhūtātmanā nissāmānyaguṇāvalopādhmātasya nijamāhimotkarṣajanitasamatsarajanajvarasya viśeṣajñamātmano na kañcidevāparaṃ paśyataḥ paridevitametaditi prakāśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8853: tathā cāyaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8857: locanam dhikte kārṣṇyamiti sā paraṃ prastutaparatayeti nātrāsambhava
GK16andhvc3u:8859: nissāmānyeti nijamahimeti viśeṣajñamiti paridevitamityetaiścaturbhirvākyakhaṇḍaiḥ krameṇa pādacatuṣṭayasya tātparyaṃ vyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:8863: avagāhanamadhyavasitamapi na yatra āstāṃ tasya sampādanam /
GK16andhvc3u:8866: ahamiti mahīyānavalepaḥ parisphuṭaṃ gamyata iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8871: yato 'yaṃ dharmakīrteḥ śloka iti prasiddhiratastathāpūrvoktārthaka ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8880: prakṛtodāharaṇe hi vivādo vyājastutyaprastutapraśaṃsāviṣayo na vakṣyamāṇatadīyaśloka iti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8884: ayaṃ bhāvaḥ--yo yasyāśayo 'nyatra suspaṣṭapratipattikassa eva sambhavan
GK16andhvc3u:8890: anadhyavasitaṃ sudhībhirna sampipādayiṣitamavagāhanamavabodhaḥ, payaḥpakṣe yadā dānāyāntaḥ praveśo yasya tat /
GK16andhvc3u:8891: analpā dhīśaktirbuddhisāmarthyaṃ yasya tenāpyanyena kenacit kartrā /
GK16andhvc3u:8896: mataṃ mama jagatyalabdhasadṛśapratigrāhakaṃ prayāsyati payonidheḥ paya iva svadehe jārām //
GK16andhvc3u:8898: locanam paramaṃ yadarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādibhyo 'pyuttamam, alabdhaṃ prayatnaparīkṣitamapi na prāptaṃ sadṛśaṃ yasya tathābhūtaṃ pratigrāhamekaiko grāho jalacaraḥ prāṇī airāvatoccaiḥśravodhanvantariprāyo
GK16andhvc3u:8904: parasya bālapriyā evaṃ bhūtaṃ mama mataṃ matapratipādako granthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8905: alabdhaḥ sadṛśaḥ svatulyaḥ pratigrāhako 'nyān pratibodhayitā svayaṃ bo /
GK16andhvc3u:8912: adṛṣṭaṃ paramaṃ yasmāttathāvidhamarthatattvaṃ kaustubhādiṃ yatra tat /
GK16andhvc3u:8937: tattacchalokena piratipāditāyāstathāvidhasya svasya svamatasya ca tathāvidhaśocyāvasthāyāḥ svapne 'pyasambhāvyāyāḥ sambhavāt svasya vismayaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8943: tatra vivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- parārthe yaḥ pīḍāmanubhavati bhaṅge 'pi
GK16andhvc3u:8945: na samprāpto vṛrddhi yadi sa bhṛśamakṣetrapatitaḥ kimikṣordeṣo 'sau na punaraguṇāyā marubhuvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:8946: yathā vā mamaiva--- amī ye dṛśyaneti nanu subhagarūpāḥ saphalatā
GK16andhvc3u:8948: locanam ca śrotṛjanasyātyādarāspadatayā prayatnagrāhyatayā cotsāhajananenaivaṃbhūtamatyantopādeyaṃ satkatipayasamucitajanānugrāhakaṃ kṛtamiti svātmani kuśalakāritāpradarśanayā dharmavīrasparśanena vīrarase viśrāntiriti mantavyam anyathā paridevitamātreṇa kiṃ kṛtaṃ syāt /
GK16andhvc3u:8950: nanu yathāsthitasyārthasyāsaṅgatau bhavatvaprastutapraśaṃsā, iha tu saṅgatirastyevetyāśaṅkya saṅgatāvapi bhavatyevaiṣeti
GK16andhvc3u:8954: yasya cakṣuṣo viṣayatāṃ kṣaṇaṃ gatānāmeṣāṃ saphalatā bhavati tadidaṃ bālapriyā śrotṛjanasyotsāhajanane hetudvayam--atyādaretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8967: nanvaprekṣāpūrvakatvamātmano 'nena darśitaṃ svaviṣayaparidevitasya sarvatra tadāvedakatvāditi na kiñcitkaratvaviraha ityāśaṅkya pariharati--aprekṣetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:8968: nanvaprastutapraśaṃsāyāmityādigranthasya kā saṃgatirityataḥ prāsaṅgikī seti darśayannavatārayati--nanvityādi
GK16andhvc3u:8978: nirāloke loke kathamidamaho cakṣuradhunā samaṃ jātaṃ sarvairna samamathavānyairavayavaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:8979: anayorhi dvayoḥ ślokayorikṣucakṣuṣī vivakṣitasvarūpe eva na ca prastute /
GK16andhvc3u:8981: avivakṣitatvaṃ yathā-- kastvaṃ bhoḥ kathayāmi daivahatakaṃ māṃ viddhi
GK16andhvc3u:8982: śākhoṭakaṃ vairāgyādiva vakṣi, sādhu viditaṃ kasmādidaṃ kathyate /
GK16andhvc3u:8989: aprāptaḥ para utkṛṣṭo bhāgo 'rthalābhātmakaḥ svarūpaprathanalakṣaṇo vā yena tasya /
GK16andhvc3u:8991: anena padenedamāha--akathanīyametat śrūyamāṇaṃ hi nirvedāya bhavati,
GK16andhvc3u:8993: kākvā devahatakamityādinā ca sūcitaṃ te vairāgyamiti bālapriyā aprastutārthavarṇanasthala ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:8997: pīḍā nāmākṣau niṣpīḍanaṃ satpuruṣe tu kleśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9006: ye ityasya pratinirdeśaḥ--'eṣām' iti 'yasyetyasyedam' iti ca /
GK16andhvc3u:9008: viveko 'pītyapiśabdena prakāśarūpārthasya saṅgrahaḥ sāmyābhāve vivakṣitaṃ hetuṃ darśayati--hastā hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9011: bhāgaśabdena dhanādilābhaḥ kīrtiprasaralābho vā grāhyo dvayorapi bhajanīyatvena bhāgaśabdavācyatvādityāha--arthalābhaityādi
GK16andhvc3u:9016: śrūyamāṇaṃ na tu śravaṇottaramevetyatiśayitanirvedahetutvaṃ śravaṇasya dyotayituṃ śatṛpratyena nirdeśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9017: vairāgyādiva vakṣītyatrevaśabdaḥ pratītau,tvaṃ vairāgyādvadasīti jñāyata ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9020: vāmenātra vaṭastamadhvagajanaḥ sarvātmanā sevata na cchāyāpi paropakārakariṇī mārgasthitasyāpi me //
GK16andhvc3u:9021: na hi vṛkṣaviśeṣeṇa sahoktipratyuktī sambhavata ityavivakṣitābhidheyenaivānena ślokena samṛddhāsatpuruṣasamīpavartino nirdhanasya kasyacinmanasvinaḥ paridevitaṃ tātparyeṇa vākyarthīkṛtamiti pratīyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9024: verīeṃ vaiṃ dento pāmara ho ohasijjihasi //
GK16andhvc3u:9038: smṛtiviṣayavastuno nirvedapradatvātsmaraṇasahabhāvī nirveda iti sanirvedatvaṃ smaraṇasya /
GK16andhvc3u:9050: he pāmara tathābhūtāyā badaryāḥ vṛti dadāttvaṃ janairapahasiṣyasa ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9053: sambhavītyasyānantaraṃ na cāsambhavīti ca kvacit atra hi vācyāratho nātyantaṃ sambhavī nā casambhavī /
GK16andhvc3u:9056: kāvye ubhe tato 'nyad yat tac citram abhidhīyate // DhvK_3.41 //
GK16andhvc3u:9058: tatra kiṃcic chabda-citraṃ vācya-citram ataḥ param // DhvK_3.42 //
GK16andhvc3u:9063: locanam iti pāṭhe samṛddhena ṛddhimātreṇa sātpuruṣo na tu guṇādineti vyākhyeyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9065: vācyabhāvaniyamo nāsti nāstīti na śakyaṃ vaktuṃ, vyaṅgyasyāpi bhāvāditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9066: tathā hi utpathajātāyā iti na tathākulodbhūtāyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9068: phalakusumapatrrarahitāyā ityevambhūtāpi kācitputriṇī vā bhrātrādipakṣaparipūrvatayā sambandhivargapoṣitā vā parirakṣyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9069: badaryā vṛttiṃ dadatpāmara bhoḥ, hasiṣyase sarvalokairiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9070: evamaprastutapraśaṃsāṃ prasaṅgato nirūpya prakṛtameva yannirūpaṇīyaṃ tadupa saṃharati--tasmāditi
GK16andhvc3u:9071: aprastutapraśaṃsāyāmapi lāvaṇyetyatra śloke yasmādyvāmoho loksya dṛṣṭastato hetorityarthaḥ evaṃ vyaṅgyasvarūpaṃ nirūpya sarvathā yattacchūnyaṃ tatra kā vārteti nirūpayitumāha--pradhānetyādinā
GK16andhvc3u:9079: vācyārtho na bhambhavatīti vaktuṃ ca na śakyamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9084: evaṃ bhūtāpi akulīnā lāvaṇyādiguṇarahitā ca bhavantyapi /
GK16andhvc3u:9087: iyaṃ tu putrādirahitā ca ato 'syā rakṣāṃ kurvaṃstvaṃ parihāsāspadaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9097: vibhāgapradarśanamātreṇa siddhe śabdacitraṃ vācyacitramiti samaśīrṣikayā vyaṅgyasyārthasya prādhānye dhvanisaṃjñitakāvyaprakāraḥ guṇabhāge tu guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9098: tato 'nyadrasabhāvāditātparyarahitaṃ vyaṅgyārthaviśeṣaprakāśanaśaktiśūnyaṃ ca kāvyaṃ kevalavācyavācakavaicitryamātrāśrayeṇopanibaddhamālekhyaprakhyaṃ yadābhāsate taccitram /
GK16andhvc3u:9102: vācyacitraṃ tataḥ śabdacitrādanyadvyaṅgyārthasaṃsparśarahitaṃ prādhānyena vākyarthatayā sthitaṃ rasāditātparyarahitamutprekṣādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9103: atha kimidaṃ citraṃ nāma? yatra na pratīyamānārthasaṃsparśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9105: tatra yatra vastvalaṅgārāntaraṃ vā vyaṅgyaṃ nāsti sa nāma citrasya kalpayatāṃ viṣayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9106: yatra tu rasādīnāmavaliṣayatvaṃ sa kāvyaprakāro na sambhavatyeva /
GK16andhvc3u:9108: vastu ca sarvameva jagadgatamavaśyaṃ kasyacidrasasya bhāvasya vāṅgtvaṃ pratipadyate antato vibhāvatvena /
GK16andhvc3u:9109: cittavṛttiviśeṣā hi rasādayaḥ, na ca tadasti vastu kiñcidyanna cittavṛttiviśeṣamupajanayati tadanutpādane vā locanam prasiddhameva tattulyamevārthacitraṃ mantavyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9130: na tanmukhyaṃ kāvyaṃ kāvyānukāro hyasāviti vacanāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9133: kaviviṣayataiva tasya na syāt kaviviṣayaśca citratayā kaścinnirūpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9135: kiṃ tu yadā rasabhāvādivivakṣāśūnyaḥ kaviḥ śabdālaṅkāramarthālaṅkāraṃ vopanibadhnāti tadā tadvivakṣāpekṣayā rasādiśūnyatārthasya parikalpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9137: vācyasāmarthyavaśena ca kavivivakṣāvirahe 'pi tathāvidhe viṣaye rasādipratītirbhavantī paridurbalā locanam nanu mā bhūtkaviviṣaya
GK16andhvc3u:9139: kāvyarūpatayā yadyapi na nirdiṣṭastathāpi kavigocarīkṛta evāsau vaktavyaḥ anyasya vāsukivṛttāntatulyasyehābhidhānāyogāt kaveścedgocarā nūnamamunā prītirjanayitavyā sā cāvaśyaṃ vibhāvānubhāvyabhicāriparyavasāyanīti bhāvaḥ kiṃ tviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9143: naiva tatra rasapratītirasti yathā pākānabhijñasūdaviracate māṃsapākaviśeṣe /
GK16andhvc3u:9155: nanvastu prītijanakatvaṃ, tathāpi kathaṃ rasādiśūnyatvābhāva ityata
GK16andhvc3u:9174: bhavatītyanenāpa prakāreṇa nīrasatvaṃ parikalpya citraviṣayo vyavasthāpyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9178: tadā nāstyeva tatkāvyaṃ dhvaneryatra na gocaraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9179: ' etacca citraṃ kavīnāṃ viśṛṅkhalagirāṃ rasāditātparyamanapekṣyaiva kāvyapravṛttidarśanādasmābhiḥ parikalpitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9180: idānīntanānāṃ tu nyāyye kāvyanaya vyavasthāpane kriyamāṇe nāstyeva dhvanivyatiriktaḥ kāvyaprakāraḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9181: yataḥ paripākavatāṃ kavīnāṃ rasāditātparyavirahe vyāpāra eva naśobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:9182: rasāditātparye ca nāstyeva tadvastu yadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ nīyamānaṃ na praguṇībhavata /
GK16andhvc3u:9183: acetanā api hi bhāvā yathāyathamucitarasavibhāvatayā cetanavṛttāntayojanayā vā na santyeva te ye yānti na rasāṅgatām /
GK16andhvc3u:9185: ajñakṛtāyāṃ ca śikhariṇyāmaho khikhariṇīti na tajjñānāccamatkāraḥ api tu dadhiguḍamaricaṃ caitadasamañjasayojitamiti vaktāro bhavanti /
GK16andhvc3u:9191: heyatayā tadupadiśyata iti cet--ghaṭe kṛte kavirna bhavatatyetadapi
GK16andhvc3u:9192: vaktavyamityāśaṅkya kavibhiḥ khalu tatkṛtamato heyatayopadiśyata ityetannirūpayati--etaccetyādinā
GK16andhvc3u:9195: bālapriyā iti vaktāro bhavantītyanena rasāsvādasya daurbalyaṃ darśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9210: śṛṅgārī cetkaviḥ kāvye jātaṃ rasamayaṃ jagat /
GK16andhvc3u:9214: tasmānnāstyeva tadvastu yatsarvātmanā rasatātparyavataḥ kavestadicchayā tadabhimatarasāṅgatāṃ na dhatte /
GK16andhvc3u:9215: tathopanibadhyamānaṃ vā na cārutvātiśayaṃ locanam yatpadāni tyajantyeva parivṛttisahiṇṇutām
GK16andhvc3u:9236: iti ślokaḥ, kāvyārthānityādivākyaṃ ca nāṭyaśāstre saptamādhyāye vartete /
GK16andhvc3u:9242: koḥ kavatervā kavanīyaṃ kāvyaṃ tatra ca padārthavākyārthau raseṣvevaṃ paryavasyata ityasādhāraṇyātprādhānyacca kāvyasyārthā rasāḥ arthyante pradhānyenetyarthā, iti cābhinavabhāratyāṃ vivṛtam /
GK16andhvc3u:9248: sthite caivaṃ sarva eva kāvyaprakāro na dhvanidharmatāmatipatati rasādyapekṣāyāṃ kaverguṇībhūtavyaṅgyalakṣaṇo
GK16andhvc3u:9250: yadā tu cāṭuṣu devatāstutiṣu vā rasādīnāmaṅgatayā vyavasthānaṃ hṛdayavatīṣu ca saprajñakagāthāsu kāsucidyvaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācye prādhānyaṃ tadapi guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaniniṣpandabhūtatvemevetyuktaṃ prāk /
GK16andhvc3u:9251: tadevamidārnīntanakavikāvyanayopadeśe kriyamāṇe prāthamikānāmabhyāsārthināṃ yadi paraṃ citreṇa
GK16andhvc3u:9254: yāvadrasiko na bhavati tadā paridṛśyamāno 'pyayaṃ bhāvavargo yadyapi sukhaduḥkhamohamādhyasthyamātraṃ laukikaṃ vitarati, tathāpi kavivarṇanopārohaṃ vinā lokātikrāntarasāsvādabhūvaṃ nādhiśeta ityarthaḥ cārutvātiśayaṃ yanna puṣṇāti tannāstyeveti saṃbandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9264: madhye tiṣṭhatīti madhyasthaḥ tasya bhāvo mādhyasthyaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānāṃ yanmādhyasthyaṃ tadekānubhavaṃ tanmātramityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9271: trivargasya dharmāditrayasya ya upāyaḥ, sa evopeyo jñātavyastatra
GK16andhvc3u:9279: bhavantu iti hālikasyāśiṣaṃ vardhayantyā punaḥ punaḥ kurvatyā kayācit /
GK16andhvc3u:9283: kārpāsalatānāṃ paripoṣe tatsthale niśśaṅkaṃ hālikena saha ramaṇaṃ bhaviṣyatīti baddhathā nirvṛtirityanena taccauryasambhogābhilāṣo vadhvā
GK16andhvc3u:9286: tadayamatra saṃgrahaḥ--- yasmin raso vā bhāvo vā tātparyeṇa prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:9289: locanam atra godāvarīkacchalatāgahane bhareṇa jambūphaleṣu pacyamāneṣu /
GK16andhvc3u:9290: hālikavadhūḥ paridhatte jambūphalarasaraktaṃ nivasanamiti tvaritayauryasaṃbhogasaṃbhāvyamānajambūphalarasaraktatvaparabhāganihnavanaṃ guṇībhūtavyaṅgyamityalaṃ bahunā /
GK16andhvc3u:9292: ātmātminorabheda eva vastuto vyutpattaye tu vibhāgaḥ bālapriyā prātiveśyiko nirvṛtiṃ prāpita iti ca locane pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9295: atra pakṣe saṅketasthānārthinaṃ svānuraktaṃ prātiveśyikaṃ tatsambhogābhilāṣiṇī kācidyadṛcchayā dṛṣṭaṃ hālikaṃ pratyevamāśīrvādena saṅketasthānaṃ jñāpitavatīti tatsammogābhilāṣo vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9303: tvaritaḥ patitajambūphale nikuñcadeśe sicayāstaraṇe tvarayā kṛto yaścauryasambhogastena sambhāvyamānaḥ samutpādyamāstaddhetukatayā tarkyamāṇo vā yo jambūphalarasaraktatvena parabhāgaḥ sicyasya tattadbhāge varṇāntaraprāptiḥ tasya nihnavanaṃ gopanecchetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9305: sarvāvayavāvacchedena jambūphalarasaraktasya sicayasya paridhānena tannihnavanaṃ gamyate, tattu vācyārthe guṇībhūtamityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9311: dhvaniḥ kāvyasyātmā sarvatra tatra viṣayī jñeyaḥ sahṛdayairjanaiḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9313: saṅkara-saṃsṛṣṭibhyāṃ punar apy uddyotate bahudhā // DhvK_3.43 //
GK16andhvc3u:9316: tasya ca dhvaneḥ svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vācyālaṅkāraiśca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavasthāyāṃ kriyamāṇāyāṃ bahuprabhedatā lakṣye dṛśyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9317: tathāhi svaprabhedasaṅkīrṇaḥ svaprabhedasaṃsṛṣṭo guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasaṅkīrṇo guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasaṃsṛṣṭo vācyālaṅkārāntarasaṅkīrṇo vācyālaṅkārāntarasaṃsṛṣṭaḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇaḥ saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭaśceti bahudhā dhvaniḥ prakāśate /
GK16andhvc3u:9325: sa trividhasya dhvaneḥ kāvyamārgo viṣaya ita yāvat // 41//
GK16andhvc3u:9328: sahaguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena sahālaṅkārairye vartante sve dhvaneḥ prabhedāstaiḥ saṃkīrṇatayā saṃsṛṣṭyā vānantaprakāro dhvanirita tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9331: tatrāpi pratyekaṃ saṃkareṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ceta ṣaṭ /
GK16andhvc3u:9332: saṃkarasyāpi trayaḥ prakārāḥ anugrāhyanugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehāspadatvenaikapadānupraveśeneti dvādaśa bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9333: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktāste guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasyāpi bālapriyā śabdārthamayaṃ kāvyaṃ śarīramiti vibhāga ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9341: prakāśate sarvatra tatra vyaṅgyaprādhānyaikanibandhano dhvaniḥ viṣayī san sahṛdayairjanairjeya ityanvayaḥ // 41//
GK16andhvc3u:9343: udyātata ityatra dhvaniriti śeṣa iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9344: saguṇībhūtavyaṅgyaissālaṅkāraissvaprabhedaiḥ saha saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭyoruktyā pratyekaṃ taistribhissaha te labhyete ityāśayena vibhāgān
GK16andhvc3u:9346: prakāśyata iti sammiśnyata iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9348: svaprabhedādibhistribhiḥ saha saṅkarakṛtā nava, saṃsṛṣṭikṛtāstraya iti dvādaśetyarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9349: pūrvaṃ ca ye pañcatriṃśadbhedā uktā iti /
GK16andhvc3u:9351: vṛttigranthavyākhyānāvasare ye pañcatriśadbhedāḥ tatra svaprabhedasaṅkīrṇatvaṃ kadācidanugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena
GK16andhvc3u:9356: khaṇapāhuṇiā deara esā jāāeṃ kiṃpi de bhaṇidā /
GK16andhvc3u:9360: tatra saṃkaratrayeṇa saṃsṛṣṭyā ca guṇane dve śate caturaśītyadhike /
GK16andhvc3u:9361: tāvatā pañcatriṃśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahastrāṇi catvāri śatāni viśatyadhikāni bhavanti
GK16andhvc3u:9363: tatrā vyutpattaye katipayabhedeṣūdāharaṇāni ditsuḥ svaprabhedānāṃ kārikāyāmanyapadārthatvena pradhānatayoktatvāttadāśrayāṇyeva catvāryudāharaṇānyāha--tatreti /
GK16andhvc3u:9367: kṣaṇa utsavastatra nimantraṇenānītā he devara! eṣā te jāyayā kimapi bhaṇitā roditi /
GK16andhvc3u:9369: sā tāvaddevarānuraktā tajjāyayā viditavṛttāntayā kimapyuktetyeṣoktistadvṛttāntaṃ bālapriyā svayaṃ pratipāditā ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9380: dve śate caturaśītyadhike ityasyānantaraṃ 'tāvatā pañcatriśato mukhyabhedānāṃ guṇane saptasahasrāṇi catvāri viṃśatyadhikāni bhavantīti pāṭho bahuṣu grantheṣu dṛśyate, tadarthaḥ saṅgato na bhāti,
GK16andhvc3u:9383: ato 'laṅkāratvāvacchi eka eva grāhya iti bhāva- /
GK16andhvc3u:9402: (kṣaṇaprādhuṇikā devara eṣā jāyayā kimapi te bhaṇitā /
GK16andhvc3u:9407: ekavyañjakānupraveśena tu vyaṅgyatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya svaprabhedāntarāpekṣayā locanam dṛṣṭavatyā anyasyāstaddevaracaurakāminyāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9408: tatra tava gṛhaṇyāyaṃ vṛttānto jñāta ityubhayataḥ kalahāyitumicchantyevamāha /
GK16andhvc3u:9410: yadi vā tvaṃ tāvadetasyāmevānurakta itīrṣyākopatātparyādanunayanamanyaparaṃ vivakṣitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9411: eṣā tadevānīmucitamagarhaṇīyaṃ premāspadamityanunayo vivakṣitaḥ, vayaṃ tvidānīṃ garhaṇīyāḥ saṃvṛttā ityetatparatayā ubhayathāpi ca svābhiprāyaprakāśanādekataraniścaye pramāṇābhāva ityuktam vivakṣitasya hi svarūpasthasyaivānyaparatvam, bālapriyā devareti /
GK16andhvc3u:9414: vidito vṛttāntastasyā devarasya ca parasparānurāgādiryayā tayetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9418: jāyayā kimapi bhaṇiteti rodanahetupradarśanamātraṃ na tatkathanasya
GK16andhvc3u:9431: priyabhāṣaṇādiḥ paritoṣajanako vyāpārastatvenānunayatervācyārthaḥ, sa cātra sambhogatvena rūpeṇa lakṣyo vivakṣita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9432: tasyāṃ tavānurāgo mayā jñāta ityādirarthaścātra vyaṅgyo bodhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9456: guṇībhūtavyaṅgya saṅkīrṇatvaṃ yathā--'nyakkāro hyayameva me yadarayaḥ'
GK16andhvc3u:9458: yathā vā-- kartā dyūtacchalānāṃ jatumayaśaraṇoddīpanaḥ so 'bhimānī
GK16andhvc3u:9463: yadi vā devarānuraktāyā eva taṃ devaramanyayā sahāvalokitasaṃbhogavṛtāntaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9467: sarvatra kāvye rasāditātparyaṃ tāvadasti tatra rasadhvanerbhāvadhvaneścaikena vyañjakenābhivyañjanaṃ snigdhaśyāmaletyatra vipralambhaśṛṅgārasya tadvyabhicāriṇaśca śokāvegātmanaścarvaṇīyatvāt evaṃ trividhaṃ saṃkaraṃ vyākhyāya saṃsṛṣṭimudāharati--svaprabhedeti /
GK16andhvc3u:9469: liptaśabdādau tiraskṛto vācyaḥ, rāmādau tu saṃkrānta ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9470: evaṃ svaprabhedaṃ prati caturbhedānudāhṛtya guṇībhūtavyaṅgyaṃ pratyudāharati--guṇībhūteti
GK16andhvc3u:9485: 'snagdhaśyāmalakāntiliptaviyata'ityatra dravadravyasya sarvāvayavāvacchedena yaḥ saṃyogastadātmakasya lepasya vācyārthasya
GK16andhvc3u:9487: evaṃ payodāssuhṛdo yeṣāmityatra vācyārthasya bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena rūpeṇa lakṣayattadatiśayaṃ vyanaktītyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9495: atra hyalakṣyakramavyaṅgyasya vākyārthībhūtasya vyaṅgyaviśiṣṭavācyābhidhāyibhiḥ padaiḥ sammiśratā
GK16andhvc3u:9496: ata eva ca padārthāśrayatve guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya vākyārthāśrayatve ca dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatāyāmapi na virodhaḥ svaprabhedāntaravat /
GK16andhvc3u:9501: tena tadupalakṣitā yo 'rtho vyaṅgyaguṇībhāvena vartate tena saṃmiśratā saṃkīrmatā /
GK16andhvc3u:9502: sā cānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṃdehayogenaikavyañjakānupraveśena ceti yathāsaṃbhavamudāharaṇadvaye yojyā /
GK16andhvc3u:9503: tathā hi-me yadaraya ityādibhi- sarvaireva padārthauḥ kartetyādibhiśca
GK16andhvc3u:9505: kartetyādau ca pratipadaṃ pratyavāntaravākyaṃ pratisamāsaṃ ca vyaṅgyamutprekṣituṃ śakyameveti na likhitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9507: tatra guṇībhūtavyaṅgyatāpi yojayituṃ śakyā, vācyasyaiva krodhoddīpakatvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9510: ekavyañjakānupraveśastu taireva padaiḥ guṇībhūtavya vyaṅgyasya pradhānībhūtasya carasasya vibhāvādidvāratayābhivyañjanāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9514: nyakkāra ityādau rāvaṇagatasya kartetyādau bhīmasenagatasya ca krodhasya pratīteriti bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9533: kartetyādau tu te kiṃ na santītyata āha--kartetyādāviti /
GK16andhvc3u:9536: raudra evānugṛhyata ityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraṃ pradarśya sandehayogena taṃ darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9542: tathā ca guṇībhūtavyaṅgyasya dhvaneśca sandehasaṅkara iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9546: ata evetyetadvyākhyāyā ta evetyādi na yathāhi dhvaniprabhedāntarāṇi parasparaṃ saṅkīryante padārthavākyārthāśrayatvena ca na viruddhāni /
GK16andhvc3u:9547: kiṃ caikavyaṅgyāśrayatve tu pradhānaguṇabhāvo virudhyate na tu vyaṅgyabhedāpekṣayā tato 'pyasya na virodhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9548: ayaṃ ca saṅkarasaṃsṛṣṭivyavahāro bahūnāmekatra vācyavācakabhāva iva vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāve 'pi nirvirodha eva mantavyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9549: yatra tu padāni kānicidavivakṣitavācyānuramanarūpavyaṅgyavācyāni vā tatra dhvaniguṇībhūtavyaṅgyayoḥ saṃsṛṣṭatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:9555: nanu vyaṅgyaṃ guṇībhūtaṃ pradhānaṃ ceti viruddhameva taddṛśyamānamapyuktatvānna śraddheyamityāśaṅkya vyañjakabhedāttāvanna virodha iti darśayati--ata eveti /
GK16andhvc3u:9561: nanu vyañjakabhedātprathamabhedayoḥ parihāro 'stu ekavyañjakānupraveśe tu kiṃ vaktavyamityāśaṅkya pāramārthikaṃ parihāramāha--kiñcetiḥ tato 'pīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9563: nanu vācyālaṅkāraviṣaye śruto 'yaṃ saṃkarādivyavahāro na tu vyaṅgyaviṣaya
GK16andhvc3u:9566: mananena pratītyā tathā niśceyaḥ ubhayatrāpi pratītereva śaraṇatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9576: anugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena sandehayogena ca yau saṅkarau tayorityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9587: mukhyārthayoḥ vācyālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvamalakṣyakramavyaṅgyāpekṣayā rasavati sālaṅkāre kāvye sarvatra suvyavasthitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9591: itipadenāsādhāraṇaguṇagaṇo 'bhivyakto 'pi guṇatvamavalambate, vācyasyaiva smaraṇasya prādhānyena cārutvahetutvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:9601: 'calāpāṅgāṃ dṛṣṭim' ityatra hi rūpakavyatirekasya prāgvyākhyātasya śṛṅgārānugrāhakatvaṃ svabhāvokteḥ śṛṅgārasya caikānupraveśaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9602: 'uppaha jāyā' iti gāthāyāṃ pāmarasvabhāvoktirvā dhvanirveti prakaraṇādyabhāve ekataragrāhakaṃ pramāṇaṃ nāsti /
GK16andhvc3u:9603: yadyapyalaṅkāro rasamavaśyamanugṛhṇāti, tathāpi 'nāti nirvahaṇaiṣitā' iti yadabhiprāyeṇoktaṃ tatra saṅkārāsambhavātsaṃsṛṣṭirevālaṅkārema rasadhvaneḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9607: bālapriyā suhṛtvasākṣitvayoracetaneṣu latāveśmasu bādhātsuhṛtpadamupakāritvena sākṣipadamāsannatvena rūpeṇa ca lakṣayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9633: yā vyāpāravatī rasān rasayituṃ kācatkavīnāṃ navā dṛṣṭiryā pariniṣṭhitārthaviṣayonmeṣā ca vaipaścitī
GK16andhvc3u:9636: tatra vibhāvādiyojanātmikāvarṇanā, tataḥ prabhṛti ghaṭanāparyantā kriyā
GK16andhvc3u:9641: ata eva te kavayaḥ varṇanāyogāt teṣām /
GK16andhvc3u:9645: pratibhārūpā, tatra dṛṣṭiścākṣuṣaṃ jñānaṃ ṣāḍavādi rasayatīti virodhālaṅkāro 'ta eva navā
GK16andhvc3u:9670: rasān rasayituṃ ṣāḍabādipeyadravyāṇi madhurādirasayuktāni kartum yadvā--ṣāḍabādigatamadhurādirasānāsvādayituṃ vyāpāravatīti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhābhāsālaṅkāra ityāha--tatra dṛṣṭirityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9684: aindriyakaṃ vijñānaṃ laukikatattadviṣayakacākṣuṣajñānaṃ tasyābhyāsa āvṛttiḥ tenollasite prakāśite ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9686: te dve apyavalambya viśvamaniśa nirvarṇayanto vayaṃ śrāntā naiva ca labdhamabdhiśayana tvadbhaktitulyaṃ sukham //
GK16andhvc3u:9687: locanam yā caivaṃvidhā dṛṣṭiḥ pariniṣṭito 'calaḥ arthaviṣaye niścetavye viṣaye unmeṣo yasyāḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9688: tathā pariniṣṭhite lokaprasiddhe 'rthe na tu kavivadapūrvasminnarthe
GK16andhvc3u:9692: kavīnāmiti vaipaścitīti vacanena nāhaṃ kavirna paṇḍita ityātmano
GK16andhvc3u:9700: nirvarṇayanto varṇanayā, tathā niścitārthaṃ varṇayantaḥ idamitthamiti parāmarśanumānādinānirbhajya nirvarṇanaṃ kimatra sāraṃ syāditi
GK16andhvc3u:9702: yacca nirvarṇyate tatkhalu madhye vyāpāryamāṇayā madhye cārthaviśeṣu niścitonmeṣayā niścalayā dṛṣṭyā samyaṅnirvarṇitaṃ bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9706: na kevalaṃ sāraṃ na labdhaṃ yāvatpratyuta khedaḥ prāpta iti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9709: yoganidrayā tvamata eva sārasvarūpavedī svarūpāvasthita ityarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9712: tvameva paramātmasvarūpoviśvasārastasya bhaktiḥ śraddhādipūrvaka upāsanākramajastadāveśastena bālapriyā arthaviṣaya
GK16andhvc3u:9731: mithyādṛṣṭiḥ kavidṛṣṭiḥ tatvadṛṣṭiḥ vipaściddṛṣṭiḥ tayorāṇe vyasaninastātparyavanta ityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9745: yatra hi kānicitpadāni locanam tulyamapi na labdhamāstāṃ tāvattajjātīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9746: evaṃ prathamameva parameśvarabhaktibhājaḥ kutūhalamātrāvalambitakaviprāmāṇikobhayavṛtteḥ punarapi parameśvarabhaktiviśrāntireva yukteti manvānasyeyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9747: sakalapramāṇapariniścitadṣṭādṛṣṭaviṣayaviśeṣajaṃ yatsukhaṃ, yadapi vā lokottaraṃ rasacarvaṇātmakaṃ tata ubhayato 'pi parameśvaraviśrāntyānandaḥ prakṛṣyate tadānandavipruṇmātrāvabhāso hi rasāsvāda ityuktaṃ prāgasmābhiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:9748: laukikaṃ tu sukhaṃ tato 'pi nikṛṣṭaprāyaṃ bahutaraduḥkhānuṣaṅgāditi tātparyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9750: dṛṣṭimavalambya nirvarṇanamiti virodhālaṅkāro vāśrīyatām, andhapadanyāsena dṛṣṭiśabdo 'tyantatiraskṛtavācyo vāstu ityekataraniścaye nāsti pramāṇam,
GK16andhvc3u:9755: sakalavākye hi yadyalaṅkāro 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi vyaṅgyārtho 'pi pradhānaṃ tadānugrāhyanugrāhakatvasaṅkarastadabhāve
GK16andhvc3u:9756: bālapriyā tasya paramānandarūpatvaṃ ca bhaktirasāyanādigrantheṣu pradarśitam /
GK16andhvc3u:9760: vṛttau saṅkīrṇatvamityanenānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvena saṅkaraḥ ekapadānupraveśaśaṅkaraśca vivakṣita iti darśayati--tatretyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9766: te avalambya nirvarṇayanta ityatra te iti tatpadena dṛṣṭipadavācyārthasya darśanasya parāmarśe darśanamavalambya paśyanta iti viruddhārthasya pratītyā virodhālaṅkāro vetyarthaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9784: yathā-- dīrdhīkurvan paṭu madakalaṃ kūjitaṃ sārasānāṃ pratyūṣeṣu
GK16andhvc3u:9786: locanam vā dhvaninā vā paryāyeṇa dvābhyāmapi vā yugapatpadaviśrāntābhyāṃ bhāvyamiti trayo bhedāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9788: yatrānugrāhyānugrāhakabhāvaṃ pratyāśaṅkāpi nāvatarati taṃ tṛtīyameva prakāramudāhartumupakramate--yatra hīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9792: atratyo hiśabdo maitrīpadamityasyānantaraṃ yojya iti grantha saṅgatiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9794: siprāvātena hi dūramapyasau śabdo nīyate, tathā sukumārapavanasparśajātaharṣāḥ ciraṃ kūjanti, tatkūjitaṃ ca vātāndolitasiprātaraṅgajamadhuraśabdamiśraṃ bhavatīti dīrghatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:9796: tathāsau sukumāro vāyuryena tajjaḥ śabdaḥ sārasakūjitamapi nābhibhavati pratyuta tatsabrahmacārī tadeva dīpayati /
GK16andhvc3u:9797: na ca dīpanaṃ tadīyamanupayogi yatastanmadena kalaṃ madhuramākarṇanīyam /
GK16andhvc3u:9811: vācyālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatatvaṃ padāpekṣayaiveti padānāmāvṛttiḥ tatra padāpekṣayetyasya tathāvidhapadāpekṣayetyarthaśceti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9813: dīrghīkuvannityanenoktaṃ siprāvātahetukaṃ kūjitasya dīrghatvaṃ daiśikaṃ kālikaṃ svasajātīyasaṃvalanakṛtaṃ ceti trividhamiti
GK16andhvc3u:9824: sphuṭitānītyasya truṭitānītyarthaṃ manasivṛtya tatra hetuṃ gamyaṃ
GK16andhvc3u:9827: yatra strīṇāṃ harati surataglānimaṅgānukūlaḥ siprāvātaḥ priyatama iva prārthanācāṭukāraḥ //
GK16andhvc3u:9828: locanam tathā sphuṭitāni vikasitāni nayanahārīṇi yāni kamalāni teṣāṃ ya āmodastena yā maitrī abhyāsāṅgāviyogaparasparānukūlyalābhastena kaṣāya uparakto makarandena ca kaṣāyavarṇīkṛtaḥ strīṇāmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:9829: sarvasya tathāvidhasya trailokyasārabhūtasya ya evaṃ karoti suratakṛtāṃ glāniṃ tāntiṃ harati, atha ca tadviṣayāṃ glāniṃ punaḥ sambhogābhilāṣoddīpanena harati /
GK16andhvc3u:9830: na ca prasahyaprabhutatayāpi tvaṅgānukūlo hyadyasparśaḥ hṛdayāntarbhūtaśca
GK16andhvc3u:9833: prārthanārthaṃ cāṭūni karotīti tena tathā kāryata iti parasparānurāgaprāṇaśṛṅgārasarvasvabhūto 'sau pavanaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9834: yuktaṃ caitattasya yataḥ siprāparicito 'sau vāta iti nāgariko na tvavidagdho bālapriyā bhāvārthamāha--nayaneti
GK16andhvc3u:9856: priyatame iti ca padacchedamabhipretya priyatame prārthanā cāṭukāra iti vātaviśeṣaṇatayāpi yojayati--priyatama ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9860: cāṭukāra iti ṇyantātkartari pratyaya ityāha--cāṭūni atra hi maitrīpadamavivakṣitavācyo dhvaniḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9866: cāṭukaraṇāvasare ca sphuṭitaṃ vikasitaṃ yatkamalakāntidhārivadanaṃ tasya yāmodamaitrī sahajasaurabhaparicayastena kaṣāya uparakto bhavati /
GK16andhvc3u:9868: evaṃ śabdarūpagandhasparśā yatra hṛdyā yatra ca pavano 'pa tathā nāgarikaḥ sa tavāvaśyamabhigantavyo deśa iti meghaḍhūte meghaṃ prati kāmina iyamuktiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9875: ityetadantaṃ vyākhyāyodāharaṇāni ca nirūpya 'punarapi' iti yatkārikābhāge padadvayaṃ tasyārthaṃ prakāśayatyudāharaṇadvāreṇaiva---saṃsṛṣṭetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9877: saṃsṛṣṭisaṅkarau vivakṣitau yāvatteṣāmanyonyamapi svaprabhedānāṃ bālapriyā kārayatīti /
GK16andhvc3u:9904: paṭu dīghokurvannityatra gamyotprekṣā, pratyūṣasvabhāvoktiḥ, aṅgānukūlaḥ snigdha ityasya vāyāvāropādrūpakaṃ,
GK16andhvc3u:9910: dantakṣatāni karajaiśca vipāṭitāni prodbhinnasāndrapulake bhavataḥ śarīre
GK16andhvc3u:9912: atra hi samāsoktisaṃsṛṣṭena virodhālaṅkāreṇa saṃkīrṇasyālakṣyakamavyaṅgyasya dhvaneḥ prakāśanam
GK16andhvc3u:9914: locanam svaprabhedairguṇībhūtavyaṅgyena vā saṅkīrṇānāṃ saṃsṛṣṭānāṃ ca dhvanīnāṃ saṅkīrṇatvaṃ saṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca durlakṣamiti vispaṣṭodāharaṇaṃ na bhavatītyabhiprāyeṇālaṅkārasyālaṅkāreṇa saṃsṛṣṭasya saṃkīrṇasya vā dhvanau saṃkarasaṃsargau pradarśanīyau /
GK16andhvc3u:9916: bodhisattvasya svakiśorabhakṣaṇapravṛttāṃ siṃho prati nijaśarīraṃ vitīrṇavataḥ kenaciccāṭukaṃ kriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:9918: rakte rudhire mano 'bhilāṣo yasyāḥ, anuraktaṃ ca mano yasyāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9920: jātaspṛhairiti ca vayamapi kadācidevaṃ kāruṇikapadavīmadhirokṣyāmastadā satyato munayo bhaviṣyāma iti manorājyayuktaiḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9941: bhavataśśarīra ityanena kāminaśśarīra iti, mṛgarājavadhvetyanena mṛgākhyapuñjātiviśeṣasya vadhveti ca gamyate /
