GK16andhvc3u:9946: dharmasya dayāprayuktatvādatra dayāvīraśabdena dharmavīra evokta iti sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9949: sa rasaḥ dharmavīraśśānto vā saṃsṛṣṭālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvaṃ ca
GK16andhvc3u:9955: kaścinmanorathaśataprārthitapreyasīsambhogāvasare jātapulakastathā tvaṃ parārthasampādanāya svaśarīradāna ita karuṇātiśayo
GK16andhvc3u:9959: yadi vā pathikānāṃ śyāmāyitaṃ duḥkhavaśena śyāmikā yebhyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:9961: abhinayaprayogarasikeṣu pathikasāmājakeṣu satsu mayūravṛndānāṃ prasāritagītānāṃ prakṛṣṭasāraṇānusārigītānāṃ tathā grīvārecakāya prasāritagrīvāṇāṃ nṛttaṃ śobhate /
GK16andhvc3u:9970: munibhirapi jātaspṛhairavalokitānītyanena dayāvīrasya paripoṣapratītyā virodhasyānugrāhakatvaṃ spaṣṭamiti manasi kṛtya samāsoktestadupapādayati--samāsoktimahimnetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:9998: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabheda-bhedāś ca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:9999: saṅkhyātuṃ diṅ-mātraṃ teṣām idam uktam asmābhiḥ // DhvK_3.44 //
GK16andhvc3u:10000: evaṃ dhvaneḥ prabhedāḥ prabhedabhedāśca kena śakyante /
GK16andhvc3u:10002: anantā hi dhvaneḥ prakārāḥ sahṛdayānāṃ vyutpattaye teṣāṃ diṅmātraṃ kathitam /
GK16andhvc3u:10003: ity ukta-lakṣaṇo yo dhvanir vivecyaḥ prayatnataḥ sadbhiḥ sat-kāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātuṃ vā samyag abhiyuktaiḥ // DhvK_3.45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10005: satkāvyaṃ kartuṃ vā jñātu vā samyagabhiyuktaiḥ // 45 //
GK16andhvc3u:10006: uktasvarūpadhvaninirūpaṇanipuṇā hi satkavayaḥ sahṛdayāśca niyatameva locanam sandehāspadatvena saṅkīrṇābhyāmabhinayaprayoge, abhinavaprayoge ca rasikeṣviti prasāritagītānāmiti yaḥ śabdaśaktyudbhavasta saṃsargamātramanugrāhyatvābhāvāt /
GK16andhvc3u:10007: 'pahiasāmāiesu' ityatra tu pade saṅkīrṇābhyāṃ tābhyāmupamārūpakābhyāṃ śabdaśaktimūlasya dhvaneḥ saṅkīrṇatvamekavyañjakānupraveśāditi
GK16andhvc3u:10012: atha 'sahṛdayamanaḥprītaye' iti yatsūcitaṃ tadidānīṃ na śabdamātramapi tu
GK16andhvc3u:10014: yaḥ prayatnato vivecyaḥ asmābhiścoktalakṣaṇo dhvaniretadeva kāvyatattvaṃ yathoditena prapañcanirūpaṇādinā vyākartumaśaknuvadbhiralaṅkāraiḥ rītayaḥ bālapriyā saṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṃsṛṣṭatvasaṅkīrṇālaṅkārasaṅkīrṇatvarūpabhedadvayamityarthaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10016: 'ahiṇaa' ityasya abhinaya abhinava ityubhayathāpi cchāyeti darśayan
GK16andhvc3u:10028: yathoditamityasya vyākartumityanena sambandha iti darśayan vivṛṇoti--yathoditenetyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10036: etaddhvanipravartanena nirṇītaṃ kāvyatattvamasphuṭasphuritaṃ sadaśaknuvadbhiḥ pratipādayituṃ vaidarbhī gauḍī pāñcālī ceti rītayaḥ pravartitāḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10037: rītilakṣaṇavidhāyināṃ hi kāvyatattvametadasphuṭatayā manāksphuritamāsāditi lakṣyate tadatra sphuṭatayā sampradarśitenānyena rītilakṣaṇenana kiñcit /
GK16andhvc3u:10042: asmin vyaṅgyavyañjakabhāvavivecanamaye kāvyalakṣaṇe jñāte sati yāḥ kāścitprasiddhā upanāgārakādyāḥ śabdatattvāśrayā vṛttayo yāścārthatattvasambanddhāḥ kaiśikyādayastāḥ samyagrītipadavīmavataranti anyathā tu tāsāmadṛṣṭārthanāmiva vṛttīnāmaśraddheyatvameva syānnānubhavasiddhatvam /
GK16andhvc3u:10044: yatra śabdānāmarthānāṃ ca keṣāñcitpratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ locanam pravartitā ityuttarakārikayā sambandhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10051: yadāha--viśeṣo guṇātmā guṇāśca rasaparyavasāyina eveti hyuktaṃ prāgguṇanirūpaṇe 'śṛṅgāra eva madhuraḥ' ityatreti // 45//
GK16andhvc3u:10055: bālapriyā ityuktetyādikamekaṃ vākyamasphuṭetyādivākyāntaraṃ tatraitadityanena dhvaneḥ parāmarśaśceti bodhyam /
GK16andhvc3u:10057: 'asphuṭasphuritaṃ sadi'ti vṛtyā tatpadaṃ hetugarbhamiti darśitaṃ, tadeva
GK16andhvc3u:10061: anubhavasiddhatvamiti vṛttau vakṣyamāṇaṃ phalitamarthaṃ manasikṛtya vivṛṇoti---anubhavetyādi
GK16andhvc3u:10062: jātyatvamiva ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ cārutvamanākhyeyamavabhāsate kāvye tatra dhvanivyavahāra iti yallakṣaṇaṃ dhvanerucyate kenācittadayuktamiti nābhidheyatāmarhati /
GK16andhvc3u:10065: arthānāṃ ca sphuṭatvenāvabhāsanaṃ vyaṅgyaparatvaṃ vyaṅgyāṃśaviśiṣṭatvaṃ ceti viśeṣaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10066: tau ca viśeṣau vyākhyātuṃ śakyete vyākhyātau ca bahuprakāram /
GK16andhvc3u:10074: tathā--'vṛttayaḥ kāvyamātṛkāḥ' iti yaduktaṃ muninā tatra rasocita eva
GK16andhvc3u:10077: iyatā 'tasyābhāvaṃ jagadurapare' ityādābhāvavikalpeṣu 'vṛttayo rītayaśca gatāḥ śravaṇagocaraṃ, tadatiriktaḥ ko 'yaṃ dhvaniri'ti /
GK16andhvc3u:10078: tatra kathañcidabhyupagamaḥ kṛtaḥ kathañcicca dūṣaṇaṃ dattamasphuṭasphuritamiti vacanena /
GK16andhvc3u:10079: idānīṃ vācāṃ sthitamaviṣaye' iti yadūce tattu prathamoddyote dūṣitamapi dūṣayat sarvaprapañcakathane hi asambhāvyamevānākhyeyatvamityabhiprāyeṇa /
GK16andhvc3u:10084: rītipadavīmavatarantīta prakāśanta ityasya vivaraṇamiti vaktavyaṃ, tacca na sambhavati tayorbhinnārthatvāt
GK16andhvc3u:10085: kiñca rītipadavīmavatarantītyatra kāvyalakṣaṇajñānasya hetutvamapi durghaṭamityato 'nyathaivātra pāṭha ityāha--pratītipadavīmiti /
GK16andhvc3u:10088: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvamiva pratipattṛviśeṣasaṃvedyaṃ yatra keṣāñcicchabdānāmarthānāṃ ca cārutvamanākhyeyamevāvabhāsata ityanvayaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10091: cārutvaṃ nāma kaścidviśeṣa iti vaktavyamityabhipretya nābhidheyatāmarhatītyuktamupapādayati--'yata' ityādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10102: sāmānyasaṃsparśivikalpaśabdāgocaratve sati, prakāśamānatvaṃ tu yadanākhyeyatvamucyate kvacit tadapi kāvyaviśeṣāṇāṃ ratnāviśeṣāṇāmiva na
GK16andhvc3u:10107: vaikaṭikā eva hi ratnatattvavidaḥ, sahṛdayā eva hi kāvyānāṃ rasajñā iti
GK16andhvc3u:10109: yattvanirdeśyatvaṃ sarvalakṣaṇaviṣayaṃ bauddhānāṃ prasiddhaṃ tattanmataparīkṣāyāṃ granthāntare nirūpayiṣyāmaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10110: iha tu granthāntaraśravaṇalavaprakāśanaṃ sahṛdayavaimanasyapradāyīti na prakriyate /
GK16andhvc3u:10111: bauddhamatena vā yathā pratyakṣādilakṣaṇaṃ tathāsmākaṃ dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GK16andhvc3u:10115: sāmānyasparśī yo vikalpastato yaḥ śabdaḥ dṛṣṭānte 'pi anākhyeyatvaṃ nāstīti darśayati--ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ ceti /
GK16andhvc3u:10119: nanu nārthaṃ śabdāḥ spṛśantyapīti, anirdeśyasya vedakamityādau kathamanākhyeyatvaṃ vastūnāmuktamiti cedatrāha--yattviti /
GK16andhvc3u:10120: evaṃ hi sarvabhāvavṛttāntatulya eva dhvaniriti dhvanisvarūpamanākhyeyamityativyāpakaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10121: granthāntara iti viniścayaṭīkāyāṃ dharmottaryāṃ yā vivṛtiramunā granthakṛtā kṛtā tatraiva tadvyākhyātam /
GK16andhvc3u:10131: ratnaviśeṣāṇāṃ jātyatvādisāmānyasya sambhāvanayaiva mūlyaparikalpanāyā darśanāditi bhāvaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10134: tadgranthāntare nirūpayiṣyāma ityuktyā sūcitamanirdeśyatvarūpalakṣaṇasya doṣaṃ darśayati--evaṃ hītyādi /
GK16andhvc3u:10143: kvacit granthe bhāva iti ca pāṭhaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10144: tatpakṣe anākhyeyāṃśabhāvitvamiti śloke tasyoktameva dhvanilakṣaṇaṃ sādhīyaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10146: na lakṣaṇaṃ, lakṣaṇaṃ tu sādhīyo 'sya yathoditam //
GK16andhvc3u:10150: anākhyeyāṃśasyābhāso vidyate yasmin kāvye tasya bhāvastanna lakṣaṇaṃ dhvaneriti sambandhaḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10174: yathā nayanaṃ lokān kṛtārthān vidadhāti, tathedaṃ vyākhyānamiti bhāvaḥ /
GK16andhvc3u:10176: āsūtritānāṃ bhedānāṃ samyaksūtrairnirdiṣṭānāṃ dhvanyādibhedarūpāṇāṃ kāvyavāṇīnāṃ yā sphuṭatāpattiḥ
GK16andhvc3u:10181: śubhamastu sarvaṃ śivam iti śrīrāmaśārakaracitāyāṃ locanaṭippaṇyāṃ tṛtīya uddyotaḥ //
